Title: I like the ring
Content: I like the ring. However, I wish it had a setting to record resistance training.

Title: Great feedback and it reminds me to get…
Content: Great feedback and it reminds me to get up and walk around and to relax! I sometimes told I had sleep apnea, but it turns out I don't! Which is a relief.
Author: Ed Chivers

Title: Just about everything regarding this…
Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on the reviews that I had read. Great decision.. and the battery does actually last almost 2 weeks consistently... Thanks.
Author: Michael Walls

Title: Works like it says
Content: Works like it says
Author: Michael Cargill

Title: Everthing I wanted and more
Content: My ring was sent promptly. I've been pleased with all the features and enjoy looking at my results in the morning and at night. My sister just bought one too- guess I did a good sales joy without knowing it...
Author: Pamela Branum

Title: I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air
Content:
I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being treated for it so I didn’t hesitate to buy the Air.
Thank you so much for such a speedy delivery and great customer service
Author: Carol Hess

Title: Clear Instructions, Easy To Use
Content: I bought the RingConn 2 specifically for sleep monitoring and sleep apnea monitoring. So far, so good. Positive messaging on stress levels.
Author: Tryna Sleep

Title: I was misled in speaking with a…
Content: I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device from family members so had no use for this one and was stuck with it.
Author: disappointed

Title: It works
Content: Tried an other ring that didn’t work but this one does
Author: Joanne Gougeon

Title: This device is very easy to use and…
Content: This device is very easy to use and battery capacity is great.
Author: CRISTIAN ALBU

Title: Very good service seriously I am…
Content: Very good service seriously I am impressed
Author: Sounak Sengupta

Title: I had issues with my delivery and they…
Content: I had issues with my delivery and they responded very quickly offering solutions! Great costumer service!
Author: Celimar Alicea

Title: Wish I could give this ring a zero
Content: Wish I could give this ring a zero! I bought 2 rings. One for my husband and one for myself. Husbands has worked fine. Mine has never worked from the jump. It collected no data, when the ring needed charging, it would tell me it was fully charged. When I first contacted the company they sent me a reassuring email saying don't worry they would look after the situation. Everytime I send them what they ask for, they ask for something additional. Wish I would have bought the Oura! This has been going on for over a month with no solution.
Author: Shirley Rick

Title: The package was lost and took more than a month to arrive.
Content: The package was lost and took more than a month to arrive.
Author: Daniel Spalthoff

Title: Good customer service, great product
Content: Good customer service, very fast delivery and feedback when I had some questions.
Author: mo.peanut

Title: The ring provides all the info I need…
Content: The ring provides all the info I need to know what’s happening with me
Author: Bill

Title: I decided to order the gen 2 over the…
Content: I decided to order the gen 2 over the gen 2 air since the product description made it appear that the titanium material of the gen 2 would withhold scratches. After having the ring for one week it is already scratched up and visible. Considering the price of the ring I tried to get a replacement, especially since it was early on but was offered a $15 refund which I never received. I have not been rough with my ring but the fact that it is already scratched up is upsetting considering how much I spent on it.
Author: Vs

Title: Buyer beware
Content:
Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer other than Amazon? Strange way to conduct business with new customers!
Be mindful of which retailer you choose, many will not accept returns on this and the company sure as hell won't.
To the company: improve your staff training - the way I have been dealt with is wrong and your staff are reckless and damaging to the business, hence my reviews. Really poor and not worth the cheaper option.
Author: customer

Title: Don't purchase these rings - they don't work anymore
Content: Don't purchase these rings unless you want to be disappointed! When I purchased everything worked. Over the course of 2 years as they worked on the app, they have broken whatever worked for the heart rate and they have also broken how it records your sleep. These features used to work but the heart rate hasn't worked in years so I had to purchase a heart monitor from Polar when I exercise to understand what my heart rate is. Unfortunately you can't track it because that information isn't stored so the ring is useless for the heart rate. For sleep, multiple days a week it tells me I slept for 2-3 hours when I know I was asleep for closer to 7. If you're familiar with these rings they show movement while you're in bed and for hours when it says I'm awake there is no corresponding movement. When I sent them the data and asked them to replace the ring they gave me basic instructions that I already had in my settings - done. It continued to happen so I sent it again. Now they say that there must be micro-movements in my finger or hand that the ring is sensing and therefor it thinks I am awake. So, it's enough movement for the ring to think I am awake but it records no data? When you give feedback via the ring they never want to take responsibility that it may be the app. This ring used to work and now it does not. Plain and simple. As stated, completely useless for heart rate during exercise. I could be killing myself and my Polar heart rate shows that I am and my ring looks no different than when I am walking around my house. As mentioned above sleep is useless now as well. Purchase another ring until they take responsibility. What is it good for? Counting your steps... that's pretty much it. If you're hoping to get good sleep or exercise data look elsewhere.
Author: Deborah Pashkoff

Title: Love it
Content: Love it! The ring looks nice and the app is easy to use. I mainly got it to track my sleep and it gives me detailed insight overall health. Best part is no monthly fee!
Author: Evan Moser

Title: Never received ring sizing kit
Content: Never received ring sizing kit, was never resent, canceled order because of the sizing kit not arriving.
Author: Lela Marich

Title: The Color on my Rose Gold Ring started…
Content: The Color on my Rose Gold Ring started to vanish. I gifted it to my Mom, and how embarrassing I can feel.
Author: Neil Patel

Title: The sleep tracking is very much off
Content: The sleep tracking is very much off. The app experience is below the average. Bad return policy. Not recommended.
Author: Maria Filonova

Title: Great ring
Content:
I struggle with wearing a watch so wanted a discreet ring without an expensive subscription.

The ring came quickly, and support has been good. It does everything I need, waterproof in the pool, i dont notice wearing it, no subscription to pay and no technical issues over the last 2 years.

Only small downside is the little sensors leak a little light at night, but not enough to stop me wearing it.

I would recommend this ring (and frequently do!)
Author: Zee

Title: Motivational
Content: I’ve had my ring 3 weeks and am very happy with it. It helps keep me on track with my steps and workout routine. It has given me the motivation to stick to my workouts and each week I try to work a little harder to beat my scores from previous week.
Author: Sue Martino

Title: Horrible customer service and delivery…
Content: Horrible customer service and delivery times are way off what was advertised. After several follow ups due to it being late they offered a 10$ ! Credit and never even credited it. They don’t know what they are doing
Author: Omar Elshrief

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Date of experience: June 11, 2025
Author: Louis Musetti

Title: The ring is thin and doesn’t scratch…
Content: The ring is thin and doesn’t scratch which is nice, however so far their cycle tracking isn’t that great which is kind of a bummer I wish it would tell me if I’m ovulating or not. I shouldn’t have to interpret the data myself! And the steps seems to way over shoot my actual steps so I’m not sure what’s going on there. Overall 50/50 for the price.
Author: Lauren Wisniewski

Title: I love the RingConn
Content: I love the RingConn! I am an MRI Technologist and it slightly pulls in the room, however, it still has great battery life. The app is great. If anything, it would be cool to have it count the average steps per week. Other than that, I love all of the sleep features, etc.
Author: Christine McDay

Title: New awareness about what helps my…
Content: New awareness about what helps my health and what hurts. I see more functionality is coming which is great! EZ to use, keeps a charge for a long time. I have recommended it to many friends. I do wish I could use it longer in the water - I'd like to wear it while I am in Water Aerobics, but that is a 50 minute class...
Author: Henrietta Currier

Title: Needs improvement on steps/exercise
Content: Would like to see improvements on the step/exercise feature. This ring needs to have exercise "activated" before each workout. If you forget to activate it, the steps are not counted which means that regular activities are not as accurate.
Author: P.R.

Title: The ring is far superior to others it’s…
Content: The ring is far superior to others it’s type
Author: Sandra B Abrams

Title: Excellent support
Content: I always receive timely and friendly responces by the team.
Author: RA

Title: RingConn has great customer service
Content: RingConn has great customer service, fast and dependable shipping and an interactive / easy app to use!
Author: Victoria Reed

Title: I’m glad i went with the RingConn after…
Content: I’m glad i went with the RingConn after extensive research. It’s 10/10 and it looks stunning.
Author: Yalina

Title: Ring won’t charge so had no use for it…
Content: Ring won’t charge so had no use for it a piece of junk
Author: Jeff Mobley

Title: My order took over a month to get to my…
Content: My order took over a month to get to my house.
Author: Anja Kleiman

Title: Now significant improvement between 1st & 2nd generation
Content: After a few months I don’t really see a difference between 1st & 2nd generation ring. I recently had a VO2/metabolic assessment, and we found the ring data to be inconsistent. The HR regularly registers way below actual heart rate. I also have found the gold ring to be too shiny for my preference.
Author: Bill D

Title: Love it, but not 5 stars yet
Content: I like the sleek new design, but there have been a few instances where I thought it wasn't quite as accurate as the Gen 1. Also, I wish it could track cardio activities such as swimming.
Author: Libby Odom

Title: Bought two more device
Content: Bought two more device, install was easy and they work perfectly. Very happy with my purchase
Author: David

Title: Love this ring
Content: I like the ring and the app. The app gives me insight on how many calories I’m burning and how many steps I do a day. Great for tracking your fitness and detects when I’m sleeping very well.
Author: Kaylee

Title: After months of waiting
Content: After months of waiting, no size 10 in any color available. Asked for options to newer rings. Nothing offered. Refunded my order. Hard to continue receiving email blasts asking me how I like my Ring. ?!?!
Author: SS

Title: Worth the price
Content: The ring’s hardware and the associated software are amazing, and highly recommended. Only issue I have is I ordered the black ring, and I already have a wear spot. They did send a “cover” with my purchase for free, but who wants a rubbery plastic cover on their ring? A bit more durable paint, and this is a five star all day item.
Author: Michael

Title: Bad experience
Content: I ordered my ring a month ago . It’s sitting in the same place for more than 2 weeks. I paid for express shipping. This is ridiculous. I’ve called multiple times and all they tell me is that they will resubmit the information to the shipper. There has been no progress at all. I’m really disappointed with how this is being handled. I would love to have this ring and it’s frustrating that Ring Conn isn’t helping.
Author: Daisy Contreras Cruz

Title: Amazing customer service and the ring…
Content: Amazing customer service and the ring is incredible only downside is that I have had it for two weeks and it’s already has some very noticeable scratches. Apart from that amazing product
Author: Isabelle Armour

Content: Really wonderful customer service. No problems with the ring so far - I have been wearing it consistently for two weeks. Doesn’t get in the way and I like the metrics they provide it’s really interesting and there’s AI to help summarize, interpret, and create plans for you based off your goals and data. Recommended this to a friend after having it for a week and she bought it and loves it!!!
Author: Jasmine

Title: Great Product
Content: Just a great product and at a competitive price in what is a reasonably new market
Author: Ian Wardrope

Title: Great product.
Content: My ring shipped on time. It's a great device. I wear it all the time.
Author: Terri Prince

Title: Love my ring!
Content: Love my ring! Didn’t know my size so I got the sizing kit… super easy to wear and get a feel for different sizes. Absolutely love wearing my ring. I got it for sleep and it is definitely making me more aware of areas I need to improve. Reading reviews I was worried about the app but I actually find it easy to use and better than expected!
Author: Holly

Title: i love it!!
Content: i love it!!! definitely more for “lifestyle” not really for like tracking workouts, i love it tho!! i still use my apple watch to track my workouts
Author: jack

Title: hard to set up should be easy to…
Content: hard to set up should be easy to integrate with app
Author: Landon Derk

Title: What I like about this ring is no…
Content: What I like about this ring is no monthly fee, battery life, motives to be more active, easy to use. One thing I hope they update is more options when at the gym or on the elliptical machine.
Author: Arthur McCue

Title: Love it
Content: Absolutely amazing and very accurate.
Author: Omar Daher

Title: This Ring has kept me informed of the…
Content: This Ring has kept me informed of the functions of my body. Lets me know things that important and I would have missed.
Author: Consumer Name

Title: only more exercises missing
Content: Like it, helps a lot for personal insides
Author: Andreas Dolscheid

Title: Ring works, room for improvement.
Content:
Ring works, sleep apnea requires your phone nearby, so the ring itself doesnt really do the sleep apnea monitoring all by itself.
The main issue I have is the ring size, it was slightly bigger than the ring sizing kit.
Ring protector works, but it looks shit and easily comes off. Kind of annoying.
Author: Jun Neo

Title: Customer Service
Content: The customer service was amazing. Everyone I spoke to/dealt with was more than helpful.
Author: Lauren Barnes

Title: Works as advertised
Content: Works as advertised. It’s nice to have the health information the ring provides.
Author: Leo

Title: Good product! No purchase regrets.
Content:
The ring tracks quite a bit of data and I am impressed with how much data is collected. I use the HRV, HR and SPO2 as an indicator of my health and I am starting to use the sleep numbers more as indicators. The SP02 appears to be low as compared to data from a hospital device.

I do not pay any attention to the number of steps because of the inaccuracies. This is an area for improvement.
Author: Parks

Title: Amazing tool for health.
Content: Amazing tool for my health. Great app to track your health. Ring is very comfortable.
Author: ARMATOS

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Helping with epilepsy
Content: Had the ring for nearly one month and using it to help understand my son's seizures as many of them occur during the night. As he also has a high level intellectual disability he is unable to explain how he feels to help us understand his health better. The ring has proved to be incredibly helpful with fantastic insights and stats that we were unaware of, and we can use this information going forward to help manage his seizures.
Author: rick bryant

Title: I looked into other smart rings and…
Content: I looked into other smart rings and decided to go for this one because it had the best value for its price. It’s a bonus to have the Ring Conn look even sleeker than the other brands too! It has been helpful in providing daily insights, but I just wish the app would give us more options to explore or understand our health. It already does that, but I’m seeking more in depth - such as making more sense of the data and providing suggestions or automatically making reports or comparisons to previous data. I have been recommending this ring to everyone I know because it looks great, it feels comfortable, and it does not make me feel obsessive over the measurements on the app. Overall, the biggest buy-in for me is the price is unbeatable for its quality (especially not needing a subscription) - I actually feel that I have the better version of the smart rings.
Author: Cait

Title: I absolutely love the no subscription…
Content: I absolutely love the no subscription and how it tracks everything and gives you your own plan.
Author: Tayla Danizio

Title: The Best Choice to Monitor Sleep Apnea
Content: Since this was a gift for my husband and I didn't know his ring size, the fact that I first received a sizing kit was especially helpful. I wanted one to specifically monitor sleep apnea, and very grateful to have chosen RingConn. It has worked so well that my husband has recommended it to friends who have ordered it as well. My husband is a hell, so he is particularly amazed at the long battery life. Overall, great experience and great monitoring with no additional subscription needed.
Author: Stacy

Title: Great ring overall
Content:
While most of the various features seem to agree with my OnePlus 2R smartwatch, the daily steps can be wildly different at various times of the day. It records steps when I'm simply sitting in my chair and reading a book or watching TV. I've tried different fingers on both hands and results are pretty much the same. Other features like sleep, heart rate, blood oxygen, etc seem to be accurate though.

Sizing and overall quality of the ring is spot on and the battery lasts for around 10 days as advertised. Overall, I'm very happy I bought it and I wear it everyday. Highly recommended!
Author: Michael Berrey

Title: Very good device / Poor delivery service
Content:
The Good: The product is a very good device, it is beautiful, lightweight and the app is verycomplete and easy to use. My wife it happy with it.

The Bad thing: It took forever to arrive, support told me (they assured me) it would take 12 days, but it took almost a month to get the sizing kit and another 25 days to get the final ring. It was a birthday gift for early June and I finally received it until July.
Author: Gerardo Venegas

Title: Great Staff
Content: The staff was extremely responsive and willing to answer any question i posed.
Author: Richard Landreth

Title: A superb non subscription based ring wellness tracker
Content: The ringconn 2 does everything I want in a wellness tracker. It looks sleek, is durable, waterproof, and has a fantastic battery life. I started using it because it feels awkward wearing a watch on one arm and a tracker on the other. Really couldn't be happier, only small gripe I have is that it deducts too many points from your sleep score when you go over 8 hours! No subscriptions.
Author: R Rush

Title: Ordering was easy
Content: Ordering was easy, glad to get a ring sizer prior. However half sizes would have been helpful. Ring is slightly loose and spins a bit on finger. None of the sizes really seemed perfect. However, I am wearing my ring 24/7 and loving the important info. It is motivating me to up my activity levels. It gives me key insights into my sleep stages. I knew I was a poor sleeper, but trying like heck to improve my REM sleep. The ring is my guide to see what helps in that area. All in all, I'm happy to have purchased. Hope in future to get one that reads heart rhythms if that's a thing.
Author: Judy

Title: Accurate, efficient, simple
Content: While at the doctors office for a checkup, we checked the accuracy of the Oximeter and the heart beats per minute, they were exactly the same as with the doctors instruments.the sleep apnea tool has shown me that the sleep doctor I have been going to was prescribing a Cpap machine, not for my safety but for his pocket book. Simple nose strips would have worked better and far cheaper. I was able to monitor my oxygen levels consistently through the night without wires and masks strapped to me. Thank you!
Author: Stan

Title: I absolutely love my ring
Content: I absolutely love my ring! It's easy to wear, fun to track, battery last as long as they said it would. My only complaints it scratches and the protective covers I bought separately aren't smooth and make wearing them annoying. I would highly recommend it and already have to several of my friends.
Author: Juliette Osborne

Title: Don't have next action for improve health.
Content: Ringconn can only track behaviour but can't help you improve your health.
Author: rr

Title: Good reliable company and delivers on time
Content: The purchase process was simple being all online with Amazon , goods arrived as expected and no issues so far
Author: Kevin Malone

Title: Great for 12Months. Died As soon as warranty ran out.
Content:
Product WAS great, and also the initial customer service. Good response time etc. however, after just over a year, coincidently the battery of the ring went from lasting easily 6 days to less than 12 hours, 13 months after purchase. The 12 month warranty had ran out and around the same time they had just released the 2nd gen ring. All seems way too much of a coincidence, especially when after contacting customer service they said there was nothing they could do except give me a promo code to purchase the 2nd gen ring with $90 off.
After replying with my concerns about the timing of the ring batteries life span dropping off dramatically so quickly, I asked about guarantees and that if I bought a 2nd gen ring how do I know after 13months the same thing wouldn’t happen again? Or when a 3rd gen ring comes out?…. Obviously I had no helpful response, just a reply from an automated service. Disappointing after being so happy with the product for the first 12 Months.
Author: Reece

Title: Gen 2- love it
Content: Gen 2- love it. Need a half size but got some cheap ring sizing stickers on Amazon that work great. Love the sleep tracking and overall activity level vs Apple Watch needing to meet specific move criteria. Ring looks like regular jewelry, is comfortable, and can wear it for everything.
Author: Meg O

Title: I like the ring
Content: I like the ring. I did not give the 5 stars because even though I like the gen 2 air it seems like a downgrade in some ways from my gen 1 which was titanium and had the portable charger. The ring works fine.
Author: Patrick Siglin

Title: Product is good, customer service is not.
Content: I got my ring sizing kit super fast, then put in my size, it took about a week to get my ring which is fine. I then ordered a separate charger. I got charged for it but never received it due to RingConn not paying the correct shipping for it. I reached out to get either the charger or a refund but just keep getting ignored. Not a fan of the customer service.
Author: Jordann

Title: I really enjoy the ring and the data…
Content: I really enjoy the ring and the data acquired. Shipping took almost a month for me to get my ring. Other than that so far so good. The ring has a good battery life, lasting around 10 days before having to be charged again.
Author: Kristina Stephens

Title: The step counter is way off and…
Content: The step counter is way off and ringconn refuses to address that by either replacing or accepting a return. Expected better of a company that trying to establish itself in the fitness ring world.
Author: Apurva baddur

Title: I lost my ringconn on a golf course
Content: I lost my ringconn on a golf course. As I read through the owner's manual I noticed you had a replacement program. So, I emailed customer support and went through the process of ordering a new one at a discounted price. Happy ending.
Author: James D

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Good purchase
Content: Used sizing kit, was helpful and right on. Easy set up and good information provided, bought it mostly for sleep monitoring. Charging last a long time and comfortable to wear. 3 weeks wearing it and very happy.
Author: Char Wegner

Title: Be careful what version you buy.
Content: The website and ads indicated the Gen2 can monitor for sleep apnea. The Gen2 Air does not. The ring does not do what I bought it for. Otherwise okay.
Author: John

Title: Happy with my purchase
Content: Hi, the purchase process was fast, I got firstly the size kit, then the ring and now I am using it successfuly, so far everything is as expected!
Author: Nicoleta Daianu

Title: Taken over a month, no ring
Content: I ordered this ring a month ago now, still have not received. I have been in touch with the company and they have offered me a $20 rebate for the ring taking over a month. I mentioned to them 6% off isn't really much, and they said IF it takes another week on top of all this time, they will offer me $30.... wow. Thanks...
Author: Becca Couture

Title: The ring is light and working well
Content:
The ring is light and working well! The app is as expected for not paying a monthly fee. Links nicely into my apple health app.
Overall really happy without the large cost of its biggest competitor.
Author: tania Allison

Title: Love the ring!
Content: So far, I love the ring! It does a good job at tracking my steps, sleeping habits, and my stress levels! I feel silly because the website suggested I buy the bundle deal.. but, now have an extra charger that wasnt needed.
Author: Marie King

Title: It literally took forever to get the…
Content: It literally took forever to get the sample rings sent to me around a month. That is ridiculously long time. Once I chose the size I wanted the ring arrived quite promptly. So far I am enjoying it but need to spend more time analyzing. It isn't recognizing my naps or certain stressful events.
Author: Daisy Blumensaat

Title: Promising but not exactly there
Content:
I understand it is more a wellness ring than a fitness ring, but I have experienced accuracy issues with any heart rate higher than 90. I have confirmed ring fit and sizing and still experience the issue.

The app could use further development as well, as the AI portion is not smoothed out yet and some of the data is a bit rough around the edges. This will hopefully come with time though!

Other than this, the battery life is great, style and looks are wonderful, and charging case effective.
Author: Franklin

Title: Slow delivery...
Content: It took me 1 month back and forth with customer service. But the ring is still not delivered to me
Author: Jhih-Yuan Chang

Title: I didn't receive the ring
Content: Date of experience: June 10, 2025
Author: Karla Ortiz

Title: You expect me to give you personal…
Content: You expect me to give you personal account information so you can refund $$. Why you can't return the $$ on the cc it was purchased on. You can't provide me with the size ring and expect me to pay out more $$ to get the next gen ring and giving me a $30 discount are you crazy. You already have at least $200 already
Author: customer

Title: I love this Ring
Content:
I love this Ring!
It fits so perfect on my finger and the thinner design makes it not look like you're wearing a typical smart ring. The app is so easy to use and follow, I love being able to see my data in real time and use the app for help on my next goals.
Author: Sydney Adelstein

Title: My order took 2 weeks to ship
Content: My order took 2 weeks to ship. Then it was the wrong size so I had to exchange it. They made me pay $15 to have it shipped back. And they kept saying they were gonna send ring protectors and they never did. It was completely frustrating dealing with them and I will not ever order from them again. Terrible experience and I will be sharing with social media.
Author: Nicole Mottu

Title: I love it!
Content: Ordering was easy, they sent the sizing kit, then sent a link to go in and update the size so they could send the correct ring. I love wearing it, it is light, and I love all the information it is gathering!
Author: Lori

Title: I used the ring conn sizer to get my…
Content: I used the ring conn sizer to get my perfect fit. The ring fit exactly like the sizer, I was worried because other reviews claimed the opposite. I believe it to be accurate with the overnight spo2 readings and the heart rate as well. One tiny drawback is the ring sometimes thinks I’m asleep when I’m sitting quietly and watching tv in the evenings. So sometimes I’ll take it off then so I don’t get inaccurate sleep details. Or you can edit sleep time. Overall I’m happy with my purchase.
Author: Kare

Title: Responsive customer support
Content: Date of experience: June 06, 2025
Author: Maarten Meinders

Title: Great service, great product
Content:
After ordering the wrong product on first attempt the service team was great at helping me return the product and get a refund so I could then get the correct product. The RingConn Gen 2 is a great product, providing a large number of health data, including the sleep apnoe information,, which were important for me.
I can only recommend the company and the product!
Author: Grimrock

Title: I didn’t like the ring and I emailed…
Content: I didn’t like the ring and I emailed asking to return and never got a response
Author: Gh

Title: Love this ring
Content: Love this ring, it is super slim and tracks everything pretty well! My only complaint is that it doesn’t do a good job tracking workouts but that’s ok.
Author: Charlotte Smith

Title: it‘s reliable and precise
Content: Date of experience: June 06, 2025
Author: Raphael Kühne

Title: Lack of possibility to return the ring…
Content: Lack of possibility to return the ring in the first 2-4 weeks after buy and/or replace it with different size is a big turn off and No-No. Not sure how is this compliant with european regulations. Would not recommend to anybody.
Author: populistic

Title: Good app send useful overall
Content: Date of experience: June 06, 2025
Author: brendon Dorgan

Title: Aside from the restocking fee (which is…
Content: Aside from the restocking fee (which is understandable) the customer service was great! I did order the ring sizer first and the ring itself was a little bigger than what the sizer told me to get so I did have to return it but the process was very quick and easy!
Author: Katelyn Roberts

Title: So far very happy with my ring ◡̈
Content: So far very happy with my ring ◡̈
Author: Jessica

Title: Love the ring
Content: Love the ring. The metrics are great. I'd like to see more workout tracking options on the app., specifically strength training or HIIT.
Author: JoJo C.

Title: Buy it off Amazon.
Content: I ordered my RingConn on June 10. Received it on June 28th. The ring is too small even after using the sizer they recommend you getting. They said there is a slight difference in the ring sizer and the actual ring. What the hell? Then why have me get it? Make the sample sizes accurate. I have been trying to exchange it for a bigger size for 3 days now. They send you the print out and the shipping label separately so you have to wait. The exchange processes is horrible. I’m so annoyed, I should have bought this off Amazon. You get one free return with them. I had to pay $15 to start the return. I waited almost a month for this and now it’s been 4 days and I’m still waiting to exchange. Their email tells me to send back the ring but keep the accessories. Um, the accessories are for a size 7 and they are size specific! I have emailed them back letting them know I’m sending the entire package back so I hope they don’t just send me a ring without the accessories.
Author: shawn liu

Title: Very easy website to read and order…
Content: Very easy website to read and order products.
Author: Brenda Alvarado

Title: Bad Tracking
Content:
The ring does work well. Terrible exercise tracking which then throws off recommendations for the day including decreasing stress, sleep, activity etc.
There is incorrect cycle tracking with no ability to use for conception as there is with Oura etc.
The app is not helpful and repetitive.
Author: Tamara

Title: Great, but flawed
Content:
Great: sleep tracking, solid app, pattern recognition
Horrible: no automatic sports tracking. No setting for continuous measuring.
Author: FEN NI

Title: Love it!
Content: I am loving this ring! So glad I went with RingConn over Oura. There is so much information provided that I still haven't digested it all. Huge plus that there are no subscription fees. Battery is superb so far.
Author: Kim

Title: It works
Content: It works, better then Samsung ring
Author: Jack Leaming

Title: I love my RingConn Gen 2
Content:
I love my RingConn Gen 2. It tracks accurately and is comfortable to wear as well as stylish design.
It arrived quickly and Customer Support is excellent
Thank you
Author: Barry Cochran

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service, ring is great size compared to first Gen. Love it. Looking forward to the future of ringconn
Author: Andy Beavan

Title: Overall the ringconn is good
Content: Overall love the ringconn so far. Lightweight, not bulky so it doesn’t bother me to wear it- and I’m not a ring wearer. The data is good and responsive. My main complaint is that I used the sizing kit and my ring fits too big- so the sizing kit isn’t necessarily accurate. It was going to be a big hassle with the company to exchange - they wanted all of these videos and photos comparing the ring to the sizer and my finger, plus the original shipping took a long time so I ended up not exchanging and just keeping the ring and getting a spacer to wear with it for a better fit. For something so expensive I would have liked a better customer service and exchange process. My only other complaint is that you can’t wear it to workout so it cannot replace fitness tracking watches.
Author: Natasha Samounty

Title: This ring is easy to use
Content: This ring is easy to use, connects well, and the charging case is par to none for its convenience and long battery life. Top that off with the free app and I really was happy with this purchase
Author: Tamara Downs

Title: Delivery took almost a month and other issues
Content: Delivery took almost a month. On homepage when entering the size the color of the ring is set to the standard (silver) and therefore I received the wrong color. After writing with the CS I did not receive any proposal on how to correct this. So basically a bad experience for this amount of money spent.
Author: Mario

Title: Works as promised.
Content: Works as promised.
Author: Rodney Smothers

Title: Poor experience overall
Content: The shipment was quite slow to arrive and then the ring came out larger than the sizing kit. I emailed right away to ask if I could exchange the size and the response was completely unhelpful, they basically refused to exchange it asking to try different fingers which obviously I have done and they recommend the index finger anyway. They wanted photo/video proof I had used the sizing kit but I used this at a shop in Hong Kong on holiday so I couldn't provide this because at that time I didn't know it would be needed. In addition, the activity tracking is super limited, and the item already has scratches after 10 days of wear even though I have not been doing anything other than desk work and walking exercise. Overall I think the product and service is poor for the price you pay.
Author: Olivia Wolfheart

Title: Love the ring, customer service stellar
Content: Love the ring. It does everything I need it to do. The only thing I wish they would improve would be to add more exercise types. I had a temperature sensor start malfunctioning and got an alert on the app. I reached out to customer service and they immediately sent me a replacement. Top notch customer service!
Author: Dustin Jones

Title: Good Customer Service
Content: I ordered the original ring v.1 knowing it had limited stock and unfortunately by the time I was able to size my finger and finish the process it was out of stock. Customer service took care of me with a discount on the new v.2 of the ring. I will buy from RingConn again when the time to upgrade comes.
Author: Derek McClintock

Title: Very pleased with my smart ring
Content:
The company is very responsive and accurate on their awesome product description. In my case, the battery lasts about ten days. It detects and registers not only my nighttime sleep but naps too. When I have intimate relationships, my heartbeat rate goes way up. It's just an example proving that it's no sham.
It's waterproof, washing hands or showering with it, no problem!
There are no recurrent subscription fees, which is amazing. In short, highly recommended!
Author: Pavel QR

Title: Great and Fast Delivery to Philippines…
Content: Great and Fast Delivery to Philippines without any additional fees.
Author: Anony

Title: I was disappointed that i can’t wear it…
Content: I was disappointed that i can’t wear it when playing tennis.
Author: Jean

Title: Great data points
Content: Type of data provided is a great tool with no additoanl subscription costs.
Author: TG

Title: Quick and Effective!
Content: They listened to the issues and determined very quickly that a replacement was the best option, then shipped one out within 12 hours. It arrived 2 days later and I was able to ship my old ring back :)
Author: Dalin Perkins

Title: Best solution ... A ring
Content: So easy to use. 9 Days without charging. Great
Author: Anett Morgenroth

Title: Love the statistics I get and that it…
Content: Love the statistics I get and that it tells me when I woke up throughout the night!
Author: Brianna Farmer

Title: Excellent!!!
Content: Excellent!!!! Awesome customer service
Author: MANUEL A GUANZON

Title: Amazing ring!
Content: Amazing ring!
Author: Daniela Ramirez Aguero

Title: Listened and assisted with trouble…
Content: Listened and assisted with trouble shooting. When trouble shooting didn’t work they exchanged rings
Author: Stephanie Baglio

Title: This ring is awesome
Content:
This ring is awesome
There are many more insights about sleep and my activity throughout the day. I have also found that it seems to be much more accurate than my Fitbit.
It's very comfortable. My fingers swell at night, so I have to remove my rings when I sleep, but I do not have to remove this one.
Author: Kendra Clark

Title: Good Tracker
Content: Product is great so far, tracking is much more accurate than my previous option. The shipping of the product was much slower than I would've liked.
Author: PK

Title: I bought this ring more because of the…
Content: I bought this ring more because of the price point. At first it was amazing! But I did not like the fact that it didn’t track weight lifting, only runs and walks. Then not even two months in it completely died on me and didn’t hold a charge at all.
Author: Shelby

Title: Horrible customer service/company will not respond
Content: I have been trying to return my ring for well over a month now I keep getting told the company will contact me and that is yet to happen. The customer service people say they cannot help me that the company has to reach out to me to give me an address of where to return product too so far I have never heard from anybody I have called. I have written and nothing is being done to help me horrible customer service
Author: david

Title: RingConn's customer service team is…
Content: RingConn's customer service team is exceptionally good. They gave clear and timely instructions on troubleshooting and did not hesitate to do the right thing when the issue couldn't be resolved. I've bought 4 rings from RingConn for friends and family and will buy more given how good their customer service is!
Author: Dr Dave

Title: Customer service experience with warranty/replacement
Content: After having my gen 2 ring, it suddenly started to drop bluetooth connectivity. It was no longer connecting to my phone. I had the habit of taking off my ring to wash dishes, my hands and when applying any lotions and couldnt understand why it just stopped working. I reached out to Ringconn for support and I was happy that I was offered a replacement ring at no cost because it fell under their warranty coverage. However, the return process has been a nightmare and on going for the last two weeks. I was shipped a replacement in the incorrect color. I've received responses via e-mail where they are also responding back regarding sending me the correct color which they keep referring to as silver when indeed my ring color is gold.
Author: Jessica Camacho

Title: Expensive and unreliable
Content: Expensive and unreliable. Bought a ring and wore for just over a year. Took perfect care of the device but it failed just outside the warranty period. Ringconn offered a 100 dollar discount on a new ring. That would still cost over two hundred to replace a one year old device! Poor quality, poor customer service.
Author: Steve Mole

Title: The app is easy to use
Content: The app is easy to use, they get a positive for no subscription fees. Only place they lose a point would be from tracking workouts, it only has the ability to track cardio workouts so if you are looking for something more, I'd skip. Excellent for sleep, stress and cycle tracking.
Author: Ocean

Title: More activity tracking
Content: Love the activity information coming from the ring. I do wish there were more choices other than outdoor indoor running and walking. How about fitness classes, lifting weights, etc.?
Author: mrspagsicloud.com

Title: Simple
Content: Simple, quick, kind. What more could you ask for as a client ?
Author: Anne Windmoller

Title: The battery life is amazing…
Content: I really like how light weight but strong the ring feels. The battery life is amazing and the charging case works well. The information in the app is easy to access and to read.

Title: I chose the wrong size and support was…
Content: I chose the wrong size and support was quick to answer my email and get the right size before it shipped. Answered all my questions.
Author: Elizabeth Gotay

Title: Save your money - don’t buy.
Content: I have been using the ring for a couple of months now and I don’t think it’s worth the price. It doesn’t track anything properly and doesn’t deliver on the claims/promises it makes. Save your money and don’t get it or get another brand if you really want a smart ring.
Author: J M

Title: Good ring for tracking your information.
Content: It's working great. Keeping track of steps, stress and etc.
Author: Wendy Mazzie

Title: Good quality
Content:
The ring is pretty good, metrics plentiful & accuracy seems to mirror Apple Watch for vitals. The charge is good, and the portable charging case come in handy while on the go for multiple days.

Downside; the workout options are sorely lacking and it does not seem to have functional read/write ability to Apple
Author: VC

Title: The ring was well delivered this time.
Content: The ring was well delivered this time.
Author: René MILOT

Title: Great data
Content: I love the look and fit of this ring. It’s true to size with the sizing guide. The data has been accurate and interesting after about 5 weeks. My only negative point is that it seems to scratch quite easily. I have purchased the ring covers which I use for certain activities, and it’s still pretty scratched for 5 weeks in.
Author: Mallory B

Title: Great fit and design for the ring…
Content: Great fit and design for the ring itself but app needs improvement. Need to add more workouts. Simple general workouts will do. Like weight training, cross fit, free training, treadmill etc.
Author: Edward

Title: fast shipping
Content:
fast shipping
nice ring
Author: zazie lucassen

Title: Love the idea of the ring
Content: Love the idea of the ring. Somethings to note. It gets scratched very easily and I'm not expecting it to look great a year from now. Also there are no postpartum or pregnancy setting for the fertility tracking which would improve the data for sure. Over all its comfortable and the battery is wonderful.
Author: Molly

Title: Solid.
Content: The shipping took a while but the quality and battery life of the ring is really good. The only thing is that I wish it tracked more workouts. The app is easy to use.
Author: Carla

Title: Does what it says it’ll do!
Content: Works as described, even while wearing it on my thumb. Well priced, although I’d prefer if it were not made in China. Enters sleep mode automatically and readings are accurate.
Author: Liz

Title: Support extremely supportive!
Content: The support people are extremely helpful. I had a problem with the battery in my Ring Gen 2. They did some troubleshooting with me but, when that didn't work, they sent me a replacement ring before I returned my old ring.
Author: njf

Title: Super happy with it
Content: Super happy with the rings performance, only con is that it could use more exercise options
Author: Allie S

Title: Overall not bad
Content: Overall not bad, step count could be more accurate.
Author: Vida

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, works well, feels comfortable and isn’t heavy. Nice sizing and overall process.
Author: Kristen Zuco

Title: Excellent support
Content: Excellent support. Ordered the wrong ring size and RingConn took care of me very quickly. My experience, the ring size kit is true to fit. I am very happy with the performance of my new ring and would highly recommend this product to anyone
Author: mssr

Title: The ring is providing just what I was…
Content: The ring is providing just what I was looking for with the benefit of not having to pay for a subscription with no benefit.
Author: DebP

Title: Best Smart ring I have tried
Content: The company is responsive when I email them or submit feedback via the app, usually responding within 3 business days. There are frequent updates as they roll out new features and/or fix bugs. The ring battery lasts me about 9 days (with daily exercise mode) and I wear it constantly. I also walk about an hour a day and the battery holds up well in exercise mode. I did an interview when they were rolling out the women's health, and they sent me a thank you gift that was beautiful and well packaged. I like the data and how it is presented in graphs.
Author: Debbie

Title: Great Ring
Content: Great Ring. Does a great job tracking sleep. Very comfortable. So much better to sleep in than a watch.
Author: KP

Content: The RingConn has helped me better assess my sleep more than any other device has! I highly suggest this ring since there’s no monthly fee & the app shows some fun stuff coming on the horizon for the already existing ring!

Title: Good product
Content:
Company was quick to respond to my questions.
It took a little bit to get my ring; however was well worth the wait. Fantastic battery life and great information.
My husband wants to switch from his Oura and get one of these.
Ring fits true to size using their ring guide.

Title: Still relatively adjusting but so far…
Content: Still relatively adjusting but so far everything has been as great as i expected. The only thing is that the app doesn’t take temp on demand- only when sleeping. Other than that- i love the purchase.

Title: The best fitness tracker I’ve used!
Content: Date of experience: May 19, 2025
Author: Mark Lambourne

Title: Ring is nice, app syncing with others could be better
Content: Product seems to be well thought out. Slim and comfortable to wear. Wear it working out and to sleep and does not distract me at all. Would have given it a solid 5 stars if the data could be synced with other apps easier. Data is more useful when combined with other sources.
Author: David M

Title: Good experience
Content: good product. shipping took a while but happy with the Ring
Author: Brian Raymond

Title: Deceptive and Sketchy Company!
Content: The gold ring featured on the website was not the color I received. It was a completely different ring! The women I spoke to on the phone even confirmed there was a difference in color and said it is a common complaint. That is deceptive marketing and extremely sketchy! I also have yet to receive my refund for the ring. Followed all the difficult return instructions and still no refund.
Author: Caitlin

Title: The ring is doing everything I wanted…
Content: The ring is doing everything I wanted it to do and more
Author: Jeanne Kerbs

Title: Awesome ring and service
Content: The ring works great and battery is lasting 9 days. I found the information recorded to be very similar to my Samsung Watch. The sizing is the same as the one from the sizing kit. Delivery was pretty quick to Australia. Great product and service!

Title: Good Design
Content: Everything looks fine.

Content: Product has a long battery life, seems pretty accurate, looks amazing and comfortable to wear daily.

Title: One ring rule all them all
Content: Great Ring with style and light to wear. Track all my health information.

Title: It is pretty accurate compared to my…
Content: It is pretty accurate compared to my Apple Watch. I wish it integrated with apps I.e peloton or any fitness app. Thinner than most rings on the market. Limited workout options. Love the sleep analysis

Title: good product
Content: good product. delivery took long and was a bit stressed about the local delivery company

Title: I love this ring
Content: I love this ring but more than that I love the customer service help that is given. They have gone above and beyond to help me.

Size could be a half size smaller but the lower size would have been too tight in the summer heat - swelling of fingers.

Title: My ring came quick

Content: Many things to like about this ring - comfortable, excellent battery life, free app with great info, overall performs it consistently well. I like the workout tracking for walking/running and how it shows distance and path. Would like to see more workout options, e.g., yoga, strength training, just to keep record of those workouts as well.

Content: Easy and comfortable to wear & battery life is great!

Content: Easy to use and understand. Love this product.

Title: Love the ring for the most part
Content: Love the ring for the most part. The exercise category could use some improvement. There’s not many exercises to choose from (run, walk, cycle) and it does not transfer data from Apple health. It looks as if I haven’t exercised when I weight lift because I don’t wear the ring, but I would have that data if it successfully gathered information from Apple health.
Author: Nittany

Title: Love their products
Content:
Love their products!
Customer service was great.
Author: Styles

Title: Good ring
Content: Overall it’s a great ring but would have like for it to have little reminders of when I’m fertile, that would help the ladies when trying to conceive.
Author: Jacqueline Isidoro

Title: Slow starting, but...
Content:
Well, I faced issues with the courier. It took long time to arrive. Then the size is slightly greater then the kit size rings. If I had know, I would order one size less.
That said, it is a good product, I like it more and it is a great travel companion
Author: Giangua

Title: Needs to have a swimming tracking
Content: Needs to have a swimming tracking
Author: Michael Grimmer

Title: Feedback
Content: I have had my RingConn for almost a month (June 15 exact date) with no problems until today. The RingConn will not stay connected to Bluetooth and I have reset it and it’s still doing it. Also, when not in use it stated my heart rate was between 143 to 148. How when it was sitting on the table. Is there something wrong with my ring? Debating on sending it back for a refund.
Author: Beth Mayo

Title: Awesome product!
Content: Comfortable, great fit, long battery life. Tells me a ton of data about my fitness, vitals, sleep quality. Fast shipping and reasonable price too!
Author: Mike P

Title: review
Content: great delivery
Author: Christopher Gonzalez

Title: Almost perfect
Content: The ringconn gen 2 air is almost perfect. The bad thing is the step counter that is way off the reality.
Author: Minas Kapetanidis

Title: Easy to use and been reliable the first…
Content: Easy to use and been reliable the first month!
Author: Nicole Jacobs

Title: I love this ring battery life is long
Content: I love this ring battery life is long , step accuracy is not the greatest but still good , I love the sleep analysis very thorough overall I give this ring a 5 start
Author: Mary

Title: The ring doesn’t accurately track
Content: The ring doesn’t accurately track. It is a waste of money! Just go and get an apple watch for the money and accuracy.
Author: SS

Title: Outstanding Product
Content: Outstanding product - yes, would buy again!
Author: Ken Roff

Title: Excellent.
Content: Date of experience: April 25, 2025
Author: MaNu Sebastin

Title: Love it
Content: Having used smart rings for many years this is so far my favourite. Ring looks nice. App has clear UI. No BS monthly fee or subscription required to access ur data
Author: Judy

Title: It's early but overall very satisfied
Content:
Over all I am very satisfied with the ring. It doesn't have more bells & whistles than necessary. I wish the app was a bit more customizable. I talked to customer service a couple of times for clarification- first time the representative made me feel very confident that the answers they gave were correct. Second time a little different experience but not enough to keep me from ordering. My questions were if the actual ring was the same size as the sizing kit or slightly smaller or bigger. Told slightly smaller, when I got the ring it was actually slightly bigger, very slightly. I went with the size that the sizer was slightly difficult to get over my knuckle. Would have preferred a 1/2 size but informed not available, doesn't hurt to ask. Actual ring slides a bit too easy a 1/2 size smaller would have been perfect.
Look forward using this for a lot longer than I used my Fitbit charge6.
Author: for your order

Title: Great ring overall! Just needs some improvements in monitoring workouts.
Content:
This has been a great smart ring! The price is right and I love that the app and plethora of data are both free. The first ring I received was not tracking vitals properly, but RingConn was responsive and sent a replacement ring (it did take a couple of weeks). This ring has been consistently tracking data and I love how many graphs are provided for interpretation. It seems to do a good job with step tracking (at least for trends), but it struggles to accurately monitor my heart rate during rowing workouts. I have automatic workout mode detection on and even set it to an indoor cycling workout, but my heart rate is rarely registers above 110 bpm. It does much better during running workouts.

Women’s health cycle tracking was one of my main reasons for purchasing. It’s very simple, but temperature shifts was all I needed, so this does the job just fine.

Overall, I would definitely recommend the ring!
Author: Karen Linz

Title: My new ring works great
Content: My new ring works great. Its just like it was advertised to be. I'm very happy.
Author: Ken Switzer

Title: Love the ring!!
Content:
Love the ring! This is my 2nd one and would buy it again! Only thing that I would change is I wish I could disable the period tracker. But that's it.
All the other information is great and I use it to stay on top of my health as much as possible!!
Author: Theresa Allred

Title: Room for accuracy improvement
Content: I think the sleep tracking is accurate along with stress. The heart rate is terrible. i did an intense HIIT cycle workout for 15 minutes where I know it is burning at least 100 calories and my ring said it burned 7... and the my BPM is like 75. So that's frustrating that the calorie burn is not accurate and I can't return it even if I wanted to.
Author: Sydney Warren

Title: ring does not count properly steps
Content: ring does not count properly steps. It has huge difference to benchmark devices (like watch, etc) by approximately 20-30% more steps! I compared for already 2 weeks and nothing improves.
Author: Mario

Title: Love it
Content: I love my ring, easy to wear and comfortable. The data is quite accurate beside the period tracker, hence why a four star. The period tracker is a bit off for me and there’s no way to see all the symptoms you’ve put and go back quickly to see them. Maybe it is different for others. Otherwise I absolutely love it. I would loooveeee to have new things on it like caffeine window, hopefully soon ☺️
Author: Vicky

Title: Very responsive and super helpful
Content: Very responsive and super helpful. Having to monitor for several weeks before any action could be completed though was a little difficult.
Author: David Leamy

Title: Blows the competition out of the water!
Content:
Blows the competition out of the water!
The battery life is amazing, only have to charge one every 9 days and it takes about an hour. The fit is great, it's not too thick of a ring and feels and looks great on your finger. My one and only flaw is that it scratches very easily, but I wear this sucker to do everything so that may be on me :)
Author: Melissa Junker

Title: The ring itself is wonderful
Content: The ring itself is wonderful, good metrics, good quality, weight and size. The app is fine too, but i think the AI Partner could be more helpful and personal.
Author: Hugo Flores Oviedo

Title: Please include workouts from Apps Like…
Content: Please include workouts from Apps Like ErgData. Ring works Fine!!!
Author: Burkhard Becker

Title: My wife loves her RingConn
Content: My wife loves her RingConn. The app works great with quick and accurate information, no monthly fees, and the sleek design makes the ring easy to wear all the time. I purchased this for her for mothers day and it was a hit. Would recommend 100% 👌
Author: David DaDalt

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service, a little slow getting back to me but overall great and solved my issues
Author: Louisa Amundsen

Title: I love the ring and the company was…
Content: I love the ring and the company was easy to work with!
Author: Martinez Holly

Title: It fits great on my finger
Content: It fits great on my finger. It has helped me walk more and be more active
Author: SUSAN

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, decent response time from customer service.
Author: Alexia

Title: Fen2 upgrade
Content: Great service in exchanging my Gen1 ring against a Gen2 upgrade.
Author: Achim W

Title: Great product
Content: Great shopping experience. Received my ring quickly. I just adore it. I love everything about it from tracking my steps to my vitals and sleep. It is very comfortable, I don’t even realize it is on. So glad that I bought it. It definitely helps me stay motivated and more in tune with my body.
Author: Danna

Title: Easy to use
Content: Easy to use, setup and delivers everything it promised
Author: venki_ramachandran

Title: Love this ring and battery life!
Content: Date of experience: April 18, 2025

Title: Very good second experience…
Content: Very good like the previous experience when I bought the gen 1❤️
Author: Isa Ferreira

Title: Quick Support
Content: Ordered the Gen 2 Air first, but while waiting for the sizing kit to arrive I decided to go with the Gen 2. Contacted support was able to quickly get a response got the Air cancelled and the Gen 2 ordered.
Author: Trevin

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: The RingConn rings are working…
Content: The RingConn rings are working wonderfully! Long battery life and pretty accurate readings compared to our pixel 3 watches. We both have sleep Apnea and the incite into our sleep history is very helpful! Now, only if the rings could link to our adjustable beds to raise or lower would be even more helpful in getting a good night's rest!
Author: Christopher

Title: Looooooove my ring
Content: Looooooove my ring! I switched from an Apple Watch and it was the best decision ever. My watch was dying all the time and I truly was over getting notifications on my wrist all day but enjoyed the health tracking aspects so kept wearing it. But the ring is sooooo much better. I love tracking my sleep and my cycle. I get excited to wake up and check my sleep score every day. The battery life is amazing. I’ve had the ring about 2 months now and I’ve charged it 3 times for about 30 minutes each and that is all. I also get compliments all the time on how thin the ring is and how my friends with the other big brand wish they had done more research and got this one. 10/10 recommend!
Author: Megan Guymon

Title: I love the diagnostic aspect of the…
Content: I love the diagnostic aspect of the ring and everything it tells me about my health.
Author: LesleyO

Title: I got a Ringconn for my birthday last…
Content: I got a Ringconn for my birthday last August. The reason I chose it is because this ring is one of the few that doesn't charge you a monthly subscription charge. I think the app is robust and it tracks a bunch of good information and feedback. My wife liked it so much she asked for one for her birthday, so that is what I got her. We now compare stats at breakfast.
Author: Jim Kutsko

Title: I received the ring
Content: I received the ring, It will not pair with phone app. There is no way to get in touch with a technician. My $300 ring just sits in the box. I can't even find out how to mail it back.
Author: Linda Anstiss

Title: Long lasting and useful analysis
Content: Date of experience: April 16, 2025
Author: Brandon Ang

Title: Wonderful customer service
Content: Wonderful customer service! Had little issues with sizing but the supporting team was super helpful and got offered a new ring within just a few days.
Author: Judy J

Title: RingConn air gen 2
Content: Good product. Build quality could be better. Stainless steel scratches easily.
Author: ND

Title: Great Smart Ring
Content: Exactly what I was looking for, used to have Apple Watch but my wrist keeps hurting. So far this thing does its job, besides that it’s freaking durable. And no subscription needed to top it off👍🏼
Author: James

Title: Good fit and battery lasts as long as it is supposed to! I love mine
Content: Love that you don’t have to pay for a subscription for the app and it is so accurate. Fits great.
Author: Johannah Williams

Title: Reasonably good service
Content: Representative reviewed the data and processed my rebate. Only complaint is that receipt of return was not provided automatically.
Author: JJ

Title: Urgently needed improvements
Content:
Good points:
Useful data,
Long battery life,
Easy to handle ring,

What’s missing:
Überblick der fünf vitalzeichen (german)
I don’t see a possibility to visualize historic data diagrams for (Day, week, month, year) of the five vital values (vitalzeichen)

What’s to Much:
The textual explanations are boring. Permanently repeating the same Text modules. I do not need them, But I can’t disable them, Please change it.

I can’t disable Messages from Rincon, That I’m too long in bed and not moving.
But I’m just reading and working.

Accuracy
the heart rate measurement bpm It’s not reacting fast enough while In training mode. It should permanently measure my heart so that I can know when I should slow down. My Apple Watch reacts much faster when my heart rate increases or decreases again due to greater exertion during training. I wouldn’t bother if the battery life would be much shorter through training sessions.
Author: Hayno Rustige

Title: Sleep monitoring
Content: I bought the ring mainly for sleep monitoring. It does not appear to be very accurate. REM and deep sleep are probably close but awake is classified as light sleep often.
Author: Norman McFadden

Title: I like the ring but it could use more…
Content: I like the ring but it could use more exercise options
Author: JOHANN

Title: The ring itself is excellent
Content: The ring itself is excellent, light weight, long battery life and more importantly provides key health metrics. Although the android app is very good, the exercise types it's able to track should be improved and should include integration with Health Connect.
Author: Luc Gaboury

Title: love the weight
Content: love the weight, design, and the length of the charge but very disappointed that the only activity choices are walking, indoor/outdoor running, and indoor/outdoor biking. Also disappointed you can’t add them after the fact so you have to have your phone to start and stop activity.
Author: jennifer cole

Title: I ordered the wrong size ring guards…
Content: I ordered the wrong size ring guards not knowing your sizing ran small. You want me to pay a fee to exchange them.
Author: SARA ABBOTT

Title: Very Happy
Content: Order the ring was very simple and straight forward, the sizing kits are true to their size as well. Ring itself works very well, with fantastic battery life, and made with premium durable materials.
Author: Jake Chipperfield

Title: Battery life is the best part by far
Content: Date of experience: April 28, 2025
Author: Ryan McDonough

Title: Customer service was very responsive…
Content: Customer service was very responsive and so easy to work with. Thank you!
Author: Shelli Kelly

Title: The ring dosent track sleep as…
Content: The ring dosent track sleep as accurately as I would like due to it being the main reason for the purchase, th colour was disappointing as it was browner in person compared to described and this week after having the ring for less then a week the charger broke.
Author: Rebecca

Title: Im actually really positively surprised
Content: Im actually really surprised - only positive feedback - shipping was extremely fast for sizing kit and ring likewise, the new app is well designed and has good overview and indepth data as well :) has spotted a few stressful days and also a light cold I caught. All in all I love it
Author: Sophia

Title: Great product
Content: Easy to order. Sent sizers quickly. Once determined the size just select size ring it was shipped quickly. Easy set up and have enjoyed wearing ring and looking at the data. Product does what it says it will do.
Author: Satisfied customer

Title: Ring size corrected upon notification
Content: Worked with Ring to resolve an issue I had with sizing and they were quick to handle and secure the right size. I just wish the Ring sizer kit had been precise. I purchased it to make sure abba doing that the plastic ring size kit would wasn’t reliable for me. It could be that my fingers were swollen the day I tried, though. Nonetheless, Ring made it right and I am grateful for that.
Author: Norma Jean Bauer

Title: Exceptional Product and Customer Service – A Truly Outstanding Experience
Content:
I've been a dedicated supporter of RingConn since December 2022, initially backing them through their Indiegogo campaign. From the very beginning, their communication has been nothing short of excellent—clear, consistent, and timely.

Over time, I've watched the RingConn Android app evolve through multiple updates, each bringing meaningful improvements. The biometric insights provided by the ring have been both valuable and informative, helping me better understand and monitor my health.

When RingConn released Version 2 of their smart ring in September 2024, I didn’t hesitate to place an order. The purchasing experience was seamless, and once again, their communication throughout the process was top-tier.

In April 2025, I reached out to their customer support team with a question. I was blown away—not only does RingConn offer what I believe to be the best smart ring on the market (especially considering its competitive price, lack of a subscription fee, and robust health tracking features), but their customer support is truly outstanding. Their responses were prompt, clear, and reliable. Most impressively, when they say they’ll follow up—they actually do.

My experience with both the product and the support team has far exceeded my expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend RingConn to anyone looking for a high-quality smart ring backed by exceptional service.
Author: Jon Washburn

Title: Have had 2 version of another common…
Content: Have had 2 version of another common ring. This one is so much better. More features and app is much more useful
Author: Jim Stewart

Title: Ring did not work...you can only…
Content: Ring did not work...you can only communicate with them via email to china...they didn't credit my cc after the item was returned... overall a bad experience...DO NOT BUY!!!!
Author: Tamara Schrader Normington

Title: Thank you!
Content: Thank you for quickly resolving my issue.
Author: Jennifer Kelley

Title: The dune gold is a much more coppery…
Content: The dune gold is a much more coppery gold than I had anticipated, which isn't a huge deal. I love the app integration and the overall UI which makes it easy to navigate and see the views most important to me. It's been a good month or so wearing so far and haven't had any issues with wearing it.
Author: Kristina Ngo

Title: I like this ring a lot
Content: I like this ring a lot. Especially that no subscription is required. It's much more accurate than my Samsung smart watch with regard to blood O2 and more comfortable to wear at night. I see 2 areas for improvement. It would be nice if it 'talked' to the watch/watch software. Also it needs to come in 1/2 sizes. I've had to add a small piece of mounting tape to the underside of the top to keep it from constantly rolling around my finger. However the next size smaller was nearly impossible to get off my finger if my hand was warm so I sized 1 up.
Author: Sandy White

Title: Great device and it tracks what I need
Content: Great device and it tracks what I need
Author: Sammo

Title: Great communication with the company
Content:
Great communication with the company, as my 1st. Gen. Ring develop problems
The new ring has amazing battery life! The new ring is smaller in width.
Author: customer

Title: Best experience with the company and…
Content:
Best experience with the company and the product, fast and free delivery to EU and free sizing kit.
Only one disadvantage that you can not track workouts like pilates, Joga etc. only running, cycling or walking.
Author: Veronika M.

Title: Awful
Content: Awful. If I could give a no star I would. I returned my rings and never receive a refund. They have been siting at the address I sent to for a month. And of course after I sent them back no response to any of of emails
Author: Erica slManiotis

Title: love my ringconn 2
Content: The whole process was easy! My sizing kit arrived after 10 days and my ring arrived after only 8 days! I love tracking my sleep
Author: Nahal Saberian

Title: The Customer Service was great my only…
Content: The Customer Service was great my only issue was the ring sizes are too small and there is no larger options available.
Author: Carl Chitwood

Title: Great fitness ring
Content: Good fitness ring , I previously used an Apple Watch and this is more accurate with both the HR and CO2 readings. The ring battery is great it lasts 10 days between charges
Author: gordon smith

Title: Incredible Ring!
Content: Fast shipping! Incredible product! And the app is amazing too! I can barely feel version 2 on my finger compared to version 1.
Author: Jason

Title: Incredibly slow to replace a defective…
Content: Incredibly slow to replace a defective ring. Very disappointing.
Author: Phil A.

Title: The product design and assembly are…
Content: The product design and assembly are beautiful and pleasing, but the walking tracking function seems to be more than it actually is.
Author: Pairach

Title: A sleek ring with great features
Content:
I’ve been using the RingConn Gen 2 Smart Ring for several weeks now, and I am very happy with it. I never expected the ring to be perfect and there is nothing like a visit to your healthcare provider however, with my experience using the RingConn, I am very satisfied with the close to accurate information I get. The information it provides me keeps me on track with my wellness goals. I especially like the sleep feature, which allows me to see my sleeping patterns and how to improve them. The ring provides various features and although I might not utilize them all, I am glad they are available. I did research on the different health rings available in the market and felt that this particular model of ring would best suit my needs.
The RingConn Gen 2 Smart Ring is a compelling choice for those seeking a high quality health monitoring device without the burden of subscription fees. Its exceptional battery life, comfortable design, and health tracking features make it a worthwhile purchase. While I have experienced some limitations in fitness tracking the overall value it offers has far exceeded my expectations.
Author: Dahlia Silva-Cardenas

Title: Nice to have a monitor for sleeping
Content: Nice to have a monitor for sleeping. Counts the hrs even though I get up often. Checks oxy level every 30 min, too.
Author: Andrew Michel

Title: my ring is too small and you dont make…
Content:
my ring is too small and you dont make a bigger ring for me !
Let me know when I can send this one in and you send me a bigger one when you make one
Author: v.Wade Wolf

Title: This ring is awesome
Content: This ring does everything I wanted it to and more. The amount of information is amazing.
Author: customer

Title: Love this ring
Content: Love this ring, keeps track of so much! My only complaint is the charger, it does not fit in a usb port, need to do better!
Author: Susan Eich

Title: So far has being a good product
Content: So far has being a good product, good quality and measurement of data
Author: Alfredo Reyes

Title: fast and excellent service.
Content: Date of experience: April 14, 2025
Author: ANDREAS TRAIFOROS

Title: Very Satisfied
Content: Comfortable, good data, excellent battery life. Sleep accuracy can be impacted if the ring rotates on my finer and the sensors aren’t positioned at the bottom. With that issue in mind, it would be helpful if there were a stamp or mark of some sort so that I could easily tell if the ring is properly positioned.
Author: Michael

Title: Still waiting for a charging dock that…
Content: Still waiting for a charging dock that works. I may have to return the entire package and buy from someone else.

Content:
That's the best health tracker I have got till date.
Highly recommended for someone who is looking to get a smart health ring.

Title: I enjoyed the activity and sleep…
Content: I enjoyed the activity and sleep readings. The sorry information was very interesting. I also liked the look of the ring. My time was cut short with the ring, though. I lost it after owning it for 5 days. It didn't slip off. It was my fault. Even though I didn't have it long, I miss checking the app for the different readings.

Title: Very fast Delivery and the size Kit was…
Content: Very fast Delivery and the size Kit was extremely helpful. The Ring has a Super Long Batterie Life and the App is Perfect.

Title: Great device for tracking your health
Content: Date of experience: April 21, 2025

Title: Overall pretty accurate
Content: The ring seems to be pretty accurate, and a lot of data is collected and shared through the app. It would be more convenient if it picked up automatically on the start of exercising, but starting it manually through the app isn’t so bad as long as you remember to. I wish it would upload my info directly to MyFitnessPal. Overall, I think it tracks sleep pretty accurately, and I did get a health alert when a migraine woke me up at night - so it knew something wasn’t normal. Overall a good ring to buy.
Author: KD

Title: No Complaints
Content: I've had nothing but good experiences with RingConn. Their customer service has been excellent when I needed it and the ring seems to work well. I have zero complaints.
Author: TexasMom
