Title: Best value for a great ring
Content: Great design, lightweight and comfortable. Keeps track of everything very well. More vitals than my previous ring, and the price is way better than the Oura.
Author: Elizabeth

Title: Very inaccurate data compared to watch
Content: Very inaccurate data compared to my Garmin monitor watch. You smooth data for heart rate, and spo2 which is particularly useless. Sleep data is also mostly wrong and hard to understand. Ring looks good and holds charge, otherwise pretty much a bad purchase.
Author: David K

Title: Decent amount of provided data but uncomfortable
Content: The ring is helpful with the information it provides but it’s very uncomfortable to wear- especially if I happen to be bloated that day or after a long day of typing and my fingers swell. I picked a size 3 sizes bigger than my wedding ring and it still leaves little indentions in my skin. I would not purchase again.
Author: Cindy Adams

Title: It’s okay
Content:
I feel the ring isn’t accurate with the reading it gives. I wish I had read everything before buying it. I would have returned it but the return policy is very limited.
Otherwise the looks nice and charges quickly.
Author: Lisa Wake

Title: Worth the very long wait.
Content:
From ordering to receiving took over six weeks.
Initially the ring sizer kit arrives then when size is confirmed your actual ring arrives.
Ring is great, charges very quickly, light and attractive design and the data it collects is accurate and really useful to improve health.
The sleep monitoring is fascinating and explains why I feel like I do when I wake up.
Thoroughly recommended.
Author: Sue Holmes

Title: Love this ring!
Content: Love this ring! Process was super easy to get the right size. You place your order, they send you a ring sizing kit if you need one, you wear the sizer ring for at least a day to make sure it’s comfortable, then go back to your orders and mark which size you’d like and they ship it to you. The first 3 days I did their sleep apnea tracking and it worked wonderfully. Very cool to see all of the insights as someone with sleep apnea. I wear it daily to track my heart rate as I have a condition called POTS. This seems to be the only ring that constantly tracks your heart rate even when not exercising. Battery life is amazing. All in all it’s a great product!
Author: Hannah Owens

Title: My battery on my ringconn is AWFUL
Content:
My battery on my ringconn is AWFUL.
In the last month it has been a slow deterioration of battery life longevity.
I charge it and by the next morning more then 55% of my battery is GONE. It is not lasting 3days!
Author: Nancy Denis

Title: Their latest model is a shockingly bad…
Content: Their latest model is a shockingly bad cash grab. Careful!
Author: Joel Woodman

Title: After a lot of review and research I…
Content: After a lot of review and research I decided to go with RingConn over its competitors and I’m glad I did! I bought it mainly for sleep tracking and management and it has helped me to have a better and more consistent night’s sleep, which has led to more energy and productivity in my days. I have since recommended to several people RingConn and they are happy with their purchase as well
Author: Alicia

Title: I love the ring
Content: I love the ring , it fits well I hardly know I am wearing it. The app is fantastic !!! It provides me with all the data I need to understand my sleep and health. Would highly recommend.
Author: Kim Dellefemine

Title: Lack of information
Content: I was offered the chance to buy an older version with a discounted price; but they forgot to mention that they are not making that version anymore, so the size I needed was never going to be in stock again. I waited for around a month for it to be in stock, when I had to reach out to them and they offered a refund.
Author: Mariana

Title: More exercise options would be…
Content: More exercise options would be beneficial. My ring doesn’t detect my workouts. Strength training and indoor walking at the very least.
Author: Samantha Roberts

Title: Not Accurate
Content: I went with this primarily for step tracking and sleep information. I've found when I wake up it already has 100+ steps (I don't sleepwalk or get up to go to the bathroom) and I question whether the step count is accurate during the day as well- it always seems very high. And the sleep must be based on being horizontal? I was recently traveling and got some great, long sleep on some plane rides but the ring totally missed it. And then it counted a massage as my being completely asleep. I may have dozed off for a minute or two lol but definitely did not sleep through the whole thing. I took it off after that and haven't been inclined to wear it again. A bummer though, it's expensive and I am interested in tracking this information!
Author: Julia

Title: It reeks with tech
Content: It reeks with tech. Just the way I like it.
Author: Michael Bogen

Title: Good but hopeful for an update!
Content: I like my Ringconn! It is super insightful and helps me understand my body more. I do wish that it could connect to other apps, such as my workout apps. The Ringconn only has a few options to log workouts, all of which are cardio based, which is unfortunate for weight training curiosity!
Author: Kayla

Title: Gen 2 Air Accuracy Spot On
Content: Date of experience: April 04, 2025
Author: ConnieE

Title: Great value and performance.
Content: Very comfortable to wear, and made of high quality material. Great performance, data and analytics. Battery lasted over 11 days on recent trip. App easy to use and cost-free (very important in my opinion). Also priced very competitively.
Author: Dave E

Title: Trade program could be much easier
Content: I lIke the product. Your trade program could be handled so much better if, when you have a trade customer, include a return label in the mailer the RingConn new box for someone to just throw their old ring in and send back. No searching for where to return to, no extra three steps that don't need to exist. Good luck with the lawsuit with Oura.
Author: G Geralds

Title: Fast response
Content: Fast response, quality goods
Author: Zdeněk Nedvěd

Title: Very nice
Content: Good product. There’s a bit of room for improvement but overall good. Shopping experience very good. No taxes when the product arrived.

Title: Not accurate
Content: Heartrate is not accurate, always lower than my watch. Steps always higher.

Title: Data is awesome
Content: Data is reliable and more accurate than my Fitbit and I can wear it in the water no problem.

Title: I don’t like the ring
Content: I don’t like the ring, and they only have a 14 day window to return it. I would think 30 days would be more appropriate

Title: Not useful
Content: Your ring doesn’t have the ability to directly transmit the datas to my doctors and i have to manually download and create a report for my physicians. It is very cumbersome as far as i am concern. I am not a physician and for me to analyze the datas it is not useful. Asi i returned the ring three or four weeks ago and to date i have no received my refund. In this country, it is unlawful to withheld my money to your advantage.
Author: john alexander

Title: Loving the long battery life
Content: Loving the long battery life, 10 days on average is Amazing! Sleep data & HRV have been super helpful allowing me to make minor changes to see improvements!
Author: Anthony

Title: The battery life of the Gen 2 RingConn…
Content: The battery life of the Gen 2 RingConn is phenomenal! I can easily go for a week between charges, and it even works with the Gen 1 charging case so I always have a backup/travel charger. The metrics are very accurate and I love the silver finish. I'm very happy with my purchase!
Author: Tony Henderson

Title: Everything in one place
Content: I appreciate seeing the full picture of my body & health. I tend to be sedentary & there have been a few miscalculations of light sleep when I'm actually awake, but not moving. I'm glad to be able to edit my sleep/wake times. I also like being able to explain stress & elevated heart rates.
Author: Cassie Benson

Title: Quick response and great product
Content:
Quick response and great product. Straight forward instructions.
App updates frequently to be better and better.
Author: Mats Roden

Title: Does not keep good sleep measurement
Content: Does not keep good sleep measurement. I know I have not sleep for 7 hrs. Straight since I was a baby.
Author: Kerner Long

Title: Very helpful stats and fun to wear
Content: I like the ring. It is comfortable so I wear it pretty much all the time. I like the information it provides. For me, it has reduced my anxiety about my sleep and confirms that I am doing good in other areas. It also was great in helping me understand my sleep apnea. It’s mild but nice to be able to monitor it periodically.
Author: Bill

Title: So much YESSSS
Content: I have really liked my experience with RingConn so far, it's been a little over a month and I'm happy with what I'm getting from it. My only "complaint," if you would call it that, is that it's a little judgemental about sleep, haha! As if I don't know that it would be better if I could get more sleep!
Author: Erika Hall

Title: Valuable insights without getting in the way
Content: I love my RingConn Gen 2 so far! It gives me all the data I need to live a healthy and informed life ❤️ And I love the battery life so much 🔋 I can barely notice it on my finger, and when I do, it feels and looks great ✨
Author: Szymon Mktk

Title: Good deal
Content: My first experience of any wearable gadget. Pretty good experience so far. Lightweight, good sleep tracking, nice app, speedy delivery.
Author: Fran

Title: Excellent Purchase
Content: I love everything about my ring. The color, the fit, the accuracy of the ring is exactly what I was hoping for. And, it is very nice to not have to pay a subscription.
Author: Anita

Title: Great price:benefit
Content: The price:benefit is great.
Author: Alejandro B.

Title: I loveeee my ring and tell everyone…
Content: I loveeee my ring and tell everyone about it every chance it get! Thank you RingConn
Author: Makaila Harris

Title: Very happy with my RingConn sleep tracker!
Content: Very happy with my RingConn and the information it gives me regarding my sleep. Detailed information and like how it can also detect possible sleep apnea. Have not paid much attention to the other features yet due to getting this mainly to track sleep. Also appreciate there is no monthly subscription!!!!
Author: Mo

Title: Good
Content: I really love this ring (gen2). Stable app, a lot of data, perfectly built. Take two points off because of battery. Lasts approximately six days for now. Using a bit less than three months. If I knew that issue beforehand, not sure I've bought this brand. Sorry.
Author: Jevgeni Urvantsev

Title: Great Customer Service
Content: Excellent customer service and loving the app.
Author: Patricia Cruz-Guzman

Title: Great product
Content: Great product. Love the longer lasting battery.

Title: Great product
Content: Great product. Ordering the sizing rings was a really good option and ensured that I got just the right fit. The ring itself is amazing with all the information it provides. The sleep monitoring appears to be incredibly accurate and detailed. This was exactly what I hoped it would be.

Title: Great ring for the price
Content: Great ring for the price! Love how small it is compared to competitors. Does think I’m sleeping a little 2 much, but that’s ok.
Author: Bill

Title: I don’t like the ring
Content:
I didn’t like the ring. I wanted to return it but they’ll charge me, is an expensive thing and they want to charge even more for return?? lol
Is uncomfortable to sleep

Title: I had an issue with sleep detection
Content: I had an issue with sleep detection, with relaxing in bed, read 'trying to get back to sleep'. The ring detected it as REM sleep and the reply was that relaxing and sleep can be confused. I accept that but it can't be confused with REM sleep so very disappointed with the reply.
Author: Paul Drummond

Title: Great app with No subscription fee
Content: No subscription fee. Love the app with the dashboards. Very good accuracy in the readings and easy to use.
Author: Rozlee Isahak

Title: Good device
Content: Date of experience: April 11, 2025
Author: wisit Sittisirinukul

Title: The RingConn 2.0 is a sleek and smart…
Content: The RingConn 2.0 is a sleek and smart addition to my wellness routine. I especially appreciate the accurate sleep tracking—it’s helped me build better habits and wake up more refreshed. The gentle reminders to move keep me from sitting too long, which is a great nudge during busy workdays. One of the best features is the stress monitoring, which gives me helpful insights into how my body responds throughout the day. Overall, it’s a powerful tool in a minimalist design that fits right into my lifestyle.
Author: Shawn Maus

Title: The product is beautiful and gives…
Content: The product is beautiful and gives results, but I suffered because of the external bulbs that bother me while sleeping, and I am thinking of selling the product.
Author: Faisal Faqihi

Title: I order a Gen 2 ring and it went ok…
Content:
I order a Gen 2 ring and it went ok because i knew the size when I placed the order. Then I ordered
a Gen 2 air using the sizing kit. Now the order is stalled due to trying to re-enter the size to complete the order.

Title: So far it’s tracking abilities have…
Content: So far it’s tracking abilities have been amazing

Title: Great communication when ever I wanted…
Content: Great communication when ever I wanted to ask questions. Great tracking service and quick delivery service considering the distance the package had travelled

Title: Easy ordering
Content: Easy ordering, quick response time.

Title: gives me information need
Content: Date of experience: April 11, 2025

Title: RingConn is a great ring to monitor…
Content: RingConn is a great ring to monitor your health and vitality on a continuous basis! I highly recommend the RingConn to anyone looking to take control of their health.

Title: Sleep master
Content: Sleep tracking is excellent. I wish it would track more levels of activity, such as weight lifting and golf. But otherwise, very useful
Author: sean stockton

Title: Slim
Content: Slim, efficient, functional, great overall
Author: AT

Title: So far it exceeds my expectations by…
Content: So far it exceeds my expectations by all the data it collects and analyses, really impressive

Title: Very good customer service wow amazing
Content: Very good customer service wow amazing. Very good product. Tks very accurate and comfortable.

Content: Can't complain, it delivers what was promised.

Title: Dislike the visible light flashing from…
Content:
Dislike the visible light flashing from the ring. Impossible to keep the ring it its recommended rotation with sensors on the bottom of the finger.
Data and presentation is very good!

Title: Fast turnaround
Content: Very quick delivery of the ring from receiving the sizing kit.

Title: I love the comfort and the simplicity…
Content: I love the comfort and the simplicity of the app iconology. It is helping me with my sleep tracking and daily movement but in an unobtrusive way.

Title: Great Ring
Content: It came on time. Was easy to set up. Appreciate the discount from my first ring that stopped working. This one works great.
Author: Annie Kauffman

Title: Perfect Balance Between Function and Price
Content: The Ring is comfortable and is performing as expected. Easy setup. Took a few days to understand how information is organized in the app and how to use certain features like recording an outdoor activity. Overall, perfect for my needs and budget.
Author: Tiffany Robbins

Title: I love the RingConn 2 But.....
Content: I love the RingConn 2, but the battery is not keeping a charge after 4 months of using it. Been in contact with customer support to remedy the problem. They are working on replacing my Ring with a new one, but they are slow to respond. They only respond once a day to my requests and it is taking a long time to get a shipping label to send back my defective ring and to get a new one sent out. It's been 2 weeks now and still waiting.
Author: T HA

Title: My ring required replacement
Content: My ring malfunctioned. It thought it was in charging case when it wasn't. After initial troubleshooting process with customer service I received a replacement ring within 3 weeks. They did not wait for me to return ring before sending out replacement ring. I couldn't ask for a better response.
Author: Terry Saltz

Title: Only missing one thing
Content: Really love my ring! The only thing I wish is, with the limited number of specific exercise choices, that it had an OTHER option in order to capture weightlifting, tennis, etc!
Author: Maureen

Title: Better for me than the watch! The ring is easy to wear!
Content: The idea of being able to have a ring without a subscription is what intrigued me the most. I am a lifter, and I need to wear wrist compression, making a watch difficult. With the silicone sleeve, the ring is the perfect solution! The app is easy to use, and the battery life is awesome! To be able to go almost 2 weeks without charging is so nice, and the charging goes very quickly!
Author: Brooke Shea

Title: I am enjoying wearing my ring and…
Content: I am enjoying wearing my ring and reviewing my vital stats every day
Author: Fadi Ashy

Title: Good product and a lot of data……
Content:
Good product and a lot of data… however, the number of steps don’t seem to align with other step measures and seems to be over counting.
Here should be a way to adjust or calibrate.
Author: Valued Customer

Title: Fast and responsive
Content: Very attentive to customer’s needs
Author: Karen

Title: Great data!
Content:
I like the data information and layout of the app. The options for exercise/activities definitely need to be expanded to include more options. For example, indoor walking and aerobic cardio activities should be added.
I love that there is no monthly fee...that is why I bought it over the competitors.
Author: Tara Basar

Title: Not a fan at all
Content: Waited forever to get this ring. It doesn’t do a lot of the things I thought it would do and it feels like cheap plastic so i’m not sure why it costs so much. Overall disappointed with the ring, wouldn’t recommend buying it.
Author: SM

Title: My ring stopped charging
Content: My ring stopped charging, holding a charge, wouldn’t restart or anything the DAY after my return window ended. I really did love the ring but I’m scared to buy another incase this happens again.
Author: Stefani Lemke

Title: Amazing
Content: Amazing, accurate and looks gorgeous
Author: Michelle

Title: Tracks sleep very well
Content: Tracks sleep very well. I use it to track my stress since I have chronic pain. Step count is still not accurate. New battery life is nice. I enjoy using it.
Author: Alice

Title: Liars and a scam
Content:
My ring was having problems getting correct data readings. I contacted customer service by email because the phone number goes straight to voicemail and they do not call you back.
For 3 weeks, I had a gen 1 ring and after a week of talking they offered me $100 a gen 2 ring, so I picked one the gen 2 air. They came back and said that offer was $50, I told them they didn't specify which one so they can't do that. Days later they email me and tell me they will send it for free. They confirmed my address twice and nothing. So the next email they wanted me to send back the old one first and then they would send the new one. That came out of nowhere and they had never said this before. I advised I was not comfortable with that since all the problems so far. We confirmed my address again and they said they would ship it right away with a return slip for the other one inside. That was a week ago and still nothing, so I have to email again
I also started to screen shot the emails as I noticed they were deleting some where they stated things they promised they were going to do and never did.
This company is a scam, bunch of liars, and all you will get is emails to appease you. If you don't constantly email them sometimes 2 and 3 times a day cause your haven't gotten a response they just send you another email of something else they want you to do that was never part of the discussion. Don't spend $300 to have.issues cause you will never get them fixed. It is now May 5th, so 1 month later and still nothing.
Author: blueeyzs

Title: Really need more excerise selections
Content: Really need more excerise selections
Author: Veronica Lee

Title: Love my Ringcon Gen2 Air
Content:
Love my Ringcon gen2 air. It fits so well I barely notice it and the insights it’s given me is great. I know I need to get more sleep but that’s for me to work on.
Feel reassured with the results I am given and know which direction to take. The AI help is wonderful.
Author: RITA

Title: I love my ring
Content: I love my ring! Very comfortable, stylish looking, and informative!
Author: Shannon and Wayne

Title: If the ring of ring size tester kit is…
Content: If the ring of ring size tester kit is ok, but in times a bit tight, wearing the real ring can rapidly get uncomfortable. Having the largest ring size, I don’t use the ring anymore.
Author: Philippe

Title: I have not received the ring I ordered.
Content: Date of experience: April 04, 2025
Author: Jennifer Petrie

Title: it does not detect my exercise and the…
Content:
it does not detect my exercise and the training options it has are very limited
it also does not allow me to adjust my menstrual period it is not efficient
Author: Angelica Maria Ruiz Pinto

Title: Missing options
Content: Missing more sport option, would like to add coffee measurement, the app needs refinement feels cheap.
Author: Gonzalo Gil

Title: I never received the ring so this is more a review of ordering and support
Content:
I ordered a stainless steel-colored ring for my wife’s birthday. When the sizing kit arrived, it included not only ring sizers but also color samples. After reviewing them, my wife decided she preferred the rose gold option. I reached out to customer support to change the selection, but they advised me to cancel the original order and place a new one for the rose gold version.

I followed their instructions and placed a new order. However, after a lengthy shipping process, I received a package containing a sleep mask and an aromatherapy kit—no ring. I contacted support again, and while they did investigate with the shipping provider and issued a refund, I was left scrambling to find a replacement birthday gift.

In the end, after more than a month, two orders were charged and refunded, and I received a package of unrelated items. I’m genuinely shocked at how disorganized and unreliable their order fulfillment process has been.
Author: Jim

Title: Helpful data for wellness goals
Content: The ring sizer kit showed up fast and was easy to use, the actual ring took a while as it shipped from china. The ring fits perfectly and the data it gives in the app is really helpful. Especially for balancing your wellness. The battery life lasts about 10 days. I tried a cheaper one that didn’t provide as much granular data, and it broke within 6 months- this is a massive upgrade from that, though I’ve only had it for a month, so we’ll see if it continues to work. Overall I’m really happy with it and would recommend it, especially if you find sleeping in your watch/tracker to be awkward.
Author: Amanda Bauman

Title: Best
Content: Opted for ring as recently had left arm lobbed off and wanted something to monitor heart health. Considered certain competitor but forking out every month just to use it like having mortgage on my finger. Found ringconn to be within beat or two of my BP monitor which truly impressed me. Also find the sleep tracking to be very accurate so all in all great purchase.
Author: Robert Close

Title: Replacement Ring
Content: Lost my ring… they were very accommodating with my replacement and added care+ protection
Author: SUSAN B FAIN

Title: Your ring is accurate and easy to use
Content: Your ring is accurate and easy to use. My wife with epilepsy uses it to measure her stress levels and all the other functions. Very useful.
Author: Dwayne Woodard

Title: Exactly as advertised
Content: Arrived on time exactly as stated. Sizing kit then the device. So far works exactly as advertised
Author: Michael Fennessy

Title: A very comfortable and accurate ring I wear it all day and night without any discomfort
Content: I have tried other brands Ring conn very comfortable to wear day and night and cheaper
Author: Lindsay

Title: Customer Service needs to be improved…
Content: Customer Service needs to be improved tremendously. They give you generic responses and do not actually update you on your order. Feels like i’m talking to a robot rather than an actual person.
Author: Dani

Title: great ring
Content: great ring long battery life easy to purchase. no real downside other than i wish they had a couple of sizes larger
Author: Ronald D Becker

Title: Almost perfect experience.
Content:
There are no questions about the device. Convenient, functional, informative.
But delivery to the UK took a month, instead of the stated period on the website of 7-10 days.
True, support responded quickly and informatively.
Author: Vadim

Title: If you are ordering outside of the US
Content: If you are ordering outside of the US, expect delivery and responses to take some time... For me (Mexico) it was 2 weeks+ on the sizing kit, and 2 weeks+ for the actual ring and I never got a response on an ETA. Other than that great service, attention, packaging, and product.
Author: Jaime Gonzalez

Title: Excellent product
Content:
Excellent product, no surprises. Customer support is great.
Since having the RingConn I have ditched my Apple watch.
Author: Michael

Title: I have not received any answers.
Content: Date of experience: April 04, 2025
Author: Zm

Title: Disappointed Ring Air user
Content: My first few calls to customer service were bad. The delivery took almost 1 month. I got the sizing kit in a little over a week, then i got the acrual ring 3 weeks later. I like the ring itself, it's not bulky like the regular ones (I got the air). But it's way off on the step count. I type all day and it counts the key strokes as steps. I called customer service and they told me to reset the ring. I reset the ring twice now and the issue continues. It's very disappointing.
Author: Ana Rodriguez

Title: The sizing of the ring compared to the…
Content: The sizing of the ring compared to the fitted ring is terrible and unfortunately that doesn't fall under one of the options for returning or exchanging the ring.
Author: Ken N

Title: Half met value proposition - rn its not helping me at all, data not curated / analyzed enough to be useful
Content:
- data not accuracy enough
- dont be afraid to use user insights for data accuracy, make them part of your analysis, even though its subjective, it can add great value and most of users would love to input as much insights as possible. Ponder it accordingly.

- ai chat is pretty unusful rn, but i hope you keep adding functionality including being able to input my own questions.
- want an ai that does more than give me metrics and percentages, i want to interpret them, wanna ask questions and get to know my body and brain better, thats the hole point.

- provide tips / recommendations / solutions, ok my deep sleep has not met its goal ever, ok how do i fix that, and also, why is it important, where am i seeing its effects?

- wanna be able to input data such as:
caffeine & water intake, wether, been outside or not, felt grateful or not, motivated?, inspired?, emotions and our own subjective interpretations!!!!!
You have to be able to mix both my own knowledge about my mind and body and your own objective physical analysis and pattern detection into curated and analyzed useful data, thats the point, thats the solution u should provide
Author: Federica Cabrera Doglio

Title: I really love what it does!
Content: I really love what it does. My only issue is my fingers are short, and wearing on index or middle finger, it’s really bulky and uncomfortable. I’ve been wearing it anyway. Please make narrower for short fingers.
Author: Sandra Jones

Title: Great Ring!!!
Content: This is my first ever smart ring and overall, I'm very impressd! I wanted a smart ring to track my sleeping and steps and this ring is perfect for that. I bought the Ring Conn Air in Dune Gold and I think the color is different and cool.
Author: Karyn Cole

Title: Love my RingConn so far!
Content: Love my RingConn so far!
Author: Kelli Powell

Title: After some delays in getting the right…
Content: After some delays in getting the right size, after I had to return my original purchase, I am happy to report that I am very much enjoying my new ring. Customer service has been great, and so far the operation of the ring has been good. Still building data in the app on my phone, but looking forward to understanding it all once its more accurate.
Author: Melanie O'Flaherty

Title: Not accurate, lots of issues
Content: The ring does not automatically track exercise as it claims. There are also very limited types of exercise you can log and it can’t be done after the fact. It also does not accurately track heart rate during exercise and maxes out around 135bpm. It also then flags elevated heart rate during exercise as an outlier which affects your health score. Step tracking is also not accurate. Basically a glorified sleep tracker and with the other issues not sure I can trust even that. Probably would not have purchased if I’d have known about this issues. I’m hoping that with continued wear it will at least be an accurate menstrual cycle tracker.
Author: Christiana

Title: Still getting use to ring switched from…
Content: Still getting use to ring switched from Oura ring what i did like about Oura I was able to adjust sleep and wake time at night if I was just laying in bed I leave ring in charge prior to sleeping, that seems to work for me. Ty
Author: Joe Barros

Title: General experience seems quite well
Content:
General experience seems quite well - rings work well. Could be more thiner a bit ;-)

General improvement - nmore insights form app and more auggestions from app.

At this moment I'm feel realy lack of insights and addtional parametres that could improve my health, habbits or other things...
Author: Jandalf

Title: I found the whole transaction to be…
Content: I found the whole transaction to be smooth and timely. I love my ring!

Title: Very accurate, love the fit, and the look.
Content: The ring is very accurate as far as I can tell, it even has a tracker so should you lose it, you can find it!

Title: Looks Good and Does the Job
Content: It fits well and the data that it produced I find informative and useful

Title: LOVE my RingConn 2 Air!

Content: Ordering was easy. The tray of sizers was excellent. After confirming my size the actual ring kit arrived in nice time and the fit was exact.

Title: Great Product and quick shipping.
Content: There isn't anything bad to say. Great battery life, App is full of useful insight into daily habits and their effects.

Title: Outstanding Very responsive
Content: Outstanding Very responsive

Title: Really liking the ring so far
Content:
Really liking the ring so far - it is comfortable and easy to wear!
The app is easy to use and just what I was looking for!

Content: Does what it says and I feel the measurements are pretty accurate. I would recommend people to try it out if they don’t want to spend top dollar for a smart ring?

Title: For price it’s unbeatable!
Content: Been awesome the stress tracking and sleep or my main reason for getting this and so far it worked well for me . Wish I could have gotten a half size for snugger fit is my only issue.

Content: very good ring

Title: I like the ring for tracking sleep
Content: I like the ring for tracking sleep, but the other tracking isn’t accurate. I’m hoping that gets fixed soon though because otherwise its just an expensive sleep tracker.

Title: Save your money
Content: Step count is off by at least 1000. Sleep accuracy is horrible.

Title: Ring Conn is Comfortable as Easy to Set up!
Content:
The device is easy to set up and very comfortable to wear. I have small hands and in general do not like to wear rings. I thought this might be too bulky but it is surprisingly easy to wear!!
Love getting information about daily movements.
I would love it device would accept/sync data from workout from Orange Theory Fitness app.
Author: Gail C

Title: The comfort of the ring.
Content: The comfort of the ring.
Author: Kathy Wilborn

Title: I love my RingConn
Content: I love my RingConn, it truly is a small but mighty device if you are interested in being a little more health conscious. The data is super interesting and the more you wear it the more relevant insights you gain. Shipping was super fast and it looks really nice.
Author: Lilla

Title: I primarily got this for sleep tracking…
Content: I primarily got this for sleep tracking and it was not very accurate.
Author: John Nelson

Title: 5 StarExperience
Content: Dealing with customer service for an address change during shipping. Everything went correctly. Communication was easy and quick
Author: Gary

Title: Delivery time
Content:
Delivery time, communication, tracking is terrible.

App is ok, could be better. Doesn’t allow you to edit your notes and the explanation is so vague for some of the reasons your numbers are not within normal ranges. Doesn’t allow you to change your health plan. It just asks you a few questions and sets the plan for you, but doesn’t allow for you to personalize like the apple watch - setting your goals for steps, your activity goal, work out goals, etc.
Author: Ken

Title: Best Customer Service
Content: The RingConn Customer Service Team has gone above and beyond to make my experience great. Due to the Canada Post strike, I was delayed getting my sizing kit prior to leaving on a trip, and they were accommodating and understanding of the delay. By the time I had returned, the rose gold colour had been released, and I wished to change my original order. They helped me cancel the old order, place a new one, AND honoured my original discount code. They were friendly, polite and made this the best customer service experience I have ever had.
Author: Miranda

Title: Great user interface, accurate metrics, great after sales support.
Content: I’ve been using the RingConn2 smart ring and have been really impressed so far. The app interface is clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate, making it simple to track my health metrics. The measurements—especially sleep and heart rate—seem accurate and consistent, which gives me confidence in the data. A big shoutout to their after-sales support as well—responsive, helpful, and genuinely focused on customer satisfaction. Overall, it’s a sleek and reliable wearable that blends seamlessly into daily life.
Author: Kevon A.

Title: Love this smart ring!
Content: I looked at all the smart ring options and took a chance last year with RingConn. A newer company with no monthly fee. I have been very happy with the results/ data collected. I lost my ring while traveling so I ordered another of the 2nd generation. Again I am happy with the results. I originally bought it for the sleep data and have been really satisfied with that. When I made a mistake in ordering my ring without the care package they were very accommodating in cancelling my order and then reordering with the care package. I like the longevity of the battery and the notice to charge gives you enough time to do that. Charging the ring is super fast
Author: Pam P

Title: Fantastic Product
Content: Bought this on a recommendation I saw online, and I'd already been looking for a replacement for my Oura ring. Their subscription model was really syratinh to annoy me. The RingConn Gen 2 was everything I wanted in a smart ring: beautiful, elegant, inconspicuous, water-resistant, and best of all - No subscription! The app is completely free to use with all the features and statistics you would want in a health app that tracks your activity and sleep. Couldn't be happier with this product.
Author: Arc

Title: Worst customer service experience
Content: Worst customer service experience from the start. Contacted them as my Ron g suddenly died less than a year. PAID to get a new ring which took over 2.5 weeks to get. Asked to purchase the warranty but wasn’t able to because it can only be done at time of purchase which wasn’t paid clear. Had to consistently follow up with them in order to get an answer. Every reply felt it was an AI response.
Author: AW

Title: I love my ring
Content: I love my ring. It's very accurate and the fact it monitors everything just on my finger is great. I have compared it to my other tracks and this is just better. The ring covers are great for when I am doing heavy workouts or yard work. Thank you.
Author: John Vavrek

Title: Love the period tracking feature!
Content: Love the period tracking feature!
Author: customer

Title: Number of days without charging is half…
Content: Number of days without charging is half as much as advertised
Author: Bob

Title: It's so easy to charge this ring and…
Content: It's so easy to charge this ring and it's so easy to ware I love it it's great
Author: Ann Lyall

Title: When I order the ring I order a sizing…
Content: When I order the ring I order a sizing kit. I thought they would send the sizing kit first and then send the ring. They sent both and I did not pick out a ring size. I think I should have order the sizing kit first and then ordered the ring. Ringconn let me return the ring. They let you return it in 14 days or less. It does take a few emails to get return authorization and a small fee to return it. I order a new ring that fits and it works very well. It is the first fitness ring I have tried so I do not have anything to compare it to.
Author: Darrell F Clint

Title: I'm loving the product, but misses a few things.
Content: I'm loving the product, so far. I just wanted the steps and moving information to be able to be used by the Apple Rings on my phone, but I guess this is an Apple thing, and more exercise options like strengthening and Table Tennis would be good to have.
Author: Joao Moradei

Title: Gen 2 ring is lightweight
Content:
Gen 2 ring is lightweight, has good battery life and is packed with features.
Unfortunately, the technology is not there yet to accurately track sleep apnea, which was the major reason I purchased the ring. The readings seem to be baseline at best. I never expected them to be super accurate, but did expect them to be closer to accurate than they are.
Author: Richard Lewis

Title: Sleep/Exercise/Cycle
Content: Some nights, my device doesn't track my sleep even though I'm wearing it the same way I do every night. Also, if I forget to start the exercise feature before a workout, I can't go back and edit it afterward. When it comes to period tracking, it's difficult to adjust my cycle length—it's not very user-friendly.
Author: Em

Title: Great product
Content: I have been wearing my ringconn gen2 for a couple of weeks and so far I am very happy with it. It is light, confortable and now I have access to a lot of information about my daily performance, including sleep, still have to review some details to use all this data to improve myself, but I am very happy and satisfied with this ring!! Also, great experience with the sizing kit and now with the real one!
Author: Gonzalo García

Title: Great experience, would like more stats
Content: Great hardware, real ring is slightly larger than the sizing kit so you can order a snugger fit and it will fit well. The app works great, connection and syncing is fast, battery lasts for over a week and charges really fast. I would like more stats on the app and also most of the phrases on the app are written weirdly, probably since they are AI. Not a problem, just weird. I ordered internationally and the package arrived in time and in good condition.
Author: Manuel Espinosa

Title: Ring covers
Content: I purchased the covers for the ring. They are very difficult to get on and extremely cheap looking. I will never use them.
Author: customer

Title: I love this technology
Content:
One of the most beautiful pieces of technology I've ever had.
I love this technology and will invite my friends to own this smart ring
Thank you, thank you
Author: MAJED ALMUTAIRI

Title: Great product
Content: The newly released Rincon Air is a fantastic product for somebody who wants to get into health rings.
Author: Sanli Wang

Title: I am very happy with my ring
Content: I am very happy with my ring. It's really helpful to know my sleep patron and my daily activities.
Author: Peggy Papeliers

Title: i got a ring gen 2 ‘s then ordered a…
Content:
i got a ring gen 2 ‘s then ordered a charger by accident snd no one will talk to me about the mistake order on the charger. It stinks and i want t send it back but no one answers my calls or emails back. So i am
not very happy. I live the rings themselves but customer service stinks.

Ok, some hope. They saw this and are responding. I hope to resolve my matter. I haven't received an email yet, but I will continue to check.

Another update: I never received anything after checking my spam and inbox on the 8th. Please send me the email as you mentioned.

Another Another update:4-29-25
- I have not received the email yet on the 8th or like you mentioned you would send it again. Maybe you can just refund my card because this is a huge waste of my time.
Author: Sean Goss

Title: Not Disability (immobility) friendly ….yet????
Content:
Your ring does not in any way cater for Disabled or Chronically ill people. Which is surprising, when it is said to be medically approved. I’d have thought it would be designed with those people in mind. Alas, I am bed and wheelchair bound, but get asked to get up out of my sedentary position constantly all day long. I find it extremely offensive and frustrating that I can’t turn this off, despite not having the exercise options on. It thinks I’m taking steps when it’s been over a dozen years when I took any. Please, please update this! Even the Apple Watch has a wheelchair user option to recognise if a person does not have the ability to be mobile.

As for the other features. They are great. But.. an alert on your phone/app for extremely abnormal O2 sats or HR would be much more useful than having to look it up after the fact.
Author: customer

Title: Good product
Content: Great price, great product, great app. Good delivery time. Sizing seems slightly off though. I measured for a 12 but the 12 I got is bigger. Worked out OK with a sizing strip.
Author: Joe

Title: Love the fit
Content: Love the fit, the size isn’t too intrusive. It’s much lighter than I thought it would be. Feels cheap, but I like that it’s not heavy because I can’t even tell I have it on. I gave it 3 stars because it doesn’t track any exercises that I do. It only does indoor/outdoor walking/running and cycling. I do weightlifting, volleyball, yoga, boxing…etc. It’s totally my fault for not doing more research. I really like everything else about it. If it tracked more exercises then it would be a 5 star. The cycle tracking and the sleep tracking I like. It might over count my steps though. My Apple Watch always has a couple thousand less steps than the ring. So I don’t really trust that and I go above and beyond my step goal
Author: RACHEL MISZTAL

Title: I like the ring
Content: I like the ring, still trying to understand the app a little more. Got the ring, mostly checking how I sleep.
Author: ALMA OLMOS

Title: Theres nothing "smart" about it.
Content:
Review for Ringconn Gen 2

Overall, really disappointed in this product.
I honestly want to return it. But one, it will cost me to ship it back. and two, I dont have time to deal with that right now.

Its basically a wearable ring health tracker. theres nothing "smart" about it.
It only writes data, it doesnt read. meaning that it can only go off its own data.
I wish i did more research and got something with more integration, AI, habits, and insights.
the main reason i chose this ring was for the sleep apnea and O2 tracking, which im not even happy with.

only positive i have is the battery life.

Negatives:
* you can tell from its language that it was manufactured in china.
* iv had issues with the O2 not reading correctly, which is the primary reason i got it.
* I also got it specifically for the sleep apnea tracking, but what i didnt find out till i got it, is that you have to turn on that setting for it to work, its not tracking everyday on its own. also it says that it consumes more battery life as well.
* I get warnings for "outliers" in my heart rate and HRV all the time, but its mostly because my schedule varies so much.
* also considers my panic attacks as "moderate to high - intensity activity / exercise mode" even when heart rate is unusually high and theres little to no movement.
* i also hate how they have ads on facebook that you can wear it while swimming and in the sauna, but when you read about the ring in the app, it specifically says you shouldnt wear it in the sauna.

Those are all the issues i can think of off hand, but im sure theres more.
Overall, my suggestion is do your research. theres better options than this.
Author: Jenny Winslow

Title: Love it
Content: Simply, I love it. Thanks for your job.
Author: Tomáš Löbl

Title: I received my ring (generation 1) as a…
Content: I received my ring (generation 1) as a gift and loved it at first! However, after only having it for 3 months the finish has started to scratch off the ring, and it accurately tracks the distances of my walks and runs. I love the concept of this product but am overall disappointed with the quality. I would recommend the Ultrahuman ring instead.

Content: I purchase when they started this company and teh wait was long! Everything went flawlessly when I reordered my Gen 2 ring. Keep up teh good work!

Content: If you have a good smartwatch, I don't see the point of having this ring. It seems that its measurements are quite accurate, but the question is who needs it. Perhaps people with sleep problems, such as apnea. If you are healthy, I don't see the need to acquire it. Always with good intentions in the critique.

Content: Great ring! Tracks vital signs and reports any abnormalities to resolve. Monitors sleep, activity, stress, vital signs, and sleep apnea. It would be nice if the ring monitors blood pressure. Battery is ok, need to charge weekly.

Content:
Took me through step by step process without rushing to end the conversation other than to give me the most satisfactory answer leading to satisfactory purchase.
Professional, patient, and knowledgeable.

Title: Super pleased with my ringconn ring…
Content:
Super pleased with my ringconn ring (gen 2). It’s super light, and looks great! I forget it’s even on my finger most days. It has replaced my wedding band.

As far as tracking goes, it does an awesome job. I’m sure other more pricier options out there like the Oura do a better job tracking but I refused to pay for a monthly subscription and they are also more expensive & bulkier. In all reality none of these rings are 100% accurate but they give you a baseline.

As far as the battery goes, the ringconn last me anywhere from 10-11 days and I love that!! Very pleased with my purchase and definitely recommend it.
Author: Carlos

Title: I love this ring
Content: I love this ring, it's comfortable and has a long battery life. Accurate sleep tracking is nice. The only this is that the step count is too high, but that's kind of expected with a ring.

Title: Really enjoying the ring so far
Content: Really enjoying the ring so far. All of the features are great in helping to monitor my health and make improvements. The battery last a very long time and it charges extremely fast. And it looks great too! I have already recommend the ring to several friends and family members!
Author: Angela F

Title: The Support Team was very helpful with…
Content: The Support Team was very helpful with my refund request. Much appreciated.

Title: Honestly I liked it for the first week
Content: Honestly I liked it for the first week, but after that the connection to my phone kind of just sucks and it takes a long time to load any info. I’m not sure if it’s maybe just the one I got. At this point I kind of just treat it like an expensive ring now. Its smart capabilities arent that smart and it takes a fart all the time. The battery is not very good. And it is a pretty ring I’ll give it that but it scratches so easily.

Title: It will periodically mis-calculate the…
Content:
It will periodically mis-calculate the time asleep and Time in Bed; It will say time in bed 1:52am-732am, when I went to bed at 1130p or 12am. It is shorting me time in bed.
Other than that, I am happy with the RinConn Gen2 when it provides correct data.
Author: Steven Patrick Smith

Title: Your service department was great when…
Content: Your service department was great when I double paid. Your response was quick and efficient.
Author: Michele

Title: awwww shucks
Content: Date of experience: March 10, 2025

Title: Love It!
Content: The rings works just like its says, and no subscription to get your own data.
Author: Wit Chitrapongse

Title: Great alternative to smart-watch for biometrics.
Content:
Ringconn
Good product.

The app covers all the biometrics comprehensively. Information is displayed well and has both (i)explanations and (>) break-out boxes with more detail.
Previous daily data is a matter of swiping right (and left to come back). Judging from the calendar drop down this will probably include daily data for as long as you keep it.
Longer term trends are also available from a different tab.

The ring is easy to wear, remarkably lightweight, and looks good. The ring's durability has yet to be fully tested but has survived a fair amount of basic tool use and gardening so far. I don't avoid getting it wet with the exception that I avoid putting it in hot water (dishes, showers etc).

There's always minor issues that may be in development or just personal preferences, nothing at all show stopping though.
(Audience for the following is more for the developers.)
Y-Axis of graphs varies across days making visual comparisons inconclusive.
.. there could be user defined ranges.
.. or ranges could be re-aligned automatically when required.
.. these could be toggled on/off.
X-Axis includes multiple data points per column.
.. a single column contains low,medium,high,vigorous.
.. this could be a minute by minute line showing the fluctuations.
.. again this could be toggled on/off.
Sleep value went down after unusually large amounts of sleep.
.. makes sense, something is wrong... but;
.. app says "slow down", so is only looking at final score, not gross value of sleep.
(Also records 'sleep' while I'm screen-reading books)
The Stress indicator appears remarkably inaccurate. I don't know enough to make suggestions but it is an area that would likely benefit from some more research.
Data doesn't update without an internet connection.
.. surely the base calculations are simple enough to process on device. There are times when it quite difficult to obtain internet on a regular basis.
Some of those points would be concessions to battery life, and battery life was a primary consideration of purchase.
Author: CraigB

Title: The app's records are accurate
Content:
The app's records are accurate, and the presentation is excellent.
My expectation is that the exercise tracking feature will be further refined, and that an option for an app notification upon ring removal will be provided.
Author: 斌陽 鄭

Title: It si super easy
Content: It si super easy to use with long battery life and user friendly app.
Author: Jan

Title: Bad shipping and handling time and huge…
Content: Bad shipping and handling time and huge delay- still haven’t received the ring
Author: Kishore Balantrapu

Title: Annoying
Content: There’s no number to call if you have an issue and u have to email them and it takes 24 hours to get an answer and even then it’s just annoying. The want pictures of your hand if you say it doesn’t fit before getting an exchange which is ridiculous. The ring however is great.
Author: Janine Luizzi

Title: This Ringconn Gen Air ring is what I…
Content: This Ringconn Gen Air ring is what I needed. It tracks my heart health during the day and night, which is very important to me. I have a medical condition, Atrial Fibrillation, which I want to monitor all the heart functions. The ringconn ring allows Sp02, HRV, and Respiratory Rate. The Ringconn ring is comfortable to wear and light enough on my finger. I'm given a detailed report every day of my heart functions on my phone. All the information will provide me with what I am concerned with, so I can call my cardiologist and inform them of readings I need an explanation for. I'm aware the Ringconn ring is not FDA approved; they are working on this feverishly, but so far it's right on the money for me.
Author: MagW

Title: Lightweight, effective ring!
Content: The RingConn smart ring is indeed so light you quickly forget it. Its measures are quite accurate and similar to other famous smart watches. I'm just disappointed with the fact that it doesn't sync with Google Fit as announced.
Author: MERTES Pauline

Title: Daily Tracking is Easier
Content: Good product, accurate tracking with extra useful info. AI sleep assistant goes unused though.
Author: Tyler Golpe

Title: I am on about week 3 of using the ring…
Content: I am on about week 3 of using the ring and am loving it. It is easy to use and I'm amazed at the amount of information that it is able to track. So far my only suggestion is that it would be helpful if there were a marking on the outside of the ring, either top or bottom, to show when the two inside "pins" are properly positioned. In dim or dark situations it is often difficult for me to tell if the ring is properly positioned. The main reason I got the ring was to monitor my SpO2 which, for unknown reasons, had been dropping precipitously during the day and I needed to be able to track it in real time. I find the ring to be more accurate than the finger oximeter.
Author: Dori Barnett

Title: The dashboard of my health & habits
Content:
This piece of technology is helping me in ways I never thought possible.
It helps me see the results of my habits, good or bad; it lays them out for you right there.
Thanks guys.
PS: & the no paid subscription is a plus. : )
Author: Ray Rodriguez

Title: I have been using my Ringconn Gen 2 for…
Content: I have been using my Ringconn Gen 2 for a couple of weeks now. It does not seem very accurate in comparison to other activity trackers. It also does not fit well despite using the ring sizing kit and following the instructions. The ring is much looser than the sizer was. Perhaps that is why it seems inaccurate. For example, yesterday while walking on my treadmill I hit 10,000 steps per my Fitbit - which I know is reasonably accurate based on my speed, time, and distance walked - but the Ringconn showed less than 5,000 steps.
Author: Tammy

Title: I really love it
Content: I really love it. My pulmonologist is the one who highly recommended a smart ring so I researched the top three and found this ring to be the best for me. I have heart and lung issues and this is great it also gives me suggestions to help me improve my health.
Author: Carol Williams

Title: Love the data
Content: Love the data. Ring looks great too
Author: Rro

Title: The App Is Awful
Content: Stop using the ring because the free App is awful. I rather pay for a subscription than have a free app that gives poor quality
Author: Ashley Jones

Title: Great support
Content: Great support! Listen to concern and addressed.
Author: Davide Licata

Title: Most items tracked by RingConn is…sleep
Content: Most items tracked by RingConn is adequate is sleep but additional recovery of body energy would make the experience more complete.
Author: Jose Juan Lacson

Title: Ring was preordered
Content: Ring was preordered, arrived on time, color is even prettier than I expected. Ring connected easily and gives me what I think are very accurate readings. So far I'm very pleased and I am looking forward to the insights this ring provides for years to come
Author: BA

Title: I didn’t like the ring’s color
Content: I didn’t like the ring’s color. The software accuracy can be improved
Author: Heena Mariyam

Title: RingConn 2 Air
Content: I own both RingConn 2 models. My wife liked and kept my first purchase (which was for my pinky finger) so now I have purchased an Air for myself. I can't see any difference in weight or size between the two models. The specs indicate the Air has slightly shorter battery life and is made of Stainless Steel. The included charger is smaller but it doesn't include a battery like the standard model. I guess that's how they reduced the price. Personally I like the smaller charger and I don't mind charging it once a week. I do wish the gold color choice was available for the Air model. Now to the App... it doesn't have all the health metrics that the Apple watch has, but for what it does measure, the ring and watch are in close agreement. The RingConn app is easier to read at a glance and also easier to navigate. Drilling down, the detail is sensibly displayed using easy to understand graphs and charts. Finally, there is no monthly fee. Overall I think this is a great product. It does what it does exceptionally well and at a value price.
Author: brasche

Title: Great product, data and app
Content: I love the ring, it's comfortable to wear, and the data and app are great. I also really appreciate the no-subscription model, compared to other comparable products (it's the main reason why I chose RingConn). Only one criticism: at purchase, it wasn't apparent that a charging dock was included in the price; so I purchased a second one that I don't need.
Author: Enrico Pirotta

Title: Although my case is not resolved yet...
Content:
Although my case is not resolved yet, I felt that the support group was thorough in their investigations. It is possible that,, being an engineer, I understand this approach.
I think the support team had two clear objectives: keep their customer happy, and see if and how to improve their product.
Author: GOLDENBERG, GARRICK

Title: excellent product
Content: what can i say? this is an excellent product! hard to say how precise it is because the ring turns around the (my) finger from time to time. but the important thing is your own improvement or disimprovement over time anyways. there is not a point in the reviews i've watched that was wrong - the batterie time feels even way better than 11 days.
Author: han

Title: Good ring but it gets scratched easily…
Content: Good ring but it gets scratched easily even with the ring protector.
Author: Akash

Title: The ring fit perfect using the sizing…
Content: The ring fit perfect using the sizing kit. It stays charged a long time, and is more accurate than the watch that I have. The ring is for my husband and he is now more active since wearing it. He loves it. One of the reasons I got it was to let him know he does have sleep apnea, and the ring confirmed it. Nice job
Author: Rebecca B

Title: Fast, good quality, great insight in health
Content: Fast shipping, good quality, great insight in health
Author: Marjolein

Title: RingConn Gen 2 Review from 🇩🇪
Content:
RingConn Gen 2 Review – A Sleek Alternative to the Smartwatch

I’ve been using the RingConn Gen 2 for about three weeks now, and I have to say—I’m genuinely impressed.

Customer Support That Delivers
My experience started on a positive note even before the ring arrived. I accidentally ordered the wrong size, but after contacting customer support, they quickly and efficiently arranged for the correct size to be shipped instead. The entire process was smooth, and I received the perfectly fitting ring without any issues.

A Small Device with Big Capabilities
What really surprised me was how advanced this little ring is when it comes to tracking health data. It captures a wide range of metrics throughout the day with impressive accuracy. As someone who has used smartwatches in the past, I’d say the RingConn is a compelling alternative—especially for those looking for something more discreet and lightweight.

Whether you're monitoring workouts, sleep, or vital signs, the ring delivers solid insights. That said, during strength training or any activity involving weights, I’d recommend using finger tape to avoid potential scratches.

Comfort & Fit
I’m not someone who normally wears rings, but I quickly got used to this one. It feels natural on the finger and doesn’t shift or feel loose—even during runs or fast, sudden movements. I never once felt like it might fall off.

Final Thoughts & Sizing Tip
The RingConn Gen 2 combines style, comfort, and functionality in a surprisingly compact form. For anyone looking to track their health without the bulk of a smartwatch, this ring is absolutely worth considering.

My recommendation for sizing:
I suggest choosing a comfortable size for your index finger that also fits snugly on your middle finger and slightly looser on your ring finger. This gives you flexibility and ensures the ring stays comfortable throughout the day, no matter which finger you wear it on.
Author: Metha Minks

Title: A great ring!
Content: Customer service was quick to respond via email. The ring is great! Battery lasts about 6+ days so far. It is thinner and sleeker than its competitors, which is a major plus for someone with smaller hands. The app is free (no monthly fee) and is insightful and informative. I am pleased with my purchase.
Author: Beth E

Title: Impressive product

Content:

Title: Performance as advertised
Content: Performance as advertised. Manual lacking.

Title: Expensive for Plastic
Content: For how expensive the ring is I expected the casing to be metal not a plastic shell. Feels extremely cheap like a smart ring you can get off of TEMU/WISH. The battery and app for the ring are pretty nice though.

Title: Great product
Content: Happy about the product and the battery life and the information it provides, definitely comparable to Oura and probably a step up!
Author: Cody Lake

Title: Fast and easy service & good product
Content: Fast and easy service. Product as advertised!
Author: Dietrich

Title: RingConn is the best #1 in the industry
Content: I never write reviews but I had to for RingConn This is a amazing company and amazing products and customer service is the best I love my ring it works exactly how they say it does and it helps me with my day to day life and tracking all my health stuff and it looks so great and it very light and durable and the battery is crazy awesome I get 12 days and it is accurate and the charging case is just amazing and the app is so easy to use and a clean interface I love it there is so much more great stuff about this ring I totally recommend RingConn and customer service is number 1 they will help you with anything like any questions any concerns they got you and get to you fast just amazing I can keep going on with how the company and the product and customer service is the best but this will become a book I 100% recommend RingConn they are the best they are way better then all the other rings on the market #1 you will be happy thank you RingConn

Title: Placed an order on March 9, never got anything
Content:
Placed an order on March 9.
It’s currently April 13 and I still haven’t even received my sizing kit.

Support didn’t help at all and just keeps on asking to be patient.

So far it seems like money wasted…
Terrible experience
Author: Alessio Bertozzi

Title: Great product and no subscription…
Content: Great product and no subscription required.
Author: Jeffery Silva

Title: The return process unfortunately falls short.
Content: The return process unfortunately does not work well for the customer. I had to change ring sizes due to the ring being to loose. I used the sizing kit to choose the correct ring but the actual ring size fit to loosely. I had to ship the old ring back before they would ship the replacement which I had to pay for shipping. Ringconn provided a shipping label which ended up being ground shipping. This meant the ring would not get back to ringconn for 3 to 5 days. Meaning the new ring would not be shipped until received. I will be without the ring for almost two weeks. I consider this poor customer service. As a note sleep data is vastly over stated. The REM and DEEP stats are between three and four hours a night combined. My apple watch and Garmin are both under 2 hours. Based on the return experience and data issues I don't recommend this Ring. One positive note the battery life is amazing.
Author: Herbert Hoelle

Title: They sent the ring size kit and it…
Content: They sent the ring size kit and it arrived quickly. The ring took longer, since it was coming from Hong Kong. Set up was easy and I have been using it since it arrived about a month ago
Author: Christine Barbera

Title: Useful for figuring out where to make changes
Content: I really like having the ability to monitor my heart rate during exercise as well as my sleeping patterns. Its helped me make adjustments to have a better day. The sleep apnea tracker is helpful. The o2 isn't perfect but none really are. Overall worth the money! Even more so with no subscriptions
Author: Matthew S

Title: I had a first Gen ring and loved it
Content:
I had a first Gen ring and loved it
Then the battery life started to deteriorate so I reached out for advise.
Your Customer Service folks were great.
They had me try several techniques to fix the problem but nothing helped.
Then they generously offered me a discount on a Gen2. Here we are!
Author: Customer

Title: works well but needs better appearance
Content: The ring it self works pretty decent, but I don't like the color and the shape of the ring, it's not perfect round

Title: half sizes
Content:
I loveee the tech, I'm only a bit disgruntled because I feel that the ring size tester wasn't entirely accurate. I tried the 8,9 size for a few days each, went with the 9. Only to receive my ring and its slightly too big for my pointer. Thankfully it fits on my middle finger, its just not the placement I intended. I've used it for about a month and love this tech over having to wear a bulky watch that's vying for attention.
I'm now debating if its worth purchasing the size down.
Author: Melissa Barroso

Title: Ringconn is easy to use
Content: I like the ease of use and looking at my steps and sleep amounts. Best part is no monthly fee!

Title: Loving it so far
Content: Loving it so far! I've had the ring for a month, and it does everything as described. I also bought a protector for when I'm lifting weights, and it has worked perfectly to protect it. Also very happy there are no subscriptions.

Content: The app was easy to set up and the ring has so many features to it. I love that it has a long battery life and no subscription!
Author: Beth D

Title: LOVE the RingConn!!!
Content: I love the RingConn! I got my husband and myself the RingConn Gen 2 because of the longer battery life and the sleep apnea monitoring - the measurements it gets is accurate and the fact that you don't have to pay for a subscription is amazing and the primary reason we didn't get an Oura ring. The RingConns are super light feeling and it's nice that you can sync it to Apple Health and the Android Health, too. The only comments I have are that I wish the app has an option to put in health issues that affect your vitals and that the sizing rings versus the RingConn feel slightly different (the RingConn feels a couple of millimeters larger than the practice one, so we just bought spacers to help the sizing which worked) but it's overall great! Would highly recommend - in fact, I've been telling so many of my coworkers and friends about it, haha :)
Author: Ana G.

Title: I am very happy with the Ringconn Gen…
Content: I am very happy with the Ringconn Gen 2. I purchased it mostly to track OSA, and sleep. It's lightweight, no subscription required, and tracks many different interesting health factors. I have recommended it to family and friends. Thanks!
Author: Michelle

Title: Highly Recommend RingConn
Content: RingConn is great! I love that there is no subscription fee, and the amount of data you get from the ring is fantastic. It’s super slim on your finger so it isn’t irritating. It’s also the only ring on the market that tracks sleep apnea. This has helped me make a lot of lifestyle changes based on my health and help me catch when my anxiety starts spiking to start to regulate it.
Author: Scarlett

Title: The sizing kit and the actual ring size are different
Content:
The sizing kit and the actual ring size are different. I had to ask for a exchange since the ring I got was loos so I went from size 11 from sizing kit to 10 in actual ring.
The shipping from hong kong to canada takes way too long, it would be much better to ship from USA to canada.
The data and analytics in the app are quite basic, the AI feature and goal plans could be utilized more to make the ring better.
The other use of the ring could be in the gym, I need to track my heart rate while working out but the ring takes data in certain intervals, so I wish there was a feature to track heart rate constantly while working out like the apple watch does.
Author: bsebt

Title: No ring, no refund, no real answers – feels like a scamI genuinely wish I had read more…
Content:
I genuinely wish I had read more reviews before placing my order. I’ve had one of the worst customer service experiences ever, and at this point, I feel completely scammed.

I placed an order in February and never received the ring. When I reached out to customer service, I was met with cold, robotic replies that all start and end exactly the same. Every time I asked a question, even if it was a follow-up on the same issue, they just copied and pasted the same paragraph. It’s like talking to a bot, not a real person. There’s zero effort to actually help or resolve anything.

After going back and forth for weeks, I still have NO ring, NO refund, and NO clear explanation of what’s going on. It honestly feels like they’re just stalling, hoping I’ll give up. Their process is incredibly frustrating and makes you feel powerless.

I wouldn’t recommend this company to anyone. The lack of transparency, accountability, and basic human support is shocking. Avoid at all costs.
Author: MPNR

Title: Great product and customer service
Content: Great product and customer service
Author: Jorge Ruiz

Title: I had an issue and the Customer Service…
Content:
I had an issue and the Customer Service people were amazing. They resolved my issue, offered solutions and were patient and helpful and quick to respond!

Very impressive service!!
Author: Bruce M

Title: Data Accuracy
Content: The data provided by the ring in many cases is totally inaccurate. In particular the sleep analysis can be way off. For instance , it records me in deep sleep sometimes while sitting reading or on my phone prior to bed. Therefore, lying still in bed prior to falling asleep can be recorded totally wrong. Total sleep time and stages are generally not useful. Some other data like heartbeat may be much better.
Author: Robert Reusch

Title: My ring works as advertised.
Content: My ring works as advertised. Good value and does as promised. No subscription for the buyer is a plus! So far happy with my RingConn!
Author: Donovan Wallace

Title: "You Get What You Pay For"
Content: Great product & delivery. No problems. I was wearing a smart watch all day (including all night), but now remove it when I go to bed. I prefer to wear the RingConn while I sleep instead of the watch. Also, I purchase a cheap brand before I purchased the RingConn. It sparked a bit one time when I put the charging cord on it, & I had to sync it to get current info. "You get what you pay for."
Author: Joghog

Title: A+++++++!!!!!
Content: Date of experience: March 07, 2025
Author: Susan

Title: Great ring!
Content: It was about a week from my order of the ring to receiving it. Considering it was coming from China, I think that is great service! The price was fantastic, I loved that I was able to use my FSA to pay for it, and the ring works great! Ultimately, I am thrilled that there is no subscription needed to access my own health data, I think it's ridiculous that there are rings out there where you have to pay a subscription, on top of a high price, to see your health information.
Author: Amy

Title: I LOVE my ring!
Content: I LOVE my ring!! It is so cute and it works so well! I have had it for 3 weeks and only charged it twice, it does awesome with my steps and sleep, my only complaint is that my stress scores don’t always seem to be super accurate but besides that it has been fantastic!
Author: Morgan Veach

Title: Good ordering experience
Content:
The sizing kit is nice and arrived quickly. It was easy to confirm my size and complete my order. I was able to use the Shop app to track my shipment.
The Gen 2 is my first wearable purchase. I am pleased with the product. It's comfortable to wear and easy to use.
Author: Charity Fretty

Title: Great ring!
Content:
Great ring to monitor sleep, heart rate, stress level and basic daily activities. The battery lasts forever as advertised which was a seller for me. I did a VO2max test at my doctor wearing the ring and the heart rate monitoring was very accurate on the treadmill setting.
It is very light, slim and comfortable. I have the silver one which looks great with my gold wedding ring and mechanical watch.

My wishes:
Add more sports OR A FEATURE to monitor and record your heart rate in real time (to be displayed on a graph after) while you're doing a demanding cardio activity other than the 4 on the app.
Add swimming and a general indoor cardio workout for stationary machines.
VO2max reading?
Author: Marc

Title: Easy to set up and Easy to use.
Content: Date of experience: March 04, 2025
Author: Susan Pietraz

Title: Great product!
Content: Date of experience: March 04, 2025
Author: Paul Rhodes

Title: More good than bad
Content:
PROS: (1). Lightweight, attractive, well-built, comfortable to wear (2). User-friendly interface with easily understood and accessible data. GUI not “gimmicky” (3). Sleep apnea evaluation option (4). Fast response from customer service to questions (5). Outstanding battery life with fast recharge.
CONS: (1). Simply not dependable as a step-counting activity tracker. For instance, mowing on a riding lawn tractor for a few hours results in 17,000 steps counted. Per customer service: “certain devices may misinterpret some arm movements as walking, leading to an overestimation. Also, the ring estimates step count based on accelerometer data and other sensor inputs. Therefore, in daily life, certain movements—such as unconscious actions caused by ankle pain or hand movements while sitting—may sometimes be misinterpreted as steps, leading to an overestimation of step count.” So, 17,000 steps counted while seated. No sh*t, Sherlock! (2). Less than useful advice, like “The REM state still has room for improvement” without further recommendations.
OVERALL, while the device provides a wealth of data, much of that data and evaluation seems integrated into questionable accelerometer data, so the balance of the data feels less reliable than I had expected. However, I believe this is a common problem with ring-type trackers, and not unique to RingConn.
Author: Mirthmeister

Title: I’ve had a great experience with it
Content: I’ve had a great experience with it, the battery lasts a lot of time and I can monitor my sleep which is why I bought it for, the customer service is great, they are very friendly.

Content: Date of experience: February 28, 2025

Title: I like it but
Content: I wish there was a thinner option. I also wonder how accurate the steps are. I wish there was an option for exercise other then running and walking.

Content: Love this ring, lightweight but durable and tracks your health stats accurately. I love the very quick charging and that I can wear it all day.

Title: I placed an order for my ring on 21/03
Content:
I placed an order for my ring on 21/03, and the sizing box is still stuck in Hong Kong. Is this some kind of joke? Will I even receive my ring this year?

I’m extremely disappointed with the delay.
