Title: After it finally arrived, good purchase
Content: After it finally arrived, I have worn it daily. Battery life is phenomenal! The interface is clean and simple to navigate. Comparing it with the Apple Watch and IFit biking monitor, it appears to be very accurate. I bought it specifically to track the improvements of my sleep apnea after dramatic weight loss. Overall a good quality product. Customer service is slow, as is order fulfillment, if these issues don’t bother you get it.
Author: Barry L.

Title: It’s comfortable and stylish
Content: It’s comfortable and stylish! I love all the information it provides.
Author: NICOLE L SCHULTZ THOMAS

Title: Fast delivery and the ring is very…
Content: Fast delivery and the ring is very nice, and operates to my expectations. Great battery life and excellent vitals tracking. I wish there were more exercise option’s available for use!!
Author: Jimmy K

Title: This was a great purchase!
Content: I wish that we could rate in halves. This is a great ring so far, definitely a solid 4.5 stars to date. I’d like to have more control with changing parameters (step expectations, and better sleep tips…). The battery life is easily near two weeks making it great for trips away, we did purchase the charging base that easily lasts 14-15 separate charges. I purchased this for my wife, I’d definitely purchase another RingConn ring for myself if coupons were given with each purchase. I highly recommend this smart ring over the others as no monthly subscription is required and the app that comes with RingConn covers all the bases.
Author: ROBERT MACDONALD

Title: Customer service
Content: After I hadn't heard that it was shipped for Christmas, I called and the person on other end made sure to track it down. I did receive it a day before Christmas. It was so important!! Great customer service!
Author: Cathy Toplyn

Title: No subscription needed
Content: No subscription needed. Ring is light and feels good. Sizing is slightly different than sizer rings that shipped before I got my actual ring. Great experience so far.
Author: Brian Rittman

Title: Great insight, no subscription
Content: Battery life is great, fit is good as is scratch resistance
Author: Rob

Title: Great product and highly recommended…
Content: Great product and highly recommended for anyone that cares about their health!
Author: Tarek

Title: Excellent tracking device.
Content: Excellent tracking device.
Author: Kiran R

Title: The ring seems to do a great job of…tracking sleep
Content: The ring seems to do a great job of tracking sleep. I find that it mostly tracks with my memory of each evening. I hope the heart rate and blood oxygen numbers are accurate as I am using those for tracking sleep apnea events. I would appreciate an easy way of getting the data to a computer for better and more detailed analysis. While I wear the ring all the time I do not find much value using it while walking and working out at the gym. My apple watch is easier to use and provides more functionality for these activities.
Author: kenn denton

Title: Easy ordering process and delivery.
Content: Easy ordering process and delivery.
Author: smknbud

Title: The packing is great and very the…
Content: The packing is great and very the overall information is very informative. There are some aspects of the things the ring tracks that are confusing as it doesn’t really explain what it means.
Author: Lallie Urchek

Title: I really enjoy the RingConn 2
Content: I really enjoy the RingConn 2, but after comparing it to the Oura Ring 4 for over a month now, the difference in sleep detection is WAY off. Most often it will be off by 1-2 hours. I do notice the heart rate is very close to the Oura Ring 4 and Apple Watch, it is almost spot on with my pulse ox. Just my biggest complaint is the sleep detection, once I adjust the time manually the REM and Deep Sleep are about 90% of the time very similar to the Oura Ring 4. The one benefit of the RingConn 2 though is the no subscription, it is a one time buy and that’s it. For that, I have to change my original rating of 3 stars to 4 stars.
Author: B. Freeman

Title: Bought this for my wife and she no…
Content: Bought this for my wife and she no longer wears it. The ring does not measure accurately when she is working out.
Author: Rob Hoch

Title: Love it
Content: Love it! Much better than my previous 2 years using Oura!
Author: Joe Frisbie

Title: I was having problems with my ring not connecting and was quickly sent clear instructions how to solve the problem
Content: E was having problems with my ring not connecting and was quickly sent clyin
Author: Peter Lagden

Title: Great Ring
Content: I had another Ring product, RingConn is so much better
Author: Sam Pillai

Title: Ringconn is not very accurate
Content: Ring is not very accurate with steps and distance. Sleep monitoring often says I had a great night of sleep while in reality I struggled and was up all night. Not too happy with the product. Also wished it monitored more activities than just the three options. My Apple Watch does a better job so I’ll go back to wearing that.
Author: Joseph Schueller

Title: Incredible service
Content:
Incredible service, the sizing kit and the ring arrived on time to Mexico, all the package in good condition. The ring is so nice, I liked too much. RingConn is a good option too tried if you want price-quality.
The only thing is that the option to register training is limited to 4 options
Author: Marce Estrada

Title: The ring is perfect
Content:
The ring is perfect ! Beautiful and with a great app
Measures are reliable and precise
I’m pleased by my new RingConn
Author: Renato D'Uva

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Superb Product
Content: Ease of doing business with you and the additional info you send out. Thanks a million for the superb service you provide. It is greatly appreciated.
Author: Marlyn Eittreim

Title: Had a great experience with their…
Content:
Had a great experience with their customer service. My wife and I both had the same issue during the holidays as others that purchased gen 2 rings with gen 1 sizing kits (1 ring size difference). After explaining our issue the team went out of their way to send us the correct sizes and prepaid for the return shipment of the original rings.

We can’t be happier with the product’s performance and look forward to future enhancements.
Author: John S

Title: It’s been over a month and I still…
Content: It’s been over a month and I still haven’t received my ring
Author: Jocelyn Johnson

Title: I loved the first gen but gen2 is even…
Content: I loved the first gen but gen2 is even better! Enjoy the sleep data!
Author: Kate

Title: great battery life
Content: great battery life, good interface and detailed information. also super light!!
Author: h chow

Title: Super disappointed
Content: I loved the ring at first, loved the data and keeping track of my health. But after six months the battery will no longer hold a charge and it is basically useless. I contacted ringconn and they insist that I do a bunch of troubleshooting and track data for two weeks to prove that it’s not working. They refuse to replace it until I’ve done this, and I have my doubts that they will replace it even then. I guess that’s the risk you take when you try a new product that hasn’t been around long enough to really test. I’m so disappointed by the quality and lack of customer service.
Author: Damon

Title: I just feel like this ring doesn’t do…
Content: I just feel like this ring doesn’t do as much as I thought. It tracks all the right things, but doesn’t always stay well connected to my phone which makes me question accuracy. Also a competitor has the option to be woken up when in light sleep rather than deep sleep and if that could be in the next update that would be huge for me. I would be open to more notifications too because I feel like I’ve only gotten them when the battery was dying. Which also doesnt seem to last as long as i expected, but i have only charged it once so far.
Author: Kylie Bosker

Title: The sleep tracking seems to be good and…
Content:
The sleep tracking seems to be good and the main reason I bought it. It looks good also and is fairly scratch resistant.

The heart rate portion is absolutely horrendous. I use a heart rate sensor when riding my bike and the ring is not even remotely close, like 100 BPM off when I'm on my bike - my ring thinks I need to move lol. It makes me wonder how good anything it recommends could be when the heart rate, which seems like a basic function, is off so bad.
Author: Gil Johnson

Title: Keeps an accurate account of your body…
Content: Keeps an accurate account of your body and sleep
Author: Sherry Worthington

Title: Ring conn Gen 2 is fantastic recording…
Content: Ring conn Gen 2 is fantastic recording info for my medical needs.
Author: Gary Baal

Title: The ring and the information I receive…
Content: The ring and the information I receive from it is amazing. This is not a 5 star because getting started was not a pleasant experience. Better instructions for people who are not 'techy' would be much appreciated.
Author: Dr. Kav

Title: RingConn is fantastic
Content: This ring tracks vital statistics and helps me understand what is going on with my health. It also motivates me to be more active and to pay attention to my sleep. It provides an at a glance view of how you are doing and it also has a more in depth view of each area. It shows what is considered normal so you can see if there are any potential problems. I highly recommend this for everyone.
Author: Laurie

Title: I love it!
Content: I love the ring! It's super lightweight so you barely notice you're wearing it, and the data is phenomenal! I was tired of having an extension of my phone on my wrist so I switched to an analog watch but still wanted to track my health stats, so this is the perfect solution! My only complaint is that I had no idea it was coming from Hong Kong (maybe that's my fault for not reading more details) so it took a whole month to get to me (I'm in Canada) since I didn't already know my size. If I had known my size, I think it would have taken half that time. But it was worth the wait!
Author: Michelle

Title: Within a week I was loving the RingConn…
Content: Within a week I was loving the RingConn Gen 2. I had been using an Apple Watch but could only wear it overnight because of iteration to skin. I can wear this ring all the time -- and then also can have it do Sleep Apnea assessment (which I have, but I like to track issues for when I'm not wearing my CPAP). No regrets. Definitely recommend.
Author: Sean McKay

Title: I am very happy with the ring
Content: I am very happy with the ring and the app. I really liked that the app includes Spanish in its language settings and is very clear. I love the product.
Author: Adela Sanchez Perez

Title: Pleased
Content: I am basically very happy with the ring. It looks like, and provides more useful health info than my apple watch, and battery life is incredible.
Author: Rene Wolfe

Title: I upgraded from Gen 1 and WOW!!
Content: I upgraded from Gen 1 and WOW!!! This ring is so light and beautiful! I love the upgrade in accuracy/technology… I never take it off and it still makes it through weights and dishes!
Author: Stacy Froehlich

Title: Great product and service
Content: Date of experience: November 18, 2024
Author: Anonymous

Title: I wanted to keep track of my sleeping…
Content: I wanted to keep track of my sleeping patterns as well as steps each day. Don't know how to set it for all the features but it does a good job of giving the information I bought it for. Comfortable and nice looking.
Author: Virginia

Title: I miss more training Option
Content:
I miss more training Option. Cycling, Running , indoor Running an Vikings is to leas. What about gym, Yoga or pilates, horse riding….

The rest is fine
Author: Volker Lueck

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Great product
Content: Harry Potter addict great shipping great customer service overall great
Author: Robert Matthews

Title: Customer service did not respond to the…
Content: Customer service did not respond to the questions I asked. They responded, but with general responses. After lengthy delays in receiving my order, and no delivery in sight, I asked to cancel. they said they would refund a delivery fee. I had to ask them to refund the entire order fee since I never got my order from them.
Author: Elizabeth

Title: Info given by Ringconn App is very…
Content: Info given by Ringconn App is very relevant and is helping me be a healthier person. My quality of sleep has also greatly improved.
Author: Phi Ver

Title: Horrible
Content: Horrible. Never received my producer and eventually just canceled the order after about a month of waiting
Author: Simeon Wilson

Title: A Wealth of data
Content: A wealth of data but requires interpretation. As a physician I can piece together all the data and draw conclusions but I can see how people may find it difficult to interpret and find the UI complex.
Author: Hannah Chan

Title: Not enough types of exercises to choose…
Content:
Not enough types of exercises to choose from. So the evaluation MAY NOT be accurate.
I swim 40 minutes on Monday, 40 minutes on Wednesday's and 40 minutes on Friday. Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays I exercise for 60 minutes on a Pilates Reformer Machine.
But, there is no place to inputting on the Ring Conn App
Author: Avelina Petrie

Title: Sleep Function is terrible has never…
Content: Sleep Function is terrible has never recorded over four hours in 2 weeks
Author: John Summers

Title: Love the in depth specific info.
Content: Love the in depth description of information. Sleep info even noticed my breathing difficulties due to allergies! I am amazed!
Author: Michael Svoboda

Title: Great value
Content: Great value, ai need to be more integrated
Author: Kamel Albaqshi

Title: Message questions never get responce
Content: I've asked a number of times when will more workout routines be added, what is in future releases and what time frame. Never get a reply
Author: Peter

Title: Doing what I wanted it to do
Content: Seems to be close to the steps count on my Garmin Vivoactive 5. I have sleep apnea and an Inspire implant and use an oxygen monitoring ring and this is another tool to monitor my sleep apnea and the ring seems to be capturing events. So far this has been a useful tool for the reasons I use it and is adding to my arsenal of health monitoring devices. I'm happy with it and my husband will probably get a Gen 2 ring, also.
Author: Marilyn

Title: My ring has been out for delivery for…
Content: My ring has been out for delivery for many days and I have not gotten a satisfactory explanation
Author: Mariana Guerrero

Title: Got it for sleep tracking and it works…
Content: Got it for sleep tracking and it works great. Also the silver looks nice. Only gripe is that the ring is slightly bigger than the sizing ring and there are no returns or exchanges. However fit is okay. A little loose but stays on
Author: Rodney Everett Brooks

Title: Thank you for the product that…
Content: Thank you for the product that stimulates healthy roles and we hope you will add exercises and recovery status.
Author: Ahmed Alshareef

Title: Good Overview
Content: Good Overview, helpful information and analytics
Author: Unbekannt

Title: Does not work
Content: Does not work. would like to return
Author: Jolynne Tranberg

Title: Love my Gen 2
Content: So far so good as I haven’t had it long. The data is comprehensive & the app is easy to use. The feedback is great & I am adjusting my day accordingly to the information I receive. I’m really enjoying it!
Author: Belinda Sherrin

Title: I compare Garmin Instinct 2X Solar a…
Content: I compare Garmin Instinct 2X Solar a RingConn gen2. Sleep and steps are better count with Ringconn.
Author: Pavlína

Title: Great Ring, unique sizing, not so good shipping
Content: The ring is fantastic with amazing tracking abilities. I love that it tracks pretty much everything my smart watch does, but in a small package that doesn’t stand out. The fit is a little disappointing, because of sensors and shape I had to get a 14, I’m a 12-12.5 normally, since there are no half sizes I find myself switching fingers throughout the day as my fingers change. The one BIG let down from me was shipping. The site said 5-7 days for the sizer, but nothing on the ring itself. I paid for expedited shipping and it took 2 weeks to get!!! How long is normal shipping? If you can’t expedite at least refund the extra shipping fee, or notify the customer. It took a week from the package tag being created to even leave Hong Kong!
Author: Jeff C.

Title: I like the ring but wish it had more…
Content: I like the ring but wish it had more types of exercises to choose from. The list is very limited.
Author: Willy Agee

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Great ring
Content: The ring sizer came right away. Then the ring came within days of my order. I love the ring and the app is easy to use. It gives me great information! My only disappointment was that it didn't come in rose gold, which I really wanted. Then found out it was released 2 weeks after I got mine. Gggrrr. I wish they would have given the release date in advance.
Author: ML

Title: awesome, does exactly what I want it to do
Content:
Bought it because I wanted something small & minimalistic to track my heartrate (during normal life and exercise), and it is exactly what I wanted & expected. I have not yet found a part I do not like.

Would be nice if I could integrate it more in my android (add the ring-power to the status bar or add some information on my lock-screen) but that's not a must and imo not the fault of Ringconn :D
Author: Alex

Title: Response time
Content: I got a response once every 24 hours, sometimes even 48 hours so it took forever for me to get my ring exchanged.
Author: Mya Pena

Title: There's a lot of information with your…
Content: There's a lot of information with your ring and I'm still trying to navigate the info.
Author: Linda Overman

Title: Great device, but needs some improvements
Content: I like the ring, and I'm comparing it to previous Oura, witch to be honest it's much more expensive. So the app is nice with a lot of data, the design has place for improvement however. What I don't like is how nap detection works, sometimes it does some time it doesn't and you either sleep for 30, 45, 60 minutes, it's never between.
Author: Eduard Stern

Title: Top notch customer service
Content:
This is the second ring I’ve bought. The first was for my wife who is extremely pleased with it. This second one is for me. Truth be told, l had a lot of problems receiving it. Indeed somewhere along the shipment line it must have got lost. However the customer service was absolutely top notch and after having made the necessary verifications a new one was sent out. Very kind and friendly service.
As for the ring itself, the info is very useful and interesting to have and actually makes a difference to some habits one might have.
Very good!
Author: John Franco Zanin

Title: Straight crap
Content: Straight crap doesn’t even hold a charge for a whole day. We’ve tried letting it sit on the charger overnight before wearing it for and it dies so fast. Even tried to reset/reboot and still dies so fast. I spent money on this product over a year ago for about $300 when the Black Friday deal was going on. Now it won’t even charge at all. Died after three hours of wear today and it’s been sitting on the block for a few hours and nothing. Straight crap and disappointed on wasting my money on this.
Author: Phoebe Graham-powell

Title: Great product with on demand features
Content: Great product with needing the on demand O2 measurement and heart rate as well. Good response for inquiries on ring. App easy to understand and work. Hoping for BP measurement in future updates.
Author: Eddy & Sheila

Title: RingConn Gen 2 - Fantastic Ring!
Content: Fantastic product - the RingConn Gen 2 was received quickly as well as the sizing kit (over Christmas/New Year). The actual ring is great, data gathering is excellent and very durable (hardly a scratch in 3 weeks of daily wearing). Only issue for Australia is the use of Aramex for postage, and they did not require signature for delivery, so just had to be aware throughout the planned day of delivery.
Author: Marco A

Title: Battery life and the software is pretty…
Content: Battery life and the software is pretty good. What I would like to see added, are links to other fitness and health apps, such as Strava. For example, if I ride a peloton bike indoors, there's no way to tell the ring as only three sports are listed.
Author: Christopher Meyer

Title: In accurate HR data during exercise + extremely difficult exchange approval process
Content: In accurate HR data during exercise. HR measured does not go above 110 bpm, when I am obviously breathless, and Apple Watch measures 170 bpm. I also purchased another ring for someone else and needed an exchange - it was exceptionally difficult to get an exchange approved and to get shipping label for return, as well as to receive the tracking number of the new ring. I had to jump through a lot of hoops to get what I needed, it was very unnecessary and a bad way to run a business.
Author: Pate Hudson

Title: I was still able to order a ring when…
Content: I was still able to order a ring when it was being discontinued
Author: Noelle Beck

Title: Sleep monitoring is good, activity monitoring not so good.
Content:
The sleep monitoring seems to be very accurate.
And the information the app shows in every aspect is very important in order to make changes and adjustments to your lifestyle.

I just wish there were more options of monitoring your data while one is working out,
I don t run outdoors nor do i do any cycling(which are the main activity monitoring modes) but i do the elyptical machine indoors, and other physical exercises, that the ring cannot fully translate as a work out session sometimes, the step measuring does not seem to be fully accurate also.
Author: João Ramos

Title: Excellent device with some areas to improve
Content:
It's an amazing device but still room for improvement. Some areas to improve are:
-More exercise options like rowing
-Automatic exercise detection
-Connect to other devices to improve accuracy, devices like under mattress sleep tracker, blood pressure monitoring or smart watches and alike
-More skins for example wood or engraving on metal sheet
Positive advantage
- smaller size
- battery
- no subscription
- battery case
- value for money
- excellent sizing kit exact replica of ring
Author: Ali

Title: Arrived fast
Content: Arrived fast. I am very pleased with the ring and the info it gives. Exactly what I was looking for.
Author: Nor A.

Title: Game-Changer for Smart Wearables! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Content:
I’ve been using the Ringcom Smart Ring for a few weeks now, and I’m beyond impressed! The design is sleek, lightweight, and incredibly comfortable—I often forget I’m even wearing it. The health tracking features are spot on, providing accurate insights into my heart rate, sleep patterns, and activity levels.

What really sets this ring apart is its seamless integration with my devices. The battery life is outstanding, lasting several days on a single charge, and the app interface is intuitive and easy to navigate.

If you’re looking for a stylish and functional alternative to bulky smartwatches, the Ringcom Smart Ring is a must-have. Highly recommend!
Author: Aramis Mejia

Title: Really enjoying my ring
Content: Really enjoying my ring. The sleep app is very helpful along with my vital signs. Love to see those Steps add up as well
Author: Nancy

Title: First impressions after a couple of weeks.
Content: The battery life if great as you only need to charge every one to two weeks. The RingConn team got back with me in a reasonable amount of time when I submitted question through the app. I would like to see improvements in the indoor activity tracking as it is not as accurate as I expected. The ring fit and comfort is great and I look forward to future app updates.
Author: Gary

Title: Great customer service
Content: Date of experience: January 15, 2025
Author: Denny Thomas

Title: My ring simply doesn't accurately track…
Content:
Based on my experiences over the past two weeks of continuous use—both during the day and at night—I have some concerns about the RingConn's activity tracking accuracy. Specifically, I've noticed that the sleep tracking data appears to be significantly off. For example, on the first two nights, despite getting nearly 7 hours of sleep, the app recorded only about half that duration. I initially expected that ongoing use might help refine the sleep tracking algorithm, but so far, the nightly data has not improved.

For additional context, I primarily wear the ring on my left index finger, and occasionally on my middle finger, where it fits perfectly. As a comparison, I monitored my sleep with an Apple Watch, which consistently recorded around 7 hours of sleep each night. This contrast between the two devices leads me to question the overall reliability of the RingConn in tracking sleep and daily activity accurately.
Author: Richard Allen

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Customer service is the very best
Content: Customer service is the very best. I was able to communicate by phone and email.
Author: Evelyn Krempp

Title: Poor customer service after initial order
Content:
They sent me the wrong size, made me jump through all these hoops to return it, including 2 different photo shoots of the product days apart. I’ve been emailing asking for them to send me the size I ordered, been about a month now. Still no new one on the way.
The customer service after the initial order is terrible!!!!
Author: Mark

Title: So far so good!
Content: I love the battery life, the look, and how easy it is to read the summaries. However, I do wish that there are more exercises you can select from. That is the only downside I see so far.
Author: Marie

Title: had 1st generation and batter would not…
Content: had 1st generation and batter would not hold a charge sent me 2nd generation for a discount price
Author: DB

Title: Very responsive and helpful
Content: Very responsive and helpful
Author: Collin Young

Title: One of the best purchases I have made!
Content: My RingConn took me to the next fitness level. It has really helped me to understand my sleep and exercise patterns. It is comfortable and stylish. Great product!!
Author: Susanne S

Title: To get the ring it took forever to ship
Content: To get the ring it took forever to ship and receive. Unfortunately the size was wrong and had to send back to get it exchanged. Today it’s been almost 2 weeks since I started my return process and still haven’t received a notification saying it’s been shipped. Incredible and ridiculous the amount of time you guys take to send customers their orders.
Author: SA

Title: A great buy
Content: I am very much satisfied
Author: Mo

Title: I mean you weren't able to fix my…
Content: I mean you weren't able to fix my problem but did allow me to return the ring. However it's been a day and I'm still waiting the return label that i was told would be sent to me. 🤷‍♀️
Author: Maja Smith

Title: great customer service communication
Content: Date of experience: January 14, 2025
Author: Geoffrey Rodriguez

Title: Great experience so far
Content: Great experience so far! As it collects more of my data its insights are getting more accurate. The platform is fairly intuitive, and the AI feature has potential.
Author: Samantha Doody

Title: Exceeded my expectations
Content: The ring is comfortable, reliable and informative. I have been really impressed by how well it tracks my data and I am now using the ring instead of my Apple Watch. I have been particularly impressed by how it sets my daily goals and tracks my sleep quality. The only thing that could be improved is how well it tracks my exercise.
Author: Aisha

Title: I love this ring
Content: I love this ring, is small easy to wear and cool health tracking, I wish the app has a partner with other app or an option to include daily meals to find a way to track vitamins/etc. and how could I improve on my meals.
Author: Laura M Castellanos D

Title: I really like the ring
Content:
I really like the ring. It is comfortable and most of the time I either don't know its there, or it gives me something to fidget with.

I do wish the values has a little more information to understand them better. You get a stress reading, but how is it determined?

The sleep is pretty accurate for me.

Activity is accurate but while doing activity the heart rate function doesn't seem very accurate.

Overall a good product and I'm enjoying it.
Author: Brian Terry

Title: It îs a long time from demand to…
Content: It îs a long time from demand to receive the ring.
Author: Alain Maxut

Title: Sleep Tracking Rocks
Content: I have had my ring for two weeks now and am very happy with it. I recently had major surgery and was concerned that my sleep was sub par. My Gen1 ring has proven that my sleep is better than I thought. I am very active around our property and the rings' finish has been extremely durable. I would by this smart ring again!!
Author: Mark Nash-Ford

Title: Love the ring!
Content: Love the ring! Goes into pretty good detail however, I would love an update similar to the ultra human which tells you your reasoning for stress and recommendations for caffeine intake accordingly. Also lacking different types of activities to select from which is something I was unfortunately expecting but have not seen.
Author: Aneesa Shakir

Title: Data is accurate
Content: Data is accurate, ring looks great, price is right, excellent app and best of all no monthly subscription.
Author: Anthony Hess

Title: The ring works great
Content: The ring works great. App is thorough and easy to use. Holds charge several days.
Author: customer

Title: RingCon is a SCAM
Content:
I would never purchase an item from this company again and will do anything within my power to urge anyone I know in the wellness spectrum to do the same.

I was assured I would have a ring available in my girlfriend’s size for Christmas. I paid and made the order and then was told the day after Christmas they are no longer making her size or model. This was not communicated clearly. Judging from your instagram page it seems I am not alone in my plight.
Author: ConcernedBuyer

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Good ring with lots of insight
Content: Shipping took a little longer than expected, but everything was well packaged. The ring is good and the app is user friendly with a lot of insight! The sizing kit is accurate to the ring as well. The ring itself is very lightweight, I hardly know I’m wearing it. I think it’s a great alternative to Oura (I could not justify the price and monthly subscription) and this ring seems to do it all without as high of a price tag!
Author: Molly

Title: Vital stats
Content: I bought the ring for tracking vital statistics and sleeping information. It has given me some interesting insights.
Author: Edith

Title: Well worth the price
Content: I wanted a smart ring because I can’t stand to sleep with my smart watch on. I received a ring for Christmas but it was a cheaper one. It worked for a few days then wouldn’t connect to my phone at all. I researched and decided on this RingConn. I have had a great experience with it and I love all the information it gathers for me. I highly recommend it.
Author: Pam Davis

Title: This ring is awsome
Content:
This ring is awsome. It gives informations not just about how many steps a day I make but also gives informations on sleep apnea, mood, stress etc...
It might not be exact on the steps I make depending on what i'm doing but it makes me want to move, walk, exercise and that's good for my health.
And the charge last for at least 7 days so I can wear it all day long. I am really satisfied.
Author: Manon GENEAU

Title: Pro and cons
Content:
The sleep tracking is quite accurate and stable compared with many other trackers. The heart rate monitor too.
The app is just right, simple and not overwhelming.
It doesn't feel bulky wearing it.
The step tracking is actually very bad, sometimes I get up in the morning, I get to the kitchen and I have 300 steps counted.
The exercises are very very limited, there is nothing about anaerobic exercises such as bodyweight.
I hate the fact that I need the charger to exit airplane mode, in 2025 it shouldn't be. I can't wear it while welding ( which is a big part of my job) and my phone drains the battery looking for the ring, if I put it in airplane mode I need to bring the charger with me, but most of smart ring wearers do it because of the very small size of it and if I need to bring the charger at work it loses part of the porpoise.
Overall a great product.
Author: Vincenzo Tomei

Title: Great product
Content: Great product, excellent service and fast delivery
Author: Shabry Suhaid

Title: Great info from a ring-love it!
Content: Provides all the information I want, sleep data, vital signs including oxygen saturation and steps. I also love the sleep apnea data. I had a Garmin forerunner 55 but I find the ring more comfortable. I wore both the ring and watch for 4 days and the stats from both were comparable.
Author: Sue

Title: Excelente dispositivo
Content: Excelente dispositivo
Author: Dolores Villa

Title: My ring finally arrived and the…
Content: My ring finally arrived and the packaging was impressive! It’s early days but so far I am very pleased with the overall functionality and supporting application. Key to greater usefulness going forward will be the addition of a much wider range of activities for tracking. Ideally, the ring could sense activity levels and start tracking on its own? Hopefully the company doesn’t make the mistake of its predecessors and start to try and figure out how to get more money out of us with subscriptions unless there is significant value add.
Author: Doug

Title: Great product
Content: Bought this as a birthday gift for my husband who is 79. Gives me great piece of mind knowing we can check his phone for all of his vitals!! Would highly recommend.
Author: Maureen

Title: Easy to use
Content: Easy to use, lots of info
Author: DMS

Title: Thin and Light Fitness Ring
Content:
this ring is so thin and light compared to others on the market and battery lasts for days i love it! perfect for what i was looking for with cheaper and thinner ring without a subscription, but still great quality

the only thing I will say though is that it is a pretty bright/brassy yellow gold color rather than some of the real gold I have, but honestly not that annoying
Author: EK

Title: Great customer service
Content: Great customer service. I had to exchange my ring because I accidentally ordered the wrong size. The return and exchange was easy. Customer service got back to me within 24 hours after sending email.
Author: April White

Title: The ring fascinated me
Content: The ring fascinated me. I think the ring is better than a smartwatch, especially because of its versatility and the fact that it looks more like a piece of jewelry than a biometric device. The battery life is spectacular, the app is very useful, and they are constantly updating it. The time to receive the ring is approximately one month. There are two packages: first, the sizing trial rings arrive, and finally the actual ring, so you need to be patient, but the wait is worth it.
Author: Rene Cabrera

Title: Still assessing my new RingConn 2
Content: Still assessing my new RingConn 2. Overall, and everything has been fine. The walking exercise app showed that I "walked" through fences and neighbors houses on a circular route. It also dropped a significant portion of my bike ride.
Author: Richard Parker

Title: As a backer of the Kickstarter…
Content:
As a backer of the Kickstarter campaign, I had ordered a 2nd ring for me.
Now, months of daily use, me and my wife a very happy with the rings as they are working as expected.
Overall, rings and accessories are from good quality and easy usage. Shipping was OK, support answers quite fast.
Author: Hermann Schweighofer

Title: The HRV does not seem normal
Content: The HRV does not seem normal. My Apple 9 watch shoes a totally different heart rate. Other people say the same thing. The apple watch is more accurate. Please fix this and your ring is definitely a five star. Both my wife and I have a Ringconn.
Author: Eugene OGrady

Title: Easy to purchase
Content: Easy to purchase and fairly good response times. Sizing kit is excellent. The app requires it to remain open to send notifications. Took some guessing to figure it out with Android. Took several months before the ring learned my movements and sleep patterns to start accurately tracking.
Author: Crystal Merritt

Title: Great experience so far
Content:
Great experience so far! RingConn is a solid company, Im loving the product and definitely will keep using it until I can’t anymore!
RingConn’s community and communication is great, the product is top notch technology, and I could order accessories easily.
Author: Nathalia Lother

Title: Love the product
Content: Love the product, love the data, love the app is getting updates, and love the lack of subscription fees.
Author: Eric

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Horrible Customer Service
Content:
Terrible customer service! When I attempted to cancel my order before it was shipped the obstacles were enormous. It took 6 weeks going back and forth, and I was made to come up with all kinds of justification why this wasn’t the product I wanted.
If you must get this smart ring order it through Amazon and hope you don’t need any after purchase customer service support.
Author: Flagger Ed

Title: Best smart ring
Content:
Amazing Innovation – The RingCon Smart Ring is a Game-Changer!

I recently purchased the RingCon Smart Ring, and it has completely exceeded my expectations. This innovative device seamlessly blends style, functionality, and advanced technology into a sleek, wearable gadget that has quickly become an essential part of my daily life.

Compact Yet Powerful

Despite its small size, the RingCon Smart Ring offers a wide array of features. From fitness tracking to health monitoring, it delivers accurate and reliable data, all at the tip of your finger—literally! It’s hard to believe how much technology is packed into such a lightweight and comfortable accessory.

Health and Fitness Tracking

The fitness tracking capabilities are outstanding. It tracks heart rate, steps, calories burned, and even sleep patterns with impressive accuracy. I love waking up and checking the detailed breakdown of my sleep cycle, which has helped me make significant improvements to my routine.

Seamless Connectivity

Pairing the ring with my smartphone was quick and effortless. The app is intuitive, with a clean interface that makes it easy to access insights and reports. Notifications and alerts from my phone are subtle yet effective, ensuring I stay connected without the constant distraction of checking my device.

Stylish Design

The RingCon Smart Ring is as stylish as it is functional. Its sleek, minimalist design makes it perfect for everyday wear, whether I’m at the gym, at work, or out for the evening. It doesn’t feel bulky or intrusive, and I’ve received countless compliments on its modern aesthetic.

Battery Life That Impresses

One of the standout features is the impressive battery life. A single charge lasts several days, which is incredibly convenient. I never feel tied down by constant charging, which is a huge bonus for any wearable device.

Durability and Comfort

The ring is made with high-quality materials that are not only durable but also comfortable for all-day wear. I barely notice it on my finger, and it holds up well to daily activities, including workouts and washing my hands.

Why I Recommend It

The RingCon Smart Ring is the perfect combination of practicality, style, and cutting-edge technology. Whether you’re looking to improve your health, stay connected, or simply own an innovative piece of tech, this ring is a fantastic choice.

Final Thoughts

RingCon has truly outdone itself with this smart ring. It has quickly become a staple in my routine, and I can’t imagine going back to life without it. If you’re on the fence about purchasing one, I wholeheartedly recommend giving it a try. You won’t regret it!

Five stars for this incredible product!
Author: OWURAOSEFATARA OSIYEFO

Title: Buyer Beware
Content: Hello Everyone, I was one of the original backers of RingConn. For us Ringcon promised a 2 year warranty. My ring has stopped working correctly after a year and half and now needs to be charged daily. They have said/admited that this should not happen and it is a warranty issue. They have really handled my defective ping poorly. They offered only $110 towards a Gen2 ring which is a joke. When I said no they offered to send me a new gen 1 ring. Both options are not good but at least the gen 1 replacement is better. I accepted that option. Now they're saying they don't have it and not sure when they will and they just expect me to wait. I've also read they are not manufacturing any more Gen 1 rings so it seems they just hope this will go be forgotten and go away. This is crazy. I have asked them to escalate this issue but I can feel the pushback like afraid to escalate to a manager. Also, it's sometimes days at a time before I receive a response back from them. The rings are not cheap as we all know. They have handled this very poorly and in my mind unacceptable if they were a reputable company.
Author: Jack Allen

Title: Really good great value
Content: Really good great value
Author: Neville Simmons

Title: Not only is the ring an excellent piece…
Content: Not only is the ring an excellent piece of gear, my experience with customer service has been extraordinarily good. This began during the Kickstarter stage and has continued into my ownership of the ring.
Author: Peter McPherson

Title: I love the sleep and sleep apnea…
Content: I love the sleep and sleep apnea results that I am getting. I realize I sleep better than I thought I did. And I thought I was more stressed but the app says I'm cool as a cucumber!
Author: Unhappy customer

Title: Love all the data!
Content: Love all the data!
Author: customer

Title: Your sleep numbers are WAY OFF …
Content: Your sleep numbers are WAY OFF compared to my Apple Watch and Oura Ring 4. Especially the Deep sleep numbers - many Times the actual numbers. How can you justify a product that is so inaccurate ?
Author: Gary Symonss

Title: The ring is comfortable and…
Content: The ring is comfortable and incorporates with Apple Health app. It is more accurate at counting steps than my watch. Comparing bpm with my watch and stationary bike workout, the ring registers 72, the watch 132 and the bike 135. The ring has four exercise options, I would like more.
Author: John Jackson

Title: Problem not solved
Content: Date of experience: November 11, 2024
Author: ALLAN RUBE

Title: Ringconn sleep data is inaccurate when…
Content: Ringconn sleep data is inaccurate when compared to Apple watch. Ringconn records sleeping as long as you are not moving eventhough you are awake. So I tried to return my Ringconn 2 ring and Ringconn customer service is being totally non cooperative. I have requested a return label 3 times. They refuse until I provide sleep data. Do not buy the Ringconn smart ring product.
Author: Jeff

Title: The ring works as described
Content: The ring works as described. I used the sleep aponia section and it gave me the same results (extremely close to) as my specialist gave me when I wasn't using the machine and the same results (extremely close to) as the machine when I was using it. Very impressive.
Author: Steve

Title: Terrible battery life
Content: The ring worked as advertised for about 6 months. Now, it only has less than 50% charge from when it was new. If I'm lucky, I get four days. Usually, it dies after three days use. Customer service is useless. They told me that after an "Exhaustive" search regarding my problem, that I need to charge it to 100%. Duh
Author: Robert Zils

Title: Great product
Content:
Great product, but not always very good at figuring out time in bed and time up. Would be useful to have 2 options for time asleep:
1) automated as it is now
2) manual. One tell Ring when we go to bed and when we wake up.
Author: Od

Title: Two months and I’m still waiting for my…
Content: Two months and I’m still waiting for my replacement ring. The company and customer service unfortunately have been horrible.
Author: Frank Milito

Title: Terrible customer service
Content: Terrible customer service. I made the mistake of thinking this ring measured Blood Pressure and when I realized it didn't I immediately e-mail them to send the ring back and they refused to reimburse me. I should have bought this on Amazon and not directly through the company. Amazon would have reimbursed me. Stay away from this company!
Author: Jon Van Zile

Title: Customer service is great and device offers greater value than expected
Content: Customer service is great. Had a problem with my order and they were very attentive with correcting it. The health information is generally accurate and the suggestions and insights are very helpful. I believe this is one of the few purchases that offers greater value than expected.
Author: Timothy Shreve

Title: Very unprofessional company
Content:
I can't speak to the product as I never received mine, after the 2 week shipping window had passed I checked the shipping tracker and found it wasn't even ready to ship, I reached out to them to find out what was going on they responded with "we noticed you directly chose a size we recommend you get a size kit first" no relevance to the inquiry! I had already had a size kit months before even ordering.
After several more nonsense back and forth messages they've agreed to refund which apparently takes 10 days! If you want to order this I would go with a trusted Amazon seller.
Author: Will Loewen

Title: The ring has a coating defect
Content:
The ring has a coating defect and is not waterproof. I was promised a replacement, but after 2 months, I still haven't received a new ring. Instead, I keep getting excuses. Very disappointed with the service. Order number: KS 552——U 19047.

After the change: i love the ring. The exchange was slow. But the servicecenter did there best
Author: R Salvia

Title: too bad there is no Italian language
Content: too bad there is no Italian language; with the update they added others but not this one

Content: It’s a easy way to keep track of my health
Author: Brian Scheerer

Title: Gen 2 battery is shorter than Gen 1
Content: Gen 2 lasts 4 days on one full charge. Gen 1 lasted me 7 days on one full charge. I may have received a defective Gen 2, but the included travel charger makes it easy to charge so I don’t care that much.
Author: SP

Title: Well worth upgrading
Content: This is a great tracking ring, well worth upgrading from the previous version
Author: Jeff

Title: Loving my Gen 2
Content: I've had my RingConn Gen 2 now for about 1.5 months. I have to say, it's amazing. I was worried about the charge as my Gen 1 didn't make it as long as stated. However, it's really amazing. The metrics also nearly perfect. I love the new AI app and adjustment of my metrics weekly. Also love how accurate the sleep algorithm is!
Author: Charles M. Bullins II

Title: Great Ring for everyday use
Content: Easy to use. Love to use it every day. It’s now 60 days and we would by it anytime again. Battery lasts full 7 days with training.
Author: Alishara

Title: it arrived fairly quick
Content: Product as pre - ordered and arrives with in a few weeks from the release date. I just wish there was a find my ring feature as some rings are a little bigger then the sizing kit
Author: Lloyd Dunwald

Title: I had a RingCon Gen1 and was pleased…
Content:
I had a RingCon Gen1 and was pleased with it.
The Gen2 has some more trackers a better battery.
Author: Mark Clark

Title: Love this ring! - from a newbie smart ring owner
Content: Ring is extremely well-made, with comfortable slim fit, much less bulky than any other ring on the market. Fit is slightly different than sizing kit, but this is most likely due to the smooth, slick internal coating of the ring versus the plastic material of the sizer. Comfortable to wear all day and all night. I find that the app is well-made, and although the app update changed the look of the main metrics page, it is intuitive and appears pretty accurate, particularly from a sleep tracking perspective. And the sleep score is extremely helpful--even when I get adequate or at least better length of sleep, I can associate my quality of rest accurately with a good or bad sleep score. Nap auto-detection is particularly impressive. I only wish workout detection was automatic and there were more options for workout types.
Author: T. McKee

Title: Never had I excepted to like this ring…
Content: Never had I excepted to like this ring so much. It’s just perfect. Data and battery life.
Author: Olivier

Title: No blood pressure monitor
Content: Date of experience: November 21, 2024
Author: Alistair MacPherson

Title: I compared beforehand…and the winner is…
Content: I compared beforehand, but Ringconn was the best choice for my needs. Now that I've been wearing the ring for about 2 weeks and have the analyses, I'm thrilled. The best decision for me, as I have defined and monitored my personal goals in the plan at no extra cost. It's just a shame that I can't use it with my Suunto watch, as that would really be the complete package for me, as I take the ring off for strength and calisthenics exercises.
Author: maryhappy

Title: Sleep and exercise tracking is great.
Content: Date of experience: December 08, 2024
Author: Justin Rataiczak

Title: Maybe I expect too much for the price…
Content:
Maybe I expect too much for the price point the outer ring is very cheap and scratches easy. Should be a more durable material such as stainless steel or titanium.

The metrics are good and very accurate when compared with my Garmin watch. I would Iove to see more metrics if it's possible.
Author: Scott

Title: Great ring but software could be improved
Content:
I love my RingConn ring. As I also own the gen 3 Oura ring I feel that I can provide a meaningful perspective.

Pros: RingConn has a slimmer profile, longer battery life, and best of all, no monthly fee. In addition, I have a rare limitation in that the Oura ring doesn't accurately read my heart rate, while both gen 1 and gen 2 versions of the RingConn read my heart rate flawlessly.

Cons: Where RingConn falls short is that some of the software aspects are not quite as good as Oura. For example, Oura has much better accuracy at reading when I'm awake vs being asleep. Many times where the RingConn shows me sleeping, the Oura accurately recognized that I was awake and reading a book. Another area where RingConn falls short is that there is no integration with partner software, so it doesn't recognize workouts I might have done that are recorded on Strava and Apple Health.

The RingConn app is good with lots of useful information. I find that the AI aspect is not very useful and gets in the way of just looking at the data. In contrast, Oura has a slightly more meaningful UI that makes it easier to understand the data presented.

Overall I can recommend the RingConn. It's solid, reliable and the lack of a monthly membership fee is a welcome benefit.
Author: George Pytlik

Title: I have had the rings for sometime now…
Content:
I have had the rings for sometime now both gen 1 and 2. The timings and information provided are quite accurate and informative. I seem to be having connectivity issues with the G2 as it is disconnecting more often than the G1 would. The largest size ring 14 is a little tight for my hand but that's not a big deal,larger size would be great. Overall very pleased with performance and data collected.
Pros: light weight,aesthetics good,accurate readings,app easy,battery life good.
Cons: random disconnect, reset through charger,size for me personally need larger,has on occasions connected to random phone of friend( no data transfer to random phone though) mindful of scratching when using weight exercise( normal with any ring).
I would and have highly recommended this health tracker as accurate and worth the cost.
Author: Brendon Mimmo

Title: Good... could be better
Content: Would be nice to offer more colors, perhaps the silver, but not so shinny. The silicone sleeves are a joke, they only last 3-4 weeks before tearing and ripping. At that point the ring starts to really wear and get scratched up.
Author: Darren Jewell

Title: Great communication prior to receiving…
Content: Great communication prior to receiving the actual ring. Upon receipt the ring fit , looked great, it's works as advertised including super long battery life (8 days). Very pleased with the RingConn
Author: Garrett

Title: Ring has great features
Content: Ring has great features, accurate monitoring. very happy with the updates in Gen 2. I feel the sizing is different to Gen 1 and I wish I had gotten the sizing kit again before selecting the same size as Gen 2 feel looser on my finger than Gen 1.
Author: Brendon L Devitt

Title: Loving My RingConn Experience
Content: Although the initial test kit took a month to arrive, which was quite disappointing, the actual actual I ordered arrived on time. The product itself is excellent—I’m absolutely loving it! The size, weight, and comfort are awesome.
Author: Elaine

Title: Quite impressed so far
Content: So far I've been impressed with the ring/software (used about a month). I was most-interested in the Sleep Apnea monitoring. I didn't understand the SW well enough when i first tired it so I need to re-test, but I think it gave a pretty accurate assessment. I tend to "chill" in the evening and apparently the ring sometimes counts me as sleeping at that point - probably my only disappointment so far. Not sure what I think of the "AI" yet. I suppose it is helpful to some. Very happy that there is no subscription!!
Author: customer

Title: I love the ease of the ring but color is not as it looks online
Content: I love the information and ease of the app. I would have given it five stars BUT the color is not as it appears on line.
Author: Tracy Gregg

Title: I have had ringconn for more than two…
Content: I have had ringconn for more than two months. Ringconn is completely unable to cope with high-intensity physical activity. I go to the gym regularly and often have a heart rate above 170 beats per minute. The ring shows only 130, and often the turnout is even higher. There are rare turnouts in measuring sleep. I wake up sleepy after 9 h and have information that I slept 5.
Author: Marek

Title: I love the area of coverage it shows on…
Content:
I love the area of coverage it shows on the phone and all the colorful charts describing in detail your daily activities.
This allows me to compete w/in myself to do better in sleeping, movement, and health overall. Love my rings color and fit. Keep up the excellent work and imprvements!

Title: My first smart ring
Content: I like it, it’s affordable and easy to use 😊
Author: Sandy Quintero

Title: Ring Review
Content: It was very easy to exchange my old ring for the new one, and the regular updates keep this ring working great!
Author: Mariah Rayl

Title: SMOOTH AND EASY
Content: The transfer from Gen 1 to Gen 2 was seemless. The new ring is lighter and along with the updated app has made tracking my data smoother and easier than before.
Author: Nikolai Gage

Title: Sleep tracking not accurate
Content: I'm not positive the sleep tracking is very accurate. There have been nights I have struggled to sleep and know very well I have been awake when the app shows the next morning that I was asleep. The biggest reason I got this ring was to track my sleep and I'm disappointed of it's accuracy.
Author: Aubree Wilder

Title: Good data feedback and good supporting…
Content: Good data feedback and good supporting information
Author: R Charley

Title: really great!
Content: Date of experience: December 12, 2024

Content:
Received Ring Kit after two days; the delivery of the Ring took longer, 10days.
Ring is perfect, light and easy to wear 24/7.
Updated GUI is unfortunately not as intuitive as the one before.
Author: JPL

Title: Lord of the Rings
Content: Good quality good price and great customer service
Author: Christopher Currie

Title: There is nothing to report
Content: There is nothing to report. Only one thing would be great: The ring has no marked spot to find the right place, so I have to mark it with nail polish
Author: Ulrich Mumm

Title: The 🔋 only lasted about 1 year with the…
Content: The 🔋 only lasted about 1 year with the first gen ring!!!Then there was a steep fall...😱
Author: Michael Kamau

Title: Great Ring
Content: Great Ring - wasn’t wear and great way of presenting the data - the only thing that it lacks is that it doesn’t keep track of gum turning sessions or game of golf - wish that can be added and will be a 5 star ring to have
Author: Avtar Tiwana

Title: Not available italian version.
Content: Date of experience: December 08, 2024
Author: Alessandro A.

Title: The speed of reaction after sending the…
Content:
The speed of reaction after sending the corrected size was impressive. I did not expect that.
This was the second smart ring having had version 1 for some time and would definitely use again.
A quality product and the software works well too.
Author: Raymond A Evans

Title: Highly appreciate the customer support
Content: Highly appreciate the customer support. I like the constant improvements in the app. Actually it's not really necessary to update from Gen. one to two. Both are excellent rings. My main focus is on sleep. I like that it's not a subscription model.
Author: Michael Uskovic

Title: Working
Content: It works and is accurate
Author: Krister

Title: My experience has been great
Content: My experience has been great. I was excited why I found out at the ringcon2 and preorders from kick starter. So how I did receive my email/code to preorder on their site. I reached out them think it would be to late and sorry we can't do anything type of response. To my surprise it was literally the opposite. They seemed genuinely sorry that I didn't get the emails/links. Even know it was still past the time they created a link/code that allowed me to still get the presale deal. But then they also followed up to make sure it worked for me and I was able to do. That is what I called amazing customer service. As for the ring it's self I'm in love with it. My wife has the Samsung ring and my sister has the Aura. I have better battery life and I like interface better also. Great product and amazing customer service. I will say to be transparent the one thing I do not like is the ring protector. I've tried two different sizes to see if I maybe grow to liking it. Nope sorry. It made the ring seem bulky and cheap. That's saying a lot saying this ring is smaller then the others. I have large hands and it's the perfect size. It's not so tiny thits dainty but not large. It's like the perfect size for for anyone. Sorry guys about ring protector just have to be honest. Otherwise customer for life and recommend the ring hands down. I got my then end of October and have worn it everyday but 1 day.
Author: Jason J.

Title: Overall
Content: Overall, i love it but one function needs to be improved is the GPS tracking when using outdoor running, the app must be opened unless the GPS won't be tracking
Author: Pichayapong Tanapuntanurak

Content: The ring does not record spikes in heart rates. Only when calm can it keep up but not too accurate either. Sleep apnea is questionable what it can actually do. It feels like a meme gadget rather than a serious health tracking device. Maybe the technology isnt at the point where we can exppect rings to do the same what smart watches can do
Author: Harris

Title: The ring caused burn marks on my…
Content: The ring caused burn marks on my finger. When I asked for a refund, they kept going about telling them more about what the problem is. I’ve sent photos and explained to them over many emails what the problem is, they kept on delaying the process. They don’t want any returns. Just honor your return policy. I would’ve loved to keep the ring but for the love of god, I won’t wear something that burns my skin and possibly cause veins to blood clot.
Author: No name

Title: Easy dash board
Content: Easy dash board
Author: Hashem Al Marzouqi

Title: All good. I would suggest this ring to a friend.
Content: My ring has worked flawlessly since receiving it. I like that the Charge last for many days I also like that the charger will last for many weeks. The app is easy to use, and it’s provided me with a fair amount of information regarding my sleep patterns and general health status. So far I have no issues and no complaints with this product. Hopefully it will continue to work just as well for many years. I also am very happy that there is no monthly fee for the app and this is the main reason why I chose the RingConn
Author: Jason

Title: They pushed out ring2 before they were…
Content: They pushed out ring2 before they were ready. The customer is not a paid R&D for them. And the condescending tone of not listening to the concerns have been frustrating
Author: Nunyo

Title: Amazing ring
Content:
First, I'll start with the obvious. The battery life is amazing. You have to think so seldom about it while it collects the data. Second, the fit is wonderful. Much thinner than the test ring. I usually hate rings, but this one just found a permanent home. Have gotten so many compliments. I've only had it for a month, but haven't scratched or scuffed it yet. Connectivity always works (which is refreshing).

On the it's ok side is the app. Some elements are great others are annoying. I actually liked the app version I started with much more than the current version. They updates a week or so in and it was disappointing. The plan and AI elements are more in the way for me now. Most of this tech is new, so it's likely to improve.

Overall the hardware is exactly what I wanted. I'm so glad to go with ringconn over oura and I've ditched my Fitbit.
Author: Tracy Johnson

Title: RingConn
Content: I love the ring itself. It works well and hold a great charge. Love the color!
Author: Taylor F

Title: I love my RingConn!
Content:
I love my RingConn!
Battery lasts forever, seems accurate enough, and is quite durable so far (I'm accident prone and always hit my hands against things - no issues for my RingConn so far (and I don't use the crappy plastic protector).
Only downside: the size of the ring is very noticeable at first. I wish it were slightly thinner.
I like the app however it's a little "clunky"; I don't feel like it flows as well as other apps and you can definitely tell that English is not the primary language of this app. It's good - just nitpicking as it could be better.
I love my RingConn though and do not regret my purchase.
Author: Elizabeth

Title: Amazing
Content: I love this ring and what it does!! Super helpful to reach my health goals.
Author: Lindsey Halladay

Title: I paid full price and it looks like…
Content: I paid full price and it looks like only a few months later it was sold for close to a 33% discount, however I like the ring.
Author: David Cogswell

Title: Useful ring
Content: Ring works well, provide useful information. Long battery life.
Author: DUNG LUONG

Title: Well I ordered the ring with their…
Content: Well I ordered the ring with their founderising program pre order for some reason I order bigerr size ring by mistake. Then I ask for exchange I offered to pay for shipping expenses but they keep sending me stupid tips how to wear and bla bla. Basically I can wear the ring Tru the day because it's fell. They tell me a can't return because it's pre order. So keep it on my Desk and waiting to my finger to get bigger.
Author: Miro

Title: Hassle free monitoring of your health
Content:
I finally switched to RingConn from Oura. I had Oura for about a year before finally trying RingConn. Initially I'm very used to Oura's user friendly display but Oura comes with monthly subscription which I feel is a hassle. RingConn on the other hand is single purchase and you get daily monitoring as long as you have it on. When RingConn started monitoring Sleep Apnea I decided to give it a try. To my surprise RingConn also updated their software to be more user friendly.

So far I'm liking RingConn and I hope that it will continue to upgrade the software to be more userfriendly.
Author: Melvin Lim

Title: Sleep Times added with no edit available to delete
Content: There have been a few times where the sleep logging is showing naps and a Sleep #2 on the app. Most time when the adds a nap you can edit or delete, which is no problem but when it happens more than it should, you sleep vitals are not so accurate. On occasion I get a Sleep #2, that I did not take and when it goes to edit, the times are only adjusted within three and no changes can made or deleted
Author: Dennis R

Title: My gen1 ring died on the same day the…
Content: My gen1 ring died on the same day the gen2 became available in an upgrade promotion. I don't believe in coincidences like that. After inordinate amount of sending pictures and videos I was able to prove the charge case had failed...we can send you a new charger, or you can wait a few weeks for your new gen 2 ring. Not great service because I'd prefer to be on the gen 1, but it is dead and in the trash bin...(Upgrade activation killed gen1, so can't pass along my dollar investment to my wife or son.
Author: RM Davies

Title: Good product
Content: Good product, as advertised. Would’ve been perfect if the battery was over 10 days as advertised. May have been due to my ring size but it only lasted an average of 7 days for a size 9 ring. Designed is good, app could have been better but, can’t complain as it is free, unlike other competitors.
Author: Diem N. Huynh

Title: The ring is a half size to big and the…
Content: The ring is a half size to big and the size below was a half size to tight.
Author: MICHAEL MAZOR

Title: I still don’t have it yet.
Content: Date of experience: December 11, 2024
Author: Kevin Winters

Title: Great Experience
Content: Initially had issues registering this first RingConn — so I called and this young lady walked me through all the steps (they were complicated) patiently and got my RingConn2 functioning again. Kudos to her and RingConn!!
Author: Ravi Kanuri

Title: Great ring
Content: Ease to use, free and friendly user app, useful information, I’m very happy to know more about myself with RingConn!
Author: natan kadoch sofia

Content:
Like it

Great sleep tool

Content: Good ring, good app

Title: Doesn’t compare to Oura
Content: Doesn’t compare to Oura, don’t waste your money

Title: The ring is awesome
Content: The ring is awesome does everything I was looking for it to do
Author: TIMOTHY JAUHOLA

Title: We were kept well informed
Content: They kept me up to date as to the release of the product and every step of the delivery.
Author: Joseph Mrozowski

Title: Awesome product
Content: Awesome product! 100% better than to wear my Apple Watch to bed. The app lets me know my stress levels, vitals, sleep patterns and do much more in one screen.
Author: Eric Bauer

Title: Live healthy
Content: It’s a part of my life now. Best way to stay healthy.
Author: Frederick Ernst

Title: Excellent communication
Content: Excellent communication. Awesome product.
Author: Klipstein

Title: I ordered a gen2 two months ago
Content:
I ordered a gen2 two months ago. It was shipped but never received.

They promised to send a replacement, but I am still waiting for it on 12/11/24. They said it would be sent 10/31

Edit

Have since received and it was worth the wait!
Author: Sean Tailby

Title: Great overall but I have to keep moving…
Content: Great overall but I have to keep moving the ring so that the sensors are on the bottom. The ring needs a discrete outside marker so I can visually tell that the sensors are on the appropriate position.
Author: Neal Chaykin

Title: Love my ring and the app
Content: Love my ring and the app, I’d highly recommend!!
Author: Kristie Churchley

Title: RingConn
Content: RingConn was great! I emailed with questions twice and both times received a prompt reply.
Author: Kristine Pong

Title: Awesome product highly recommend
Content:
Super easy to order fast delivery. Highly recommend getting the sizing kit before ordering.

Love the RingConn2 sleep tracking is very insightful.
Author: L3EDX

Title: It is necessary to be able to measure blood pressure.
Content: It is necessary to be able to measure blood pressure. Something that would be good if they could incorporate
Author: Raul Barbitta

Title: very helpful easy to understand
Content: Date of experience: December 11, 2024
Author: hlw

Title: The ring fits Great
Content: The ring fits great. The app is easy to use. So far the ring is holding up very well. Great product.
Author: Murray K

Title: The devise does not pick up things…
Content: The devise does not pick up things right in front of it. Then it picks up cars passing in the street. Finally I can not grant access to my wife to use it as well. Not good.
Author: BRIAN SACKSTEIN

Title: Bad Customer Service
Content: Customer service is very slow at responding, I had to email multiple times and call multiple times. Even when called, I would be on hold for over 1 hour. They do not take returns for inaccurate data and just keep pointing you to leave feedback yet that doesn’t change the data accuracy.
Author: anonymous

Title: Very concise & informative
Content: Very concise & informative
Author: Lawrence Kho

Title: Great potential. Is there an API?
Content: Battery life is great. Software is evolving in good in direction, but shows promise. Is there an API for working with it?
Author: John Westerdale
