Title: Bigger Size please
Content:
The RingCoon ring offers good quality and efficient battery management. The accompanying app is straightforward, which is beneficial as it covers all necessary functions without any unnecessary complexity. However, the widgets are redundant since they merely mirror the app's windows; it’s easier to open the app, sync, and check progress directly.

One drawback is the need to send data to the cloud for any results. The phone or app should process basic data locally, with cloud connectivity reserved for more detailed insights. Additionally, push notifications for ring software updates would be helpful. While frequent app usage might be encouraged for data collection, a notification for updates would benefit standard or IT users who sync less frequently.

Moreover, a larger size option would be awesome, as even the size 14 feels a bit small.
Author: Andrew Smith

Title: Not useful
Content: The ring took weeks to receive, which is unacceptable. The app is not giving me any useful analysis for my health and I don’t see you making useful software or UI updates. I expected a monthly release at the minimum. I expected more from this ring. I’ve been fully rested, sick, completely stressed, and run marathons, but the app doesn’t tell me anything about my condition. It even says I’m inactive when I have recorded workouts on my Apple Watch… what a stupid and easy thing you could fix but choose not to build.
Author: Kristen W

Title: Still on the fence...
Content:
Still on the fence...
Look, feel, design of the ring, and battery length is fabulous- would highly recommend on these aspects alone. However, when it comes to obtaining the metrics and understanding how the insights are derived, this ring leaves a lot to be desired. I have had this for a couple of months now and was eager to have the oxygen and stress readings to keep track of some health issues. Sadly, 90% of the time the ring does not capture readings for many of the metrics, and I still have no understanding of how any of the insights related to stress are gathered. Readings that are captured appear to be off as well- for example "Stress" readings and "exercise mode" just don't seem to be tracking correctly.
Author: Jen P

Title: Good ring, but inaccurate HR readings while training
Content:
(Édit): I got the ring shortly after writing the review below. So far, so good. It is not very accurate for measuring the heart rate while training, it consistently measures a heart rate that is much lower than reality (130-140 vs 170bmp). I wish it also measured the skin temperature, but that seems to only work while sleeping for some reason.

For the delay, they did send me the ring protectors to compensate, but honestly, I will never wear these protectors. They are ugly and are a hassle to put on. I would rather put a glove or take the ring off if I feel I could scratch it.

(Previous review)
I wish I could review the ring, but Yuntrack is so damn slow to deliver that I am still waiting for it 4 weeks after ordering it… the sizing kit took 10 days to arrive and the ring, looks like it will take 14+ days.

I mean, at this price, charge 20$ more and use a better delivery service that will actually get it to customers in a matter of days, not weeks

Title: first take
Content: ease of selection
Author: Kenneth Stasiak

Title: In general I like the product
Content:
In general I like the product. I went through 3 Wellue rings before trying this. It holds the charge as claimed which is amazing. It charges in 90 minutes or less as claimed, also amazing. The water resistant aspect is my most favorite part as I think I lost at least two of the previous brand because of that. I love that it is not bulky and looks like normal jewelry. I find most of the readings accurate when they are taken.

The things I would change if I could. Continuous readings for oxygen and heart rate. For some of us that are chronically ill, it is important to know in lass than 5 minutes if our oxygen drops. Along those lines, notifications when we have readings outside of certain settings. These are huge and frankly, I wouldn’t have bought the ring if I had more clearly understood. If it can send sedentary notifications, it should be able to send others. The sleep recording is way off. I am chronically ill. On really bad days I am sedentary for the better part of the day. The ring records that as sleep - and not just sleep, but deep sleep and REM sleep. This doesn’t seem appropriate.

I think this is a great product and hopefully with some updates and tweaks along the way it will be an amazing product.
Author: Karen R

Title: I love the ring and all the info!
Content: I love the ring and all the info!! I’d like more activities, swimming, yoga..

Title: Love it!
Content: I have worn my ringconn for several months now and find it comfortable, durable, and full of helpful information about my sleep and body activities. Love wearing it to bed instead of a watch. I love the fact that they don't sell my info. This is a much better way to track body metrics. Highly recommend!
Author: C. Lynn Sallady

Title: Good So Far
Content: So far, my ring has been very good. The sizing and delivery was as advertised. I am very pleased with that. The ring case had a good charge when delivered, and it did not take a lot of time to charge the ring. It was easy to get everything installed, updated and operating. I put it into the case to charge when showering, and it stays close to 100%. But some tweaks are still necessary. The first day I cut the grass with a push mower. This registered as taking a nap. Also, I walk several Km daily and the "outdoor walking" selection on the app is not yet active, so my ring has yet to record any exercise. It does count my steps, a bit more freely than my phone pedometer app. Google Fit records my route, not the ring. I have not had any updates since receiving my ring, so I hope these anomalies are corrected. My sleep and other reading appear accurate. It is comfortable to wear. I am quite happy with my RingConn, and hope further updates can address some of the limitations and glitches I have noted.
Author: Jan

Title: Lightweight and surprisingly comfortable
Content:
Lightweight and surprisingly comfortable to wear! Battery lasts essentially forever, since I can just top it up when I hop in the shower (you can shower with it just fine though).

No concerns about waterproofing here; it's survived doing dishes dozens of times already without any issues. It's also survived gardening and just general daily abuse. I'm pleasantly surprised with the overall experience.

I mostly just got this for heart rate monitoring and sleep tracking, both of which it does without any issue. I'm pleasantly surprised about their "sedentary notification" feature, which has been a helpful reminder to get up and move about.

Title: I really like my RingConn
Content:
I really like my RingConn. It gives me very helpful information about activity, sleep patterns and other vitals. The sleep information is particularly helpful.

I am looking forward to the swim function as I don't think the translation to "steps" is accurate. . Also - I think its a bit generous with steps so I take my daily count with a grain of salt but its still helpful information even if it might not be absolutely accurate. All in all its a great tool as I continue on my path of continuing good health.

I love the long battery life and very fast charging. Customer service is fast and helpful.

Great product.

Title: Great Upgrade to Fitness Watch
Content:
The ring was easy to order and equip, it tracks & displays well, and it is integrated with Google Fit.

It is an upgrade from the hassle of a fitness watch - just a ring on a finger.

No half ring sizes impacts me.

Hockey is not well tracked - it seems the measurement intervals miss the highest heart rates or averages them with the heart rate during recovery between shifts.
Author: Jason Linley

Title: Ringconn review
Content: What I like is the convenience. Put it on and forget about it. Being able to shower with it on is great. Stress and sleep measurements work well. The wellness balance suggestions are helpful. What I don't like is the heart rate and step counter measurements. They both only work correctly when your arm is moving. I work out on a stationary bike. I also wear another heart rate monitor on my arm. My other heart rate monitor will be reading 150 for example, however the ring thinks I'm inactive because I have my arms on the handle bars(not moving). I also don't get any credit for steps because my arm is not moving. So I don't get any credit for the whole workout. If you walk or run for exercise the ring is great. I also use a push mower to mow grass on a slopping lot. It is a great workout!! But my heart rate according to the ring will stay around 70 because my arms are on the mower handle(not moving). I also don't get any credit for steps for the same reason(arms not moving). If I take my arm off the bike or mower, the heart rate and steps are correct. Mowing and biking one handed is difficult and not sustainable. I do manage to reach my step goals, but I have to do extra walking or running to achieve it. I really do like the ring. I hope a firmware update will fix these issues.
Author: Michael Vaughn

Title: No noe answer my question?

Title: Satisfaction Despite Challenges
Content:
Review: Satisfaction Despite Challenges**

I had the pleasure of working with Isla as my guide, and I want to share my positive experience. Isla was always there for me and constantly provided guidance, even when there were issues with the delivery.

Let me detail my experience:

1. **Service**: The overall service was very good. Email response times were excellent, and I always felt well supported and informed.

2. **Delivery**: Delivery was challenging. It took significantly longer than I expected. Personally, I believe this should be communicated more clearly, as I couldn't find any information about the extended delivery times anywhere.

3. **Returns**: Returning items incurs a fee, which is understandable, but it would have been helpful to know this in advance.

4. **Ringconn Gadget App**: The app has room for improvement, from my perspective. More customer data might be needed to further optimize it.

5. **Overall Picture**: Despite some challenges, I'm overall satisfied with the experience. Isla's assistance played a significant role in this.

6. **Appreciation**: Dear Isla, you are the best. Thank you for your tireless efforts and excellent support.

Overall, I had a positive experience and can recommend the service—especially thanks to Isla.
Author: Cristian Belacurencu

Title: The RingConn Smart Ring impresses with…
Content:
The RingConn Smart Ring impresses with its sleek, minimalistic design and comfortable fit, suitable for any occasion. It tracks steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns accurately, with detailed insights available through a user-friendly phone app.

The battery life is excellent, lasting several days on a single charge. Its stylish appearance, comprehensive health metrics, and outstanding battery performance make it a top choice for those seeking an effective and subtle wearable.
Author: happy user

Title: Good alternative to a smart watch
Content:
Everything works fine. The ring fits very well and the app gives a lot of information in a clear presentation.
Battery lasts 6 to 7 days before recharging is needed.
Author: Christoph Meyer

Title: Great service excellent communication
Content: Great service excellent communication
Author: Frank Zizak

Title: Great and fast customer service response
Content: Customer Service
Author: Alex L

Title: Helping me for better sleep
Content: Its help organize my supplement so I have better sleep
Author: Kotaiba Alnusif

Title: Like it
Content: Like it, easy to keep track my personal data
Author: Jessica

Title: Health improver
Content: So useful and so motivating
Author: Customer

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: I was mislead and bought the charger twice
Content: I'm disappointed not by the product but because not clear communication. I was sure that I have to buy charger separately and as a result I bought it twice. I'm angry and disappointed.
Author: Pawel Porebski

Title: Great smart ring!
Content: I have had it for almost a week. The ring is working well. I haven’t had to charge it yet. The data is really informative and lots of insights about what different things mean and how to improve your health based on your data. I am happy with the ring so far. It does have a couple of scuffs on the inside of my hand from daily use but nothing too bad. No different from my wedding ring. Also the app is really easy to use and understand.
Author: W I

Title: Beneficial in general
Content: The ring is useless as an activity tracker since it doesn't recognize riding a stationary bike. On the other hand, it's very informative about sleep, especially for a man with sleep apnea.
Author: Stephen R. Donaldson

Title: One of the worst experiences ever
Content:
One of the worst experiences ever , they refused to send me the item in some act of prejudice or hate against people of my country from the carrier and they refunded the purchase amount!!!!

Say on your website that you do not ship to my country instead of making this happen!
Author: Mohammad Bahareth

Title: I bought the ring thanks to the good experience of my partner
Content: Date of experience: May 11, 2024
Author: Laysen

Title: I like wearing it
Content:
I like wearing it
It tells me everything I need to know, my doctor loves that he can see my sleep, all the information. At 71 I can’t remember. Or to take notes. My writing is getting worse. So yes this is a life saver to me . My daughter err s love looking at the app as well to see how I’m doing, and then take me to dr. You need this ring .
Author: Linda Six

Title: One of the best rings on the market.
Content:
The app and ring connect together pretty well, and I haven’t seen any connection issues that aren’t resolved with a quick restart of the app. Sleep, stress and BPM/SP02 data is nicely laid out and the implications of the numbers are easy to understand. Not having to pay a subscription fee for the app is also a definite plus.
That said, it would be nice to partition sleep data over a single sleep period if possible. For example, if I go to sleep at 11 PM, wake up at 2 AM, and go back to sleep from 4 AM to 6 AM, the ring counts this as one continuous block of sleep from 11 - 6, which makes data inaccurate.
Author: Clayton Fernandes

Title: A great product and experience!
Content: It was easy to get my size and place my order. The support for the few questions I had was excellent. I've learned a lot from my app, and I've recommended RingConn who is has purchased, we enjoy comparing our results!
Author: customer

Title: Sleep comparison ring vs watch
Content:
1. A possible size 15 would be good
2. Connection to phone ( Oppo fold N3) could be better
3. Health data (steps and sleep) are varying far from Oppo watch 4 pro) particularly "deep sleep) never to find at early morning time , watch is still showing deep sleep f.ex. between 2 and 5 am , were as ring is not ?
Author: Toni Hertel

Title: Ring works great
Content: Ring works great! Software also good. Keeps track of sleep, activity and stress. Really like the ring. Well worth the price.
Author: Michael S Remetz

Title: Very disappointed in the accuracy of…
Content: Very disappointed in the accuracy of this product. The sleep score is completely inaccurate almost always. The exercise feature is also very inaccurate and doesn't track steps correctly. Anyways. Very disappointed and wish I could somehow give this back to get my money back
Author: Chris Watkins

Title: I like the long battery life
Content: I like the long battery life. Many of the measures are very helpful. The sleep measure is rarely accurate.
Author: Mr Robert Niehoff

Title: Easy & accurate service via the…
Content:
Easy & accurate service via the Ringconn website, but a little long in the process (time).

Some sort of anti-rotation device/adjustment would be helpful to keep the ring from turning.
Author: Jim Murphy

Title: Love the Ring
Content: Love the Ring! Finish is perfect for me. Data available is incredible. Find myself looking at the data throughout the day. I much prefer this to the apple watch I had before. No monthly charges!
Author: Chris B

Title: Good, but…
Content: The ring is great overall and functions perfectly. However, my only criticism is that it became quite scratched on the underside after a very short period of use.
Author: Stefan P.

Title: The ring is comfortable and attractive.
Content: The ring is comfortable and inobtrusive. I can wear it on my ring finger instead of my first finger, like other brands. I love the charger. The ring stays charged. The app interface is clear, concise and very helpful. I wore an Oura for 2 years and I like the RingConn much better.
Author: Syrena Gatewood

Title: Great experience but could improve the…
Content: Great experience but could improve the app, particularly around the exercise functionality
Author: Amy Mann

Title: Nice app but some weaknesses
Content:
RingConn has a very nice app with a easy and good user interface. The ring is very robust and reliable and battery time of one week is great.
Weskness: if supply has gone during night, it does count and juge that night very bad, as if you have not slept during the time without supply ... which is somehow stupid. There is not profound background info .. eg. what means a certain HRV and what should it be fore a person with your age. Same for stress level and what could influence the measurement results.
Author: Silvio Grogg

Title: I'm fond of the ring
Content: I'm fond of the ring; it's incredibly comfortable and precise. My sole reservation is that I need to recharge it approximately every 5 to 6 days. Interestingly, my friend only needs to charge his every 2-weeks
Author: Shaleen Bemus

Title: ringconn perfect
Content: Everything with ringconn works perfectly!
Author: Peter Rödler

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: No sales contact possible
Content:
10 hours after ordering, and three weeks before receiving the product there was a new price. I contacted the supplier about this, since I wanted to get the better price too - especially given theming lead time. Did not get a response to this day.
Also no response on delivery time.
Product OK so far.
Author: Anonym

Title: I like the health benefits
Content:
I like the health benefits. Especially the sleep, heart, and activity monitoring features.

The ring app is intuitive.

The ring is a bit chunky. Seems that if you can have all of the same features in a smaller ring, then this size, 13, could have a thinner form.

So far I’ve washed dishes and showered in the ring and it seems fine. Water proof enough for me.

I also wear it as I work and play: welding (with gloves) , masonry, carpet removal/installation, framing carpentry, halibut fishing, boating,

Battery life is ok. I look forward to a movement-powered ring. Like my watch.

The charger is good.
Author: David D

Title: The entire process was fantastic and…
Content: The entire process was fantastic and took only about 2 weeks. Initially I was not going to order the "free" size kit but I'm glad I did. Went back on the site and chose my size. A week later it was on my finger. The ring fits great. The construction seems to be above average. The app is user friendly and NO SUBSCRIPTION! Overall I am so satisfied with my decision to go with RingConn and the ring itself fantastic.
Author: Orlando

Title: After 5 days very happy
Content:
It took 2 weeks for the testring and another 2 weeks for the actual ring to arrive. I hope that soon there’ll be a possibility to extract the data.
I‘m very happy with the product after 5 days of use and cant say anything negative. Very useful if you want to keep your vitals in sight…👍🏼
Author: Mark Ww

Title: I’m enjoying the information that this…
Content: I’m enjoying the information that this ring is collecting for me. It’s helping me to learn about my own body and how I should be eating and sleeping. Please keep it this way and don’t muddy it up with a bunch of extra pay options. I just want to collect this info for my health and I don’t want to have to pay monthly for this info. It’s helping to me get to a point where I can maintain weight and energy. Thank you!
Author: DH

Title: LOVE IT..
Content: IT WORKS great and easy to set up and very HAPPY with it
Author: walter lundon

Title: Great service
Content: Great service. Quick delivery. Love the ring. Looking forward to blood pressure update that is supposed to be coming.
Author: TRACY MCKECHNIE

Title: Address correction
Content: I mis-typed my address and didn't notice until the shipping confirmation came to my inbox. I reached out and RingConn made the correction quickly and kindly.
Author: Nick Philipp

Title: 24 days to receive correct ring in NZ but good customer service
Content: After I placed my order it took about 10 days shipping from HK to NZ which is expected. However when I received the sizing kit I also received a default size 6 silver ring. I figured out that when I placed my order somehow the RingConn shopping cart didn't remove the default size 6 silver ring when I chose "don't know my size". Customer service responded the same day but it took a couple of days for them to arrange a pre-paid courier ticket for me to return the ring. Initially they wouldn't send the correct ring I wanted until they received it back in HK but after some pushing they conceded and shipped the correct ring. Again it took about 10 days. Overall from date of order to receiving the correct ring was 24 days which is disappointing but Customer service were communicative and overwhelmingly apologetic for the error which is appreciated when things do go wrong. Initial use of the ring and the app for 5 days is good so far.
Author: David

Title: A very smart - smart ring
Content: Very good order process. Ring sizer arrived quickly as did the ring once the size was confirmed. Quick and accurate tracking information and very pleased with the smart ring. Battery 6 days. Stats very interesting and accurate with easy link with Google Fit. Software update for both ring firmware and app quick and simple. Data uploads smooth and very simple process. Best bit of wearable smart tech I have owned to date.
Author: Eddie

Title: Great service and help
Content: Great service and help, and fast delivered to Denmark.
Author: Christina Aller

Title: Excelent gadget for me!!
Content: Excelent gadget for me!!! 😃
Author: Aivars

Title: Scratches in the first week
Content: Scratches in the first week. gold version very scratch sensitive.Ring has nice functions.
Author: Paul H.

Title: I’m waiting more than one month for my…
Content: I’m waiting more than one month for my ring to arrive
Author: Davide Rovitti

Title: Better fitting, great battery life-
Content: Sleep, biodata and step data are good useful- i am still getting accustomed to the displays, but i find them easy enough to read and understand. The battery life is excellent, and i am very pleased at that, and the charging case having several rounds of charging available is very good. I’ve only used it a short while, but i am very pleased, and overall, high marks
Author: Anne McClain

Title: Fast shipping great looks- easy to wear…
Content: Fast shipping great looks- easy to wear at night
Author: Frederick W Szibdat

Title: I don’t think the sleep analysis is…
Content: I don’t think the sleep analysis is accurate. If I am wearing the ring and am watching television ( very still) at 8 pm , it testers that I am in deep sleep then the sleep analysis continues ( showing , I go into REM sleep )…. Even if I get up and exercise at 8:30pm , it still says I am sleeping in deep sleep !
Author: Linda Lee

Title: Excellent Quality.
Content: I love how well made and durable the ring is. Had it for about 4 weeks now and not a scratch on it. The battery is also very long-lasting and the ring is waterproof, no damage whatsoever and I've been wearing it 24/7. Plus I love the design. Only thing that would make it even better is if Ringconn offered engraving for even more customization.
Author: Brandon Giesbrecht

Title: So far love everything about the ring
Content: So far love everything about the ring, especially battery life, sleep info; however very lacking in ability to track exercises like other fitness rings. I want my friends to buy one but they won’t until they can track a huge variety of exercises.
Author: Sheena Mullinax

Title: every worked Out good
Content: every thing worked Out good Ring came in time lets See If it works Out until Jet 5+ Stars and i Had one question which was answerd instentaniouslisly 100 percent sorry If my english ist not perfekt
Author: Florian

Title: Loved all the features on this ring
Content: Loved all the features on this ring. When I downloaded my app let me know about my sleep, habits, my heart rate stress. Would definitely recommend this if I was asked when I thought about this RingConn.
Author: Rick Aguilera

Title: I would like to see more exercises…
Content: I would like to see more exercises incorporated into the app. More recovery in the app.
Author: L Jo

Title: Great customer service
Content: Date of experience: May 09, 2024
Author: Avery Patton

Title: I an still baiting for the ring
Content:
I an still baiting for the ring
Svend Christensen
Haslevej 43
8230 Åbyhøj
Denmark
Author: Svend Christensen

Title: I enjoy the fact that it holds a charge for a long time
Content: I enjoy the fact that it has such a long charge life and I can track my sleep much better than with my apple watch.
Author: Debra

Title: UPDATED
Content: I ordered my boyfriend a RingConn because it’s seems like a pretty cool idea. I ordered it on 05/18 and got it 05/25. BUT I need to exchange the ring for a different size and it has been the WORST process ever. I have emailed them twice so far and called once (I wasn’t able to reach anyone at their number for 20 minutes then got a voicemail and left a message) still no response. I’ll update this review once they respond if they ever do but it sucks that you pay $300 and get NO communication if there are issues. It really seems like they don’t care about employee experience at all. If this continues I’ll just ask for a refund back but would not recommend it at all. Ours has much better customer service. UPDATE! They have assisted me in getting a replacement ring and were quite helpful. They suggested shipping a sizing thing but we knew the correct size so they just send us the ring and it even came quicker than the original ring. Thanks so much for your help Ringconn!
Author: Amal Rudwan

Title: RingConn has a long way to go to bring their customer service up to par
Content:
So far the ring performs as advertised. I wish I could give it a better rating but the issues I had with customer service overshadowed the experience in ways I won’t soon forget.

My ring was lost in shipping and the support group at RingConn was slow, unhelpful and condescending in handling my issue. After many messages to support and responses that were days late or failed to address my issue, RingConn finally agreed to ship me a new ring. I requested overnight shipment to make up for the lost time and frustration I experienced and they disregarded my request completely, instead sending a new ring three days later via USPS. They repeatedly disregarded my request to have a supervisor contact me.

Several days later I received two rings on consecutive days. No sooner had the second ring arrived than I began getting urgent messages from RingConn to return it. They asked me to take it to a shipping location which I refused to do. I used a shipping label they provided and left it out for my postman to pick up.

I have rarely experienced such incompetent service nor have I been disregarded as completely as I was by RingConn. I was far more diligent in sending back the second ring than they were in addressing my concerns. I only hope I don’t have an issue with the ring, since I have no confidence RingConn will stand behind their product.

Follow up 05/27/2024:
I received a lengthy response from RingConn after posting my review. Like all their communications, it was vague and did not address my concerns. I have dealt with online sellers of many products for decades and have never been treated so disrespectfully. I've wasted enough time on this. I should have purchased an OURA!!!
Author: Denis Day

Title: I'm very happy with the Ringconn ring
Content:
I'm very happy with the Ringconn ring. No monthly subscription but you still get all the updates and app improvements

I use it primarily to monitor my sleep behaviour and its pretty detailed!

All other functions work very well
Author: steven t

Title: My review
Content: Compared to other wearables this one is comfortable and pretty accurate. Battery life is not as stated but it is still pretty good again compared to other wearables.
Author: Dr Laura Gerber

Title: Customer service TERRIBLE
Content:
I got my ring a little over a month ago. It stopped holding a charge already. You submit your concern through the app, but it usually takes 2 days for them to get back to you. They said that they would send me a return label two days ago, all I needed to do was confirm my address and that I am ready to mail it. I confirmed, but then they e-mail back today asking me to confirm my ring size (so I'm sure they won't get back to me for another 2 days). It just seems they drag things out quite a bit. I haven't been able to use my ring for 10 days - and will be much longer at the rate of their customer service.

Update June 2: Due to the poor customer service, I requested a refund. On May 22, they said my refund was of “utmost importance” and that they would be following it “very closely”. They said I should get it in 2-3 business days. But after 7 business days, I still have yet to receive my refund.

Quite honestly - the customer service (or lack thereof) should be enough to discourage anyone from purchasing this ring.
Author: Tonya Headlee

Title: after two months, here is my opinion on RingConn
Content:
The products really impressed me for many reasons :
1- The price of $279 is a KILLER!!
2- The design is really sick, an IF award winner for a reason
3- 24/7 HRV and Blood oxygen monitoring is better than oura's that works only at night time
4- Battery life of 7days is wild
5- The results and the Sensors are so accurate
Author: Abdelrahman Ahmed

Title: They cheated me out of $269
Content: They approved my return, even sent me notice that my refund was processed. Then I never heard from them again and no refund received.
Author: Leslie Gallup

Title: it helped me monitor my stress
Content: Date of experience: May 12, 2024
Author: pearline cole

Title: I love the ring
Content:
I love the ring, it's a great aid for keeping track of any sleep issues you may be having. Heart rate, blood oxygen level, heart rate variability, rem and deep sleep durations, stress levels, activity...
Make sure the ring fits snuggly to get the best results.
My only complaints would be they don't have it working well with workouts in the gym, but they are working on that, and sometimes I get weird stress readings, like highly stressed when I'm laying down reading, or in the middle of sleeping, but overall it's a great ring.
Author: Rob Hillyer

Title: Love the ring
Content: Love the ring! Easy to use application provides interesting health data. No subscription fee!
Author: Dorothy

Title: SO2 function and sleep function incorrect
Content: The purchase etc went fine. But having used it now I find that the SO2 measurement on the ring during sleep has changed to a much lower reading. I check with another gadget I have and that I know meets medical standards and that one shows antwo point higher average. More or less what I had when I started using the ring. Ni don’t know what changed but this basically makes the ring useless for me as I had bought it specifically to measure that. Also two nights ago I barely slept and was awake most of the night. I got a 96 score on my sleep which is even higher than nights where I know the sleep was mixed. I would like to return my ring and get a refund. The ring was purchased 5 months ago and I use it typically only at night although I have now had it on for a full week
Author: Susanne

Title: Loving the Ring
Content: I've had several smart watches, but I hate wearing a watch so I just didn't bother and they just never really felt accurate. I finally switched to Ring and absolutely love it. It's out of the way, decorative, but not blingy, and it works. I feel the step counts are far more accurate, the sleep stuff is fascinating and enlightening, heart rate, oxygen, and all that are easy to read. I'm most enjoying the Stress sensor, I love to drive but the Ring has shown me how stressed I am while driving. I can see it now, but I had no idea at the time. Well worth the money.
Author: Carl Rodakowski

Title: Latest App Update a Disaster.
Content: For several months I found the ring to be very helpful in analyzing my sleep. The data provided me with a chart of my sleep stages during the night. Within the past few weeks however the app was "updated" and I no longer have access to the sleep data chart, only a single number, telling me my total sleep for the night. No more data telling me the amount of light sleep. deep sleep, and REM sleep. I sent in a request to have the problem fixed but the reply was totally unsatisfactory, telling me it would be fixed with the next upgrade. That might be months, if at all. I bought the ring based on the data presentation that I was initially provided, not on the very abbreviated presentation I now have. I have no idea why the company would take such a huge step backward. I did not buy the ring based on the skimpy data that is now provided. I have no choice but to demand a return of my money.
Author: Dennis Jones

Title: Love the ring, wish it had a "lost me" feature
Content: Love the ring, and I wore it all day every day for months. However, I've lost the ring and had no way of locating it (via an Apple-like "Find My" experience or a sound / vibration). It's been lost for a little over a month now, which makes me wish for a feature that would aid in locating a lost ring.
Author: G Nash

Title: Sizing ring and actual ring are different sizes!
Content: I bought my ring for Christmas of 2023 and while I'm happy with the data the ring collects, the accuracy of all the metrics, the battery life, and the fact that I get to wear cute bracelets again... I'm disappointed with the sizing kit and the customer service. I wore the size 9 and the size 10 sample rings for 2 weeks on my index finger and ordered a size 10 in silver. When I got my actual ring, it was way too big for my index finger and kept sliding off. I reached out to the company to see if I could return it for a size 9 (I did know that all sales are final, but I explained that the ring wasn't the same size as the sizing ring) and was told no and to try a different finger. I do wear my ring on my middle finger because the ring wasn't cheap, but it looks awful! I even have the sizing ring still and when I hold both rings together, there is a noticeable difference in the actual ring and the sizing ring.
Author: Paisley Bennett

Title: Happy customer
Content: I have been wearing my Ring since Christmas 2023. I find it much more comfortable than the fitness watches I have worn in the past. I love that I finally have something I can wear comfortably while I am sleeping.
Author: Shawn Johnston

Title: Great battery life, and a great UI
Content: Easy to use UI in the app, and the battery life is great. Low profile form factor and durable manufacturing make it low worry for every day use and a breeze when you're sleeping.
Author: Michael Parrish

Title: Everything as promised
Content: Everything as promised. Received the rings to evaluate the best size. When requested got tracking update. Received the smart ring in given time frame. Only thing missing now is to have the software with more features. But it's going well. Quite happy
Author: Julio Dias

Title: Easy to follow information
Content: Easy to follow information. Frequent updates to code have also improved the experience.
Author: Mik P

Title: All good
Content: All good, easy Handling, nice features
Author: Oliver B.

Title: Useful window to Personal Inner Space
Content: Ringconn provides me with just the right tools to view my inner indicators for Rest, Recovery, and Rebound. Would be great to incorporate tool to track effects of dietary changes like use of caffein and certain common supplements.
Author: Shung Goh

Title: The data was inaccurate
Content: The data was inaccurate. What's the point if it's inaccurate?
Author: Kristen

Title: RingConn is an excellent piece of tech
Content: RingConn is an excellent piece of equipment. That product does an incredible job and my wife is so happy. So why only three stars, ordered this over a month before it was needed, the size rings turned up 10 days of ordering, order the size with two days, had to double check with an email as it was not clear it had been order. Then if took three weeks to arrive from of all places, China. It arrived over two weeks late but had been sold as a US piece of technology. Not impressed it was a gift with plenty of time to arrive.
Author: Simon

Title: Great fitness tracker
Content: The ring's data collection and stats seem really accurate and the ring itself is really comfortable. I also like the long battery life and the portable charger. I only hope Ringconn brings out a more feminine design for the gals. Also it's far more affordable than the oura ring thank goodness.
Author: Lilian Ormsby

Title: the sync time could be improved.
Content:
the sync time could be improved.
Reminder for stand and prolonged sitting is not always responsive.
Author: Serene

Title: Health tracking keeps me working on…
Content: Health tracking keeps me working on keeping my daily activities on target
Author: Romeo Ponesto

Title: I appreciate the app keeping me aware…
Content:
I appreciate the app keeping me aware of my activities.
Hopefully my life improves because of my healthy choices.
Slight negative, the charge does not last 7 days.
Author: Sharyn Goldstein

Title: A terrific product
Content: A terrific product, however, the most recent update was a step backwards. The data is less detailed and has much less impact, particularly the loss of sleep, stage illustration.
Author: Otis

Title: Love the information that it provides…
Content: Love the information that it provides to me.
Author: Joann Homan

Title: I loved the old face in the app on my…
Content:
I loved the old face in the app on my phone, but now there is the new face which I don't like very much.
The old one was easier to manage.
Other then that I love my ringconn.
Author: Anka L Holbrook

Title: Free App is great
Content: Free App is great. New interface looks better and better. I like this ring a lot.
Author: guoxian xiao

Title: The size kit give a different fell when…
Content: The size kit give a different fell when wear. Actual size of the ring is a bit bigger.
Author: Vivian Lim

Title: excellent
Content: excellent. inintially i odered the wrong size. i sent it back , unopenednas advised, received a "sizer" and ordered the correct size. NO problems or issues just an exchange. Gret cutomer service.
Author: Rod MacLeod

Title: Lack of flexibility with returns or…
Content: Lack of flexibility with returns or exchanges
Author: SHW

Title: Love the product
Content: Love the product. Like how you are adding new features to track like walks and running! All the tracking plus no subscription makes this the best product on the market.
Author: Brendan Haas

Title: This device provides me with excellent…
Content: This device provides me with excellent health advice by giving me valuable information about my physiology. I am especially grateful for knowing my sleep patterns night after night
Author: Charron Bryant

Title: Good
Content: Take long to deliver
Author: ben Tudu Bianga

Title: easy product
Content: so easy to use
Author: Pamela Foster

Title: It's easy ti use
Content: It's easy ti use. The app ifree and I enjoy the layout.
Author: Cleda-louise Cuthbert

Title: Great product
Content: Date of experience: April 26, 2024
Author: Buck Phillips

Title: Love this Ring
Content: Love this Ring. It has helped me understand and keep track of my body
Author: Judy King

Title: Great tool to monitor my health
Content: I have been able to use the information on the app to understand how things are working with my CPAP. Also, after a recent surgery to see how low my O2 level was during the night after the surgery. I wish you had put a mark on the outside of the right that shows it is positioned correctly for reading. I tried myself, but nothing seems to stay on the coating. If there was a mark on the outside of the ring that would be towards the palm of your hand it would be easy to know that it had not twisted around too far.
Author: John Leininger

Title: Fuss free replacement
Content: A replacement was given without much fuss after proper verification and a return label was given too. However, am a bit skeptical that there's already an issue with the ring/charger less than 4 months from purchase. So if the new ring needs a replacement again in another 4months, should RingConn review their warranty policy? As currently, the ring is only under 1 year warranty but this will not be reasonable if a replacement is needed every few months. So we will wait and see.
Author: Wendy

Title: Overall experience was great
Content:
Overall experience was great. Purchased it over their website, and first I got a sizing kit. After two days wearing/testing on fingers, just choose your size and you get your ring after some days. In my case was pretty fast, less than 10 days.
Ring works amazing. I love how handles the sleep/nap and stress. It's pretty light, battery lasts for a week and app was translated recently to Spanish so can't be more happy with it.
I wear my RingConn and feeling like I wasn't. Sometimes I forget I wear it! It's amazing how many information can we get from such a device like this.
I am very happy about it!
Author: Salva

Title: Great Product
Content:
Overall, a great experience.
I received it 10 days after the order.
The product works perfectly. I've been using it for the past 5 months and I'm really satisfied with it
Author: Davide Alloggio

Title: My experiences after half a year of use
Content: The ring is almost unnoticeable. The ring battery lasts 6 days. The charging box also includes a battery and you can charge the ring in the box several times before you have to charge the box's battery. Ideal if you are traveling without electricity for several weeks. The ring has integrated memory and does not have to be permanently connected to the cell phone. When the connection is restored, the measurement data is sent to the cell phone and the cloud. The app is very clear and easy to understand. The positive thing is that it doesn't require a subscription and the app is therefore free. The app is available in multiple languages and Ring Conn is constantly working to improve the app. You can actively start measurements yourself in the app. Ring Conn Support always strives to provide a solution to questions as quickly as possible. I can recommend this product with a clear conscience. I hope I was able to answer a few questions for those interested in the recession. Greetings David
Author: Frau Heidelinde Schwarz

Title: No brainer, get it now.
Content: Works great. Love it and the non subscription model is the best part of it.
Author: Connor

Title: Ring conn correspondence
Content: There was little correspondence between the day order was made to the actual delivery date
Author: Stephen D Silva

Title: great form and function
Content: great form and function, never fails me.
Author: Philip Hannahson

Title: I ordered three rings
Content:
I ordered three rings. One of the ring size was not accurate. There’s no way to return the ring. I was told that I cannot return the ring because I chose the size.

Please note an American seven fits me perfect this particular rain fits on my pinky finger horrible horrible service
Author: Racquel Gil

Title: The ring works properly
Content:
The ring works properly. Is waterproof. The only trouble is, that it does not give a single nod, that the battery is low. (It worked in the beginning, maybe something changed wit upgrade).
Anyway I recommend!
Author: Marcela B

Title: Vero happy
Content: Using ringconn since 4 months and i ma happy. It’s conmfortable and the battery lasts for a week or so. The app Is getting better after every update, but still have functions to be added. No subscription needed and this Is a very big plus
Author: matteo di marzio

Title: Happy with my purchase
Content: Top product, happy with my purchase.
Author: Sir Stefaan

Title: Good but not as advertise on coating
Content: Ease of purchase. But the product is already showing signs of wear and tear after 3 months. Coating not very sturdy.
Author: Karla Thompson

Title: Overall pleased with the device.
Content: The measurement ring and actual ring were delivered on time and arrived as promised. Setup was easy. The software is easy to understand. Device has worked as promised since I got it. It's great for sleep profiling, and stress rate when I'm not exercising. HR is not tracked well during vigourous exercise.
Author: Chris Cowan

Title: I like the fitness tracking feature
Content: I like the fitness tracking feature. When will walking, outdoor cycling, indoor running, be available? The size is perfect. I can do any workout wear my ring guard.
Author: Diana Bessler

Title: I like reviewing alot of the stats
Content:
I like reviewing alot of the stats. It helps motivate me to improve.
Really wish it tracked mileage along with the step count.
Author: Amy

Title: All the features, no subscription needed
Content: We shopped multiple smart rings. We decided to go with RingConn because it offered all the same features as the others, costs less, and had no monthly subscription cost! Love it!
Author: Josh

Title: Nice ring to monitors health
Content: Nice ring to monitors health
Author: Raymond SINNAH

Title: Issue fixed!!! No exchange, no customer service
Content:
Ring was too small despite ordering the right size. When I asked to exchange it I was told they didn't have that option so I should just wear it on a different finger.

Update: after leaving my review I was contacted by Ringconn and they were able to send me the sizing kit, and a new ring (their sizes are very different from regular rings). They were very responsive and the shipping time was very quick. I'll be sending the wrong sized ring back. I'm very happy with the results and hope they keep up the good work. I changed my rating from 1 to 5 stars.
Author: Tayln Rece

Title: Trully outstanding !
Content:
Trully outstanding !
First one i receive was bornes and They replace it with no stupid question
super app on iPhone work super good
Fit super well and confortable too wear all day long and i dont Like wear ring.
Only complain is The black finish that Wear off rapidly (should take silver)
Author: Patrick Lorenson

Title: The product is great
Content: The product is great. Wish the ring would pair faster.
Author: justin williams

Title: This ring is super comfortable
Content: This ring is super comfortable. The main reason to buy this one was to track the sleep. I was looking for other options but ringconn was unique due to the price, no subscription fee app and moderate design. The data and trend seems pretty close to my apple watch 9.I ordered the size 8, which fits perfectly. The only suggestion I can give them is to come up with some more options of the ring protector. It comes with 3 transparent one but I have recently ordered a different one from Amazon.
Author: Akib Jabed

Title: I purchased my RingConn around the…
Content: I purchased my RingConn around the Black Friday sales. Everything went smoothly until UPS lost my package. No fault of RingConn they immediately sent me a replacement package so that it would arrive in time for the holidays. Thank you so much. I would definitely recommend them.
Author: Rany W

Title: best ring ever better then Apple Watch
Content: loved so much I got one for my girlfriend she al so loved highly recommended
Author: Guillermo Maggiolo

Title: Got this for my BF he loves it so much…
Content:
Got this for my BF he loves it so much you would've thought I asked him to marry me😂
I feel like when we do get married this will be his wedding ring he never takes it off for too long‼️‼️
Author: marqueta (your # ! Customer) mitchell

Title: Easy to track with additional features(got & inline)
Content: Easy to track and constant updates with additional features.
Author: RJ

Title: During my first 30 days with your…
Content: During my first 30 days with your service I got readouts daily in the form of graph charts which I like. In the last 3 days I am getting simple circle readouts in a two page form. I want to go back to the original graph type readouts. How do I do that? Did I by accident change the original charted material data? Please tell me how to change it back to the original format?? Thank you
Author: Richard Hickey

Title: Wear and forget..
Content:
Wear and forget...much better than wearing smart watches. Battery is good enuf for a week.
Hope to see more thinner ones, longer life and fancier design on the ring instead of plain ones.
Author: Ken Kiong Liew

Title: Well made and fine ring
Content: Everything fine! Good product, recommandation
Author: Christian Plattner

Title: So far so good
Content: Overall great product. One star down because I don't like those purple/pink colors in the new update. It would be nice if we had some options.
Author: Luk��? Ku?av��k

Title: It keeps good track of you sleep and…
Content: It keeps good track of you sleep and steps. I like it a lot better than a watch.
Author: Sherrie Haugen

Title: The ring does everything it claims to…
Content: The ring does everything it claims to do. Although the steps are much less than what my phone or watch says……
Author: Jenn

Title: I've had this ring for about 6 months…
Content: I've had this ring for about 6 months now. This ring is very comfortable and the readings for fitness and wellness are pretty accurate. I like the fact that the tracking app is free and they're constantly making updates. I charge my ring every 7 days and could probably go 8. I really hope they eventually add more color selection for rings. I'd definitely buy another one.
Author: Heather Turck

Title: Impressive development
Content:
I think I picked up the RingConn shortly after it came out in the market and I feel it has made great progress in the development of the application and customer support.
It seems to me to be very accurate in measuring all the factors, although I still have to understand how it distinguishes the amount and type of movement I do (so how many steps I take or am I just standing, rather than waving my arms or lifting a weight).
Author: jacopo.borgognoni

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Slim and sleek
Content: I love my Ring Conn! I am not a fan of the big Apple/Android watches. This is small, somewhat invisible and provides lots of data. I especially like the sleep tracker and stress tracker - very helpful.
Author: Maggie Rimmer

Title: 6-months review…
Content: I’ve had my RingConn ring for exactly 6 months now. It has given very reliable results over this time period with no significant problems, particularly helping me track sleep and steps. The step-tracking feature has definitely been a helpful motivator in getting me active most every day. Although I did need to learn exactly how it was measuring ‘steps’ - which was not the number of times my feet touched the ground, but was actually the number of times my arms would swing freely as I walked. For instance I did need to learn to carry my grocery bag with my right hand in the store and let my left (ring) hand swing freely, if I wanted my shopping walking to count. But it’s basically been an extremely effective - and also very unobtrusive - device for helping me monitor these health & wellness functions.
Author: Roger Byrd

Title: Ring Benefits
Content: The people I worked with were very knowledgeable and understanding. They took the time to answer my questions directly and provided me with the best product possible. I am using my Ring for weight loss and maintenance. It keeps a detailed measurement of my steps, heart rate, and O2 levels. The ring is so accurate my doctor is using the data collected to help monitor my sleep patterns and stress levels. I recently had surgery, and the Ring is a great way to monitor my activity levels as I slowly gain more mobility and endurance.
Author: Lorry Getz

Title: Very comfortable
Content: My first ring stopped charging after a few weeks. I contacted technical service and they sent me a replacement ring very quickly. I wanted something I could sleep in to keep track of my heart rate and oxygen levels. This is perfect. It's very comfortable.
Author: Rita Hunter

Title: I love the data I get every day
Content: I love the data I get every day, which helps me to see how my health is doing.
Author: Judith Labert

Title: The overall I'm very pleased with the…
Content: The overall I'm very pleased with the ease of use and simplicity of the app
Author: Lance m Lucas

Title: Highly recommended!
Content: My ring looks good and is never in the way, the data is accurate, and the app keeps getting better, with no subscription. Highly recommended!
Author: NS

Title: Happy but missing activity tracking
Content: The ring is comfortable and I like it more than wearing a smart watch. The battery in my case lasts around 6 days and the measurement of vital signs works good thus sometimes the sleep stages are not correct. I am surprised by the robust surface that is not as sensitive to scratches as I expected. When charging I notice a burnt smell which I already reported to support
Author: Ljolik

Title: Wonderful
Content: Wonderful. Very few minor issues.
Author: Robert Cartwright

Title: Works great
Content: Works great. Comfortable
Author: Lynn Sather

Title: GREAT INFORMATION
Content: I use the data collected everyday to record or manage my health. The app I feel is really good at displaying the info clearly and understandably. I will by another when this one wears out. Really don't have to much to complain about love the produ t
Author: Jason White

Title: The great thing is it helps me know I may be doing to much. keep…
Content: The great thing is it helps me to keep on track to keep active. I am rehabbing a hip replacement and it helps to realize when I over did my walking and activity level when I hurt more one day.
Author: D Schwartz

Title: Good tool
Content: There is a lot of data connected with this ring. Glad its a ring, don’t like having to wear a watch. I like the sedentary alert. I am looking forward to the outdoor walking and biking addition. I am a bit suspicious on the sleeping aspects, and the ring’s ability to track my sleep. For instance, I did not sleep well last night, fairly miserable in fact, and yet the ring said i did ok. Said i was asleep, when i know i was not. That’s a small thing, overall i like the ring.
Author: Trudi Sedlak-Outlaw

Title: I love my ring!!
Content: I love my ring!!! I love how it tracks my steps and heart rate!! I also love not having to charge it every day!!! Way better than any watch!!!
Author: Felicia Cintron

Title: Easy to read information
Content: Very good product
Author: Timothy Guter

Title: Smart system where'll you get a sizing…
Content:
Smart system where'll you get a sizing kit and can then pick the right size.
Product itself is good and the app is continuously updated.
Author: Liza

Title: Detailed analysis of health insights…
Content: Detailed analysis of health insights was awesome.
Author: William Arthur

Title: Product works well and as designed
Content: Product works well and as designed. The interface initially was very clear, but every once in a while.They send updates that change everything and it gets a little confusing. Not really clear what the badges are all about, nor do I really care. I just want the data and the data provided is helps me track my calories so that I can eat accordingly. Sleep report is also Interesting to review.
Author: Arturo Fanjul

Title: Works well but a few negatives
Content: Ring doesn’t automatically sync with phone, so have to remember to do this. Step counter not accurate.
Author: Allan Conway

Title: Love it
Content: Love it! Great price, no subscription, comfortable to wear and works great! I've had it for 6 months now and Love it!
Author: Steve

Title: It's ok
Content: It's ok. Ring needs just a few improvements.
Author: customer

Title: Very happy with my Ring
Content: Very happy with my Ring. It is accurate and has helped improve my overall health.
Author: Rick Grisdale

Title: Temperature tracking is only average…
Content: Temperature tracking is only average temperature at night. I mostly got the ring for the temperature tracking so was disappointed and learned to late that they don’t accept refunds.
Author: Sally Jones

Title: Everything about RingConn is good.
Content: Everything about RingConn is good.
Author: Patrick Trusio

Title: Lack of features
Content: I feel it’s lacking features, but overall I like it.
Author: Marc Durocher

Title: Great functionalities but not especially attractive
Content: The functionalities of the ring are great and the data seems accurate. Speedy charging time and battery life good so far - I've had the ring 4 months. My only issue is that the silver ring is not a shiny silver colour, it's grey. So it's not as attractive as it looks on the website and I cannot wear it with other rings as it looks too dull and bulky. However, it's light and easy to wear and encourages me to keep active!
Author: K Lloyd

Title: overall a great experience
Content:
overall a great experience
The quality of the ring is good and the user experience in the app is even better.
A job well done!
Author: Dr. Lutz Graumann

Title: Great value for money with some tweaks needed here and there
Content:
The whole pipeline from receiving the size kit to the actually ring was super smooth! The ring itself is very robust! Using it for more than 3 months now, I haven’t experienced any issues! The app is constantly improving to include new features!

Great sleep tracking but the steps counter algorithm could use some refinement! It counts more steps than it should.

Overall very good experience so far and great value for money!
Author: Dimitrios K.

Title: I love the RingConn
Content:
I love the RingConn
I love the updates, especially the new colors.
It should just be scratch resistant but overall me and my partner love it.
Author: Fuzzy

Title: Ring went bad in 3 months
Content: Ring went bad in 3 months. Called support and was replaced. Tech component, I understand, but should not have gone bad.
Author: najam javeed

Title: I've had it for 6 months now and I love…
Content: I've had it for 6 months now and I love it. I can't really compare with Oura because I never had one but RingConn has made consistent upgrades to the application improving it tremendously in just 6mo. I love how long the battery lasts and the consistency of the measurements. I also wear an Apple watch and there are big gaps in the data since the watch can be finicky about lighting (for heart rate). but the ring is well-sized for my finger and keeps giving me data. I especially appreciate the stress measurement. When I see it go orange or read I do try to do some breathing exercises, take a walk or just relax a bit and reframe my mind.
Author: Fernanda

Title: I like the statistic and no…
Content: I like the statistic and no subscription. The ring is well crafted except the paint easily scratch.
Author: Danny Lai

Title: The ring takes quite a long period to…
Content: The ring takes quite a long period to sync to the app. Would be great to have stationary cycling on the app.
Author: Gregg Crandall

Title: There is room for improvement on the…
Content:
There is room for improvement on the app!
1- missing lots of workouts plans
2- app is not so user friendly
3- doesn't show body temperature at any situation
Author: Ramin Zandieh

Title: Take control of your health
Content: I ordered the Ringconn, because, once purchased, I did not need to pay a monthly subscription for access to my biometric information. Ringconn sends you a ring measuring kit and once l submit my size, I waited 10 days for delivery of my stylish and data-rich ring. The ring measures a variety of biometrics and provides explanations for the information provided. I wear it daily, and use the readings to adjust activity, manage stress, identify sleep patterns, a variety of other health related information. The ring is amazing and worth the cost.
Author: Steven E Heath

Title: Glad I went with Ringconn
Content: Glad I went with Ringconn. Long battery life, fast charge, love the analytics. Has helped me improve my overall health, fitness, and sleep. Updates are great!
Author: C. B.

Title: Great battery life but scratches easily
Content: Love the battery life and quick charging. However the ring itself is very scratched just from normal wear after daily use for only 6 months.
Author: Amanda

Title: Excellent product and customer service!
Content: Date of experience: April 22, 2024
Author: William Methvin

Title: Very poor customer service
Content: I lost my ring while swimming and reached out to the RingConn team. They offered me to buy a new ring for essentially the same price i had bought the first one for. When I reached out again and explained that i did not need the charger etc and asked for a more reasonable price for a replacement ring I never heard back from them. Very poor customer service
Author: Marcus Schabacker

Title: The still not tough enough for gym…
Content:
The still not tough enough for gym workout.

Heart rate accuracy not as good as watch or strap.
Author: Matthias

Title: Good product but wish battery last…
Content: Good product but wish battery last longer and able to connect to Garmin Connect App.
Author: Ridwan Basri

Title: Ring replacement policy could be…
Content: Ring replacement policy could be improved.
Author: Peng Lee GOH

Title: Excellent Value and Design
Content:
This is my 2nd ring as I was extremely pleased with my original, but wanted a different color. Pairing and exchanging is seamless. The App is extremely well designed, data is clear and precise.
The ring design- the circle in square- is elegant. And no subscription fees!
Author: Gary H.

Title: So far so good
Content: So far, so good! I wished it synced with more third party apps. Looks good, durable, and awesome battery life!
Author: Anoop M.

Title: Coming out with new features regularly…
Content: Coming out with new features regularly is excellent! Maintaining a free app is very important. I have told people about the ring and how useful it is. I have had many insights since purchasing the ring.
Author: Eric Johnson

Title: RingConn the best smart ring with no subscription
Content:
Had ring from early days in Feb 2023 14 months on and this ring is fantastic - there are regular updates in app and firmware each one creating a better experience.

Also this ring has No Subscription which I love, all updates free

Found the vitals/ Heart Rate - HRV-Spo2 oxygen Sleep to be extremely accurate when testing against other equipment I have.
Sleep Apnea is under testing as is fertility tracking as I write this review

Overall this ring has made a massive difference how I track my health- don’t use Apple Watch for that anymore - no more bulky watch at night for sleep tracking- each day i track my vitals to see how I’m doing,

Love the customer care team and feedback team - very proactive - they have a great group where everyone asks questions and give their views and RingConn interact directly with people in group on Facebook

Overall 5 stars - love the ring and regular updates wether young and healthy for sports tracking or older like myself - I find this ring a great asset for tracking my health - well done RingConn for being proactive in developing this ring and keeping on top-with regular updates

Look forward to seeing more additions to an already brilliant ring with further updates
Author: Peter Lewis

Title: I love the analytics
Content:
I love the analytics, especially the sleep. I like to know the deficit and the type of sleep I am getting every night.

RingConn is good about sending updates which I love to see the changes. I also love that I only have to charge once a week.
Author: Stephanie Morimoto

Title: I like to use it to track my sleep
Content: I like to use it to track my sleep; it's very accurate and comfortable. I've used my RingConn for nearly one year and it still has a goog battery life for 6.5 days... I can know more about my sleep patterns and cultivate a good habit of sleeping.
Author: Amanda

Title: Very comfortable and helpful
Content: Very comfortable and helpful. Easy to follow the items and nice Optic. I am looking forward to a german Version to download. But the english version is absolutely great
Author: Birgit Becker

Title: Product was well packaged and tracking…
Content: Product was well packaged and tracking and delivery was also very good. The sending of size tests before was an excellent idea.
Author: Cameron Whitlock

Title: RingConn is tough
Content: RingConn is tough. I used too much strength to pull it off my finger and it flew out & hit the floor. I noticed its LED stopped lighting & thought it was broken. I put it back on my index finger & few hours later it started working again. The biometrics continues to give me valuable feedback on my current state, health-wise . Thanks.
Author: Phil C

Title: Good product and fantastic customer…
Content: Good product and fantastic customer service
Author: Donatus Osuorah

Title: Great concept but needs fine tuning
Content: The ring is a great idea but the app needs to be fine-tuned. It has a long time syncing many times even though my ring and phone are on my right hand. I love the many things it tracks but it's frustrating how many times it doesn't sync.
Author: First time buyer

Title: Inaccurate oximeter readings and poor customer service
Content: I purchased the device primarily to determine my oxygen saturation during exercise. I found the readings from your device to be quite inaccurate when I compared it to two other medical grade oximeters. I emailed your company, received a couple of replies, and then was ghosted.
Author: William

Title: This product has been great and is…
Content: This product has been great and is something that I use everyday. I also believe that the customer service has been phenomenal and I would not hesitate to buy this product again.
Author: M.Y.

Title: The color is coming off in a couple…
Content: The color is coming off in a couple spots.
Author: Greg Schossow

Title: No live person to talk to!
Content: Down side- There is no customer service number to talk to a live person. Had to email every instance of lost or missing data. If you have an issue like I did with it not tracking my sleep correctly all you can do is email. Sometimes the upload data works sometimes it doesn’t. When everything works correct it’s great. But I am Leary about trusting the data collected I was told to change the data and it doesn’t let me do that except with in small parameters. Hopefully it is now fixed after months of emails back and forth. Never a call to ask me anything!
Author: Debbie Prado

Title: I’ve been fascinated by it!
Content:
I’ve been fascinated by the O Ring experience … not quite obsessing … but close.
It has made me more mindful of my ‘sleep hygiene’ and if I’m active enough.
The sleep portion has been very interesting because it measures: REM, Deep sleep, how many times I wake up …
Author: Laura

Title: I bought this for my husband for…Christmas
Content: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He's an avid iWatch wearer. He's been dissatisfied and he indicates the ringconn doesn't really tell him much. He continues to wear it as a wedding band, but does not recommend. Interestingly, so many people inquired with us about it when he first got it, they were very interested.
Author: Jacqui Engebos

Title: Help me with doing my walking
Content: Help me with doing my walking, and telling how my sleeping habits are.
Author: Pam Chambers

Title: I have two - love them.
Content: I ordered two of these rings in two different colors and sizes. I just like to change it up and have found I can pair and unpair as I like and all the data is saved. Anyway, the ring does a good job of tracking what it is supposed to track. I bought it mostly to sleep track. I have learned a lot about my heart activity and breathing while sleeping, which has made me aware of my current health levels. If you are wanting to track health information I would recommend this as a potential device. I do hope they will eventually add more workout tracking options as I swim laps which the ring currently tracks as steps.
Author: LISA

Content: I gave only 3 stars because the ring is still going me incorrect sleep information

Content: I like that it’s waterproof and I forget that I’m wearing it. I would like automatic data uploading to my phone and reminders to charge ring.

Content: Great ring sofar. It keeps track of my steps and sleep similar to my Samsung watch. Seems pretty accurate. I owned the ring 6 months ago, still doing great.

Content: Any time I have had to reach out they are quick to respond.

The only issue is the finish. I workout with weight bars frequently and the ring scratches easy.

Content: The Ring works very Good. The free ring size kit was perfekt to try it a few Days on several fingers to test wich one is the best for me.

Content:
The battery life is superior to alternatives.
The app is good, but lacks connectivity at times.
There should be a "Low Battery" popup notification.

Title: Wife loves her Ring
Content: Wife loves her Ring. It’s accurate has tons of stats and info. Easy to use app. Ring conn is a great ring. Only problem wife had was with the gold finish after a few days was wearing off. Contacted ring conn and they sent out a ring protector for it. They seem to be a company who cares

Title: Mostly good
Content: Lots of information and has tips for improvement, although they seem a little generic. I am not always sure what the data means.

Content: Great product and customer support, pre and post
Author: Antonio Nogueira

Content: Extremely inaccurate to track cy ling calories spent and muscular training. Disappointed by that :(

Title: No Subscription required
Content: I bought this ring because it is the only one that didnt not reqire a monthy subscription
Author: Eric Stopfer

Title: Great Tech w/o monthly subscription
Content: Great Tech and really helps me monitor my physical and mental health. The only reason it does not get 5 Star is due to not having automatic data upload.
Author: Jose Pamanes

Title: Sleep metrics differ from other devices
Content: Sleep metrics differ from what I get from Oura and Samsung Galaxy Watch 6. The latter two do coincide quite well but not the RingConn, particularly Deep Sleep intervals.
Author: horacio goldenberg

Title: Ring.com is great
Content: My ring is wonderful. It gives me complete control over every part I of my life.
Author: Mal

Title: A great concept that could use improvements
Content:
1- the lack of half sizes was a problem for me. I had to choose either a ring that was too tight or two loose. When I contacted the company for help, they were very noncommittal, basically telling me that neither would be a good idea. Well, duh. I ultimately decided on too loose because I still wanted to be able to get the ring off if I was bloated or on a hot day. That resulted in nearly losing the ring a couple of times on very cold days because it fell right off my finger! I finally solved this by purchasing a very thin, cheap ring in my size from Amazon which I wear on top of my RingConn to keep it from falling off.

2- the Wellness Balance is not explained clearly. I check it, but other than my sleep & activity, it's not really intuitive what information I'm getting from my vital signs & stress scores. More info would be more helpful.

3- they started giving wellness badges. Ok. Cool. What exactly am I tracking?

4- I pretty much use this to track my steps. It's a lot more comfortable than an apple watch.

5- I do appreciate being able to use the app without a subscription, which is why I chose this over another ring on the market.

Bottom line- I like it. But I can't say I love it. It's a great concept that could use some improvements.
Author: Beth B

Title: My Ring Is Amazing
Content: I am very pleased with my Ring. I check my stats every day and make sure to meet my step goal daily. I love the way the ring tracks my sleep and helps me to know what I need to improve on. I can't wait for the menstrual tracking option as well.
Author: Liza Milligan

Title: To the individual that would like for…Replying to a posting
Content: To the individual that would like for their yo be a notification when ring is fully charged my let's me know when my ring is fully charged. You may want to check your notification settings to see if it's turned on.
Author: conard herndon

Title: I no longer have this ring...I sold it…
Content: I no longer have this ring...I sold it and then the buyer couldn't get it to work so I asked to get it sent back but never received it back. So, please don't bill me for anything as I don't have it but can get you the information of the person who does have it
Author: Karla

Title: Probably the best smart ring out there
Content:
I needed a tracker for sleep and was in search for a device, which can help me get some stats without bringing much discomfort by wearing it. Startet to research a market and found out a bunch of smart rings which offer exactly what i need. After long consideretaions i have ordered RingConn and it was a right choice. For me it was importnant that battery lasts long, price/feature ratio is decent and there is no monthly subscription for it.
I was sleeping in sleep laboratory connected to monitoring systems and wearing my Ringconn ring. And results of ring measurements were really close to lab, so i am totally happy with it
Author: Oleg

Title: At your own pace.
Content:
At your own pace.
I've been wearing my ring for about 6 months. It assures me that I'm doing well with sleep and stress, but need some work on my movement. Overall the ring does what it should. I wish it had an option for tracking food/calorie intake, but other programs and apps are available. I would also like the ring to be less noticeable. I have short, chubby fingers, and this ring draws attention. I have the silver version.
Author: Lynn Scramuzza

Title: DOES NOT MEASURE SWIMMING VERY…
Content: DOES NOT MEASURE SWIMMING VERY ACCURATELY
Author: TONY

Title: Great ring
Content: The ring works very well and seems accurate and it gives plenty of updates,the only drawback for me is that i would like a couple of bigger sizes otherwise a great ring.
Author: Joan

Title: The ring is very helpful lots of good…
Content: The ring is very helpful lots of good info in it. Love the activity/walking tracker. The only issue I have is that after wearing it several weeks at a time I get a rash around my finger. But I take it off a couple days and it goes away and then I can put it back on for a couple more weeks. .
Author: Elaine O.

Title: Great experience
Content: Great experience. The ring is and does exactly what I expected. Great product …so far.

Title: Accuracy, consistency
Content: Love the concept, don't like the bulkiness, the sleep mode needs alittle more accuracy, ( will say I'm sleeping while reading or watching TV. But overall I like it.

Content: After few months the ring stopped syncing with the app, so now it doesn’t work. I have updated the app a million times, nothing works anymore. Just 5-6months old

Title: Just does not FEEL sturdy for manual…
Content: Just does not FEEL sturdy for manual labor. I still do not get it wet to often because I see all of the lights and STUFF. Maybe the OLDER it gets I will not care if it tears up, but I like its operation so far.

Title: My Ring
Content: Had become a daily part of my life.

Title: I have a two part review
Content: I have a two part review. The ring itself is awesome. I love all the data I'm getting particularly about my sleep. The ring looks nice on my hand, and the charge lasts 7 days. I'm pleased with the product. Customer service is another story. I did have an issue and customer service by email was mind numbingly slow. When I did get a response it was from someone who is barely fluent in English. It was maddening.

Title: Happy Customer
Content: Love getting sleep data, #steps, stress measurement in particular. Like that the product is being constantly improved. The Facebook feedback is informative and helpful.

Title: I love my RingConn
Content: I love my RingConn. I highly recommend to anyone who wants to track their overall health. Helps me reach my daily goals!
