Title: No subscription, Great look and fit, regular updates..
Content: I am very pleased with my purchase of the RingConn. I had waited alost a year fro another ring, which kept getting delayed and delayed, and finally, due to lack of true communication from the manufacturer, went to look at alternatives. This ring has terrific battery life, delivers all the salient dtata points needed for me to balance my lifestyle and looks and fits wonderfully. I hghly recommend it to anyone looking for quality and value. The best part is they continue to add functionality with every update.

Content: I got the ring,it was to small I tried to return it,they wouldn't take it back. So I have a brand new ring still in the box that I have had for months.

Title: Solid smart-wear device! Can recommend!
Content:
Solid smart wear device! I can recommend this ring. The Ringconn was easy to set up and the app gives you a ton of data. Also seems to be more accurate in a lot of instances than my Fitbit or Samsung Watch, so happy about that as well. 3. Visually, the ring is holding up too (I am a desk worker). No scratches etc. (I have the gold version)
The ordering process was a bit of a hassle due to unclear notifications regarding shipment. I was sent the fitting set twice, but it looked like my ring was shipped. All in all, it took longer than I thought or hoped. Bottomline: I can recommend this wearable!

Title: Amazing ring with a amazing app
Content:
I've had the ring for ≈5 months now and so far I'm very happy with it.

The app is updated very frequently with new features being added. Since I got the ring there has been an updated summary as well as new features to tack outdoor running.

All my contact with the company has been really great as well. I order the protector and received a size small er than I ordered. They quickly corrected their mistake and I got 2 new protector of the correct size a few days later. I even were able to change the size after having submitted a smaller size than I actually wanted.

The ring itself is very nice and both feels and looks great. It's very comfortable to wear and I usually forget that I'm even wearing it. It's great at tracking sleep and over-all activity. Although the downside is that it's quite inaccurate when working out in a gym and the heart rate seems to be far off. But at the same time, it's not an activity tracker and I don't expected it to be as accurate for workouts as a fitness tracker.
Author: Markus Johansson

Title: I received an empty plastic bag
Content: I received an empty plastic bag stating that package was damaged, but there was absolutely nothing in the package. RingConn says that delivered it and that was the end of it.

Title: Does exactly what I wanted
Content:
Does exactly what I wanted. Ruled out Aura due to subscription. Circle are having "issues."

I wear it 24/7. Swimming, sleeping, showering. Charge once a week. App just works not fuss. Kudos to RingConn after 4 months of use can highly recommend.

Got it as a Christmas gift and have been using it for four months now. Loving the RingConn app and the ring. The data provided to me are priceless, the insights really motivates me to up my health game. Some of my friends have been inspired and got the ring themselves.

I’m not affiliated with RingConn.

I love the recharging case

Title: Bought as a replacement for my Oura
Content:
Bought as a replacement for my Oura
I am very pleased with it. I've read complaints from others about the finish, the app, recording workouts etc. but have experienced none of these issues. Still looks as good today as the day it was received.
5 years ago, the thought of wearing something on a finger that would give you decent metrics about your health was unthinkable. You have that today, without the monthly fees that others wish to charge. Have recommended to many.
Author: Dave F

Title: Durable and Decent Battery Life
Content: When the battery is low the notification could be improved on the phone and vibration. It has been out of battery for a day many times bc I forgot to charge it and I didn't know it was dead. That is the plus side. The ring feels like a wedding ring. It is light, durable and sleek. My biggest gripe is the amount of time it takes to sync data when I want to see the data on my phone. I don't want to ALWAYS have to wait for sync to see my data. Overall does great a tracking and continuing to improve data tracking and visualization has given me a better understanding of my body.
Author: Ian

Title: The staff is very prompt and…
Content: The staff is very prompt and responsive. Loving the ring.

Title: Very good ring
Content:
Very good ring. I use it day and night and also while working. All data are very accurate.
I only miss some small things. (Stair counter, automatic workout start)

Title: Battery is very weak
Content: Battery is very weak. It drains down before 48 hours and i have to put it to charge again.

Title: Great battery runtime
Content: Great battery runtime, very good app with lots of data and health tips. App now in different languages. Ring is well and solid made.

Title: Has changed my attitude toward…
Content: Has changed my attitude toward wellness. Look forward to meeting the goals.

Title: 5 months of wearing the ring
Content: My wife and I both like our rings and wear them constantly. They give useful and interesting information, and it's easy to understand the data. Holds a charge for a full week. I still don't understand how it knows I'm sleeping and how deeply. I think I sleep longer than it says I do, but who am I to question ... ?
Author: Charles Black

Title: NO SUBSCRIPTION FEE
Content:
Awesome device!! The plus point why I chose RingConn is because there is no subscription fees as compared to other brands.. does what it needs to do. Give me insights of my health daily and how to improve and now the latest update is it tracks my workout..

Anticipating for lots of new functions and improvements in the years to come and hopefully new ring designs too..

Hopefully the company stay true to us and continue not charging us a subscription fee!!
Author: Darz

Title: Best Smart ring!
Content: I bought the ring in December. The package arrived quickly to Finland! The ring has been really good! Ringconn has really good support networks on Facebook, and you can always get help if needed! The best smart ring I know! Thank you!

Title: I’ve really enjoy this product and look…
Content: I’ve really enjoy this product and look forward to seeing a newer, slimmer, more compact version of the ring that would be more comfortable for a woman’s hand. I’ve been wearing it 24/7 since mid Dec 2023

Title: Highly satisfied...
Content:
I've been using my Ringconn for over two months now. I'm really happy with my purchase. The battery lasts all week and the data I get from my sleep and activity has made me be more conscious of my health and what I need to improve. I don't have to worry about subscriptions either in order to take full advantage of the data it produces.
I'm impressed by the design and the high quality material. Very well made.
The charging case is great for traveling since I don't have to plug it in to AC to charge my ring. Overall, a great product at a great reasonable price.
Author: Ricardo Avila

Title: ring did not fit
Content: ring did not fit. I tried to exchange immediately. Was told because I did not use the sizing chart I could not. Threw it in the drawer never touched it since. I am sure to share my experience on every social media platform I can every time it comes up.
Author: Jevon Morris

Title: The ring stopped charging after 2…
Content: The ring stopped charging after 2 months of use.

Title: Very happy with the amount of…
Content: Very happy with the amount of information that the ring collects. And the way it allows you to use it

Content: I bought and used the ring for maybe a week and it broke. Still kept wearing it and it fell off my finger in the ocean. Not sure of the date!

Title: I love my Ringconn
Content: I love my Ringconn. I have had it about 3 months now and have had zero issues.
Author: Becky Grindle

Title: Very difficult to return
Content: Very difficult to return. They sent wrong size rings. Scratched very easily. Not very round.

Title: Ring does perform as expected
Content: Ring does perform as expected. Quality and value are key.

Title: Reliable, affordable. No monthly app fee gouging!
Content:
This ring tracker for day and night time vital signs has helped me understand lifestyle choices that impact my sleep and general health. I love that the app is free and, unlike other trackers, doesn’t gouge you with an ongoing monthly app fee.
The style of the ring is a bit clunky for my hands but is not a deal breaker.

Title: Wish I had this years ago!!
Content: Great comfort, great monitoring/reporting, great battery life! Attractive (although I expected it to be shiny), not obtrusive.

Title: The ring is okay
Content: The ring is okay. I got it because I didn’t want to have a tan line from the type of fitness devices that go on your wrist. Great sleep tracking, but disappointed that it can’t track my non walking workouts. I do a lot of cycling classes and it doesn’t ever track those.

Title: The information is useful and the data…
Content: The information is useful and the data is helpful to create and idea on how to maintain health parameters. Looking forward to the new sport activities to become available for use.

Title: Ever since i got this ring it's been a…
Content: Ever since i got this ring it's been a life changer for me. It's more than life itself that has changed how i feel...my stress...activities it says it all. And best of all only needs charging once a week and very comfortable to wear all day long.Easy to understand the app very well....I'm 1000% times happy about this purchase.

Title: Nice
Content: Nice, easy to use app that has changed the way I sleep and rest.

Content: The ring and the app work as advertised. This is increasingly difficult to find in products these days.

Title: The ring and the app work perfectly

Title: Love my Ring Conn
Content: Love my Ring Conn! It’s half the price of Oura and does NOT require a monthly subscription to use the app! Gives very accurate info on sleep, activity, and stress. Battery lasts almost a week! No issues whatsoever. I do wish it would send your phone a notification when your stress is high so I can better pinpoint what is contributing to my occasional high stress numbers. Other than that, it’s perfect. Would absolutely purchase again.
Author: Lauren S.

Title: Pickleball
Content: Pickleball - need you to create a tracker for that. The heartrate monitor does not seem to do too well. It's generally a very helpful tool

Content: Really appreciate the fact that is tracking my sleep, and the different stages of sleep. The activity tracker, I feel is not correct,which is part of the reason for this purchase, I've checked it against another activity tracker,and RING is much lower measuring steps

Title: Love my RingConn
Content: Love my RingConn
Author: Alan Arakelian

Title: RingConn Review
Content:
RingConn Review
Basically it provides the essential health monitoring which i am looking for though I would be more happy if it can include more monitoring such as blood sugar, high blood pressure
the only unpleasant experience is every time I click on the app, it request me to pair and connect which i thought already done so and as a result might have no data collected during "not conneced" and requested me to add as sleep during those period

Title: My Favorite Wearable!
Content: I really like my ring - it’s comfortable, the battery life is great (love the charging case), and the health metrics are exactly what I was looking. I wear it all the time and I also own an iwatch and a garmin watch.
Author: RPC

Title: Love this ring!
Content: I am so happy with my ring! It is accurate, dependable, and durable. I would not recommend the protective cover. It takes away from the look and moisture can build up inside of it. I had another (brand) ring that gave me nothing but trouble. My ringconn ring is fabulous! I highly recommend it!
Author: Susie D

Title: Great fitness ring
Content: Great fitness ring. Almost perfect sleep records and activity tracking. No subscription costs makes it a clear winner over Ours
Author: Gordon Hanson

Title: A mixed bag of positives and negatives
Content:
The ringconn's good features: it fit well because of the way they send out sample rings to try; the data seemed plentiful and helpful to me; Less expensive than the Aura ring.
Negative: I did not care for the gold color - not pretty. My ring died about 4 months after I purchased. I didn't even try to get it replaced because of earlier attempts for help from the company that weren't helpful.
Author: dianne crouse

Title: RingConn is a great product!
Content: RingConn is my go to device/app to assess my sleep, metabolism and steps. I very happy with it, and looking forward to some software updates that will make it even better!
Author: Michael Sheldon

Title: Love it!
Content: I love mine! It’s so nice to be able to keep track of all my stats.
Author: Curt Wallace

Title: Love my experience wearing the ring!
Content: Love my experience wearing the ring!
Author: David B.

Title: Seems fairly accurate
Content: Seems fairly accurate. Wish it measured distance. Battery is good for an entire week. I have the black ring and the side with the sensors has lost most of the black.
Author: Craig Ball

Title: It’s to bulky gives me blisters and…
Content: It’s to bulky gives me blisters and pinches my skin and now I’m stuck with it!
Author: Angela

Title: So far
Content:
So far, so good with my replacement ring. Thank you for quickly responding to get me a replacement ring.
Would really appreciate knowing what the problem was with my errant original ring and if there is anything I can do to insure the issue doesn't return to my replacement ring.
Please advise. Thanks.
Author: Ken Peters

Title: Smooth transaction
Content: Smooth transaction
Author: David Cook

Title: The ring and functionality is exactly as described
Content: The ring and functionality is exactly as advertised, looks and wears great ( I selected black ), has been very durable with no scratches and the syncing function works flawlessly. The app is very user friendly and very informative, activity tracking is great but the sleep and stress tracking have been extremely insightful helping me adjust my day and nights for better sleep. The new achievement badges are great and the soon to be activity functions ( outdoor walk, run, etc. ) will be a great addition. Lastly no monthly subscription is a big 👍, great value for the price, customer service has been excellent. I would recommend RingConn over the other couple of brands.
Author: Randy Stitt

Title: The return policy/customer service will discourage purchasing
Content: really love this ring. I bought for Christmas one for me and one for my husband. We never opened my husbands ring it is still sealed in the ring box just as delivered. I emailed customer support to exchange for a larger size and was informed there was no return. This service took every bit of of 5 stars down to ZERO. I have never been so disappointed in a business and also it was not advertised well there was no returns. I spent over $500.00 :( and stuck with a great product that is being wasted still sealed up when my husband could be enjoying it like me.
Author: Stephanie Pope

Title: Smart ring is good. Delivery takes long
Content: The ring itself is as expected. Functions well and has replaced my Apple Watch when monitoring my sleep. However, one star is removed due to shipping. Took nearly 2 months to be delivered in EU. My package was lost but I did receive it eventually after getting in touch with Ringconn support. They are very responsive.
Author: MG Becongco

Title: The ring is very accurate!
Content: The ring Is very accurate when it comes to stress level, heart level and counting steps it is a very good ring and I would recommend it to any of my family and friends
Author: Mark V Johnson

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: personal doctor
Content: I love my ring my personal doctor It keeps me on track
Author: Lynn Zeneski

Title: Your product says it all
Content: Your product says it all, does what you advertised! Very easy to connect and monitors everything i need. Very happy with purchase
Author: Henrietta NY

Title: Not happy as it’s based in China so…
Content:
Not happy as it’s based in China so I’ll not register all my information
It’s unfortunate
Author: Yolanta

Title: Great for sleep improvement
Content: This has helped me gauge my sleep patterns and although it is not always accurate, it has helped me create a better sleep schedule. As far as anything else, I was not concerned with it as sleep was my biggest issue which is why I purchased it.
Author: Barbara

Title: Helps me understand how my body reacts…
Content: Helps me understand how my body reacts to good/poor sleep. Also helps to mange stress.
Author: Kim

Title: I have never been able to sync the ring…
Content: I have never been able to sync the ring with my phone. I have asked for a refund but have gotten no where. Very poor experience.
Author: Dwight Stapleton

Title: Great Ring at Price Point
Content: It's a great ring with visibility into important health monitoring statistics. The battery always lasts at least 7 days and one forgets their wearing it once your finger gets used to having it on. It's awesome to wear while sleeping as it's so much smaller than my smart watch. The only thing I can think of that could be improved is having a notification on my phone when the ring charge finishes without needing to have the app open.
Author: Mike Thomas

Title: I really like the ring and it is really useful.
Content: I really like the ring and it is usually quite accurate. I believe a spread of activities would be really beneficial so that would take away the need to have other health apps.
Author: Sandra Martin

Title: great product for the price without…
Content:
great product for the price without subscription fees !
The app is getting better and better cost/value the best for a connected ring !
Author: Batifoulier

Title: Everything about the ring is…
Content:
Everything about the ring is exceptional.
From the product to the app.
The app has so much information and helps me keep tabs on my health.
I love it all and love telling my friends about it ! ! !
Author: Dave Cecchini

Title: RingConn is light, comfortable, and convenient.
Content: RingConn is light, comfortable, and so convenient. This is my first ring tracker and I'm hooked. The app is easy to use and provides a font of wellness data. The fact that it's included is the reason I chose RingConn o er the competition initially. I love everything about my RingConn with only one exception... it doesn't "talk" to Noom. If/when it starts talking to Noom, I'll change my rating to 5 stars.
Author: D Fisher

Title: Wish I loved it
Content: The sizing kit was great in theory but fit more snug than the ring I received. The ring itself is very unattractive, uncomfortably bulky and the sensor lights are too bright. The data is probably close enough but I've noticed inaccuracies in steps and sleep/awake times. I still wear the ring sometimes for sleep tracking but for the price I'm disappointed.
Author: EL

Title: My Ring Conn Experience
Content: I really enjoyed your presentation, it made me feel Selective in intreing my interest in your product, and vision as well, I would like see a Blood Pressure sensor in the works, and the non subscription fee is a plus for me, don't change it, I liked your product, so well , I brought my Daughter one too!
Author: Wesley Owens-Bey

Title: have had defects with sleep setup and…
Content: have had defects with sleep setup and stats for several weeks with no solutions.
Author: Leonard Price

Title: not that great
Content:
1. The connection to my phone app never seems to work right. It always tells me I need an app to use it despite the app being loaded.
2. The ring seems to calculate steps when I'm driving in my car. One day it said I did 9000 steps but I had barely moved.
the sleep and stress info is decent but that's about it.
it would be helpful if it had a sleep function that knew when to wake you based on REM cycle. I've heard there is such a thing. and it would be helpful to have a different color light to alert you when to charge/charge is low.
Author: LB

Title: Best health tracker ever
Content: It provides the needed health tracking information without waking me up. All other trackers light up and in turn wake me up.
Author: Donna Clubbe

Title: I love the ring but it is a bit to…
Content: I love the ring but it is a bit to bulky for the female hand. Need to make a round style. Everything else about the ring is great. I hope to see more options for the ring in the future.
Author: Wendy Bush

Title: The Ringconn is a great health tracker.
Content:
The Ringconn is a great health alternative to all those other devices that can be quite cumbersome. This device is small and not invasive.
The health tracking options are good with sleep especially and activity but I am keen to see the new features come out to see it grow more as a activity/ sports tracker to make it more of all all rounder.
Author: Sean Gray

Title: Great Product
Content: Great experience with the product, titanium is good. Accurate readings.
Author: Carl Lemuel Granali

Title: Overall I like my RingConn
Content:
Overall I like my RingConn, it provides a great deal of beneficial information, but understanding and using the information remains a bit of a mystery.

I understand that exercise is in beta. I'm excited to explore that feature when it goes live! Looking forward I would love to see tracking expanded. For example, calorie counts, glucose, BP, all of those pesky little things that are impacted by stress, a sedentary office routine, etc.

Finally thank you for an affordable option!
Author: Maria

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Ordering the ring sizers first is a…
Content: Ordering the ring sizers first is a very good suggestion. I ended up getting a larger size than I thought I needed and it fits perfectly. I love this ring and the app has been so useful for monitoring the things I am most interested in
Author: Lisa

Title: Functional and attractive with no subscriptions fees.
Content: A great experience so far. I have both the Oura and RingConn rings. The Oura app is a tad more polished but I don’t want to pay the subscription price. Oura and RingConn provide very similar data with the same accuracy.
Author: Dogfather

Title: Great Tracking & Metrics
Content: Great health tracker with a wonderful form factor. The ring looks great & the metrics are spot on!
Author: Bob

Title: The ring feels good
Content:
The ring feels good and I don't even notice it.
The values are displayed without gaps and my comparison while wearing a smartwatch showed that the values collected were almost the same for both. That's why I prefer wearing the ring to a bulky watch.
Author: R Kohls

Title: So Far So Good
Content: My Ring experience has been good so far. I have had my Ring about 5 or 6 months. Fit and delivery were fast and easy. The quality of the ring itself is good and the brushed aluminum finish is nice, subtle and does not scratch very easily. The ring charges quickly and is easy to do using their included pod style charger. I wish syncing was a bit faster or even bet automatic each day. The FREE app is a nice touch for following your information. It is well laid out and easy to read and understand after just a few uses. There have been a continuous stream of updates to the app and ring so that has been a nice upside. Kudos to the dev team! Overall I am very happy with my purchase. My one piece of advice (no matter what ring you purchase is to decide what you are really looking to get out of the information they provide and will you use it to make informed decisions). I'd give it 4.5 stars if I could as it's not perfect but pretty great overall.
Author: Matt

Title: I love my RingConn ring!
Content:
I love my ring! (silver color)
Keeps me aware of my stress level, if I'm getting enough sleep or need to focus more on it, steps, consistency, etc. Does exactly what I wanted it to do. I really like wearing all of my rings, (I have many in stainless steel and sterling silver and it blends well with all of them. I constantly get compliments on my rings and they have no idea that one of them is a health tracker until I mention it...IF I do! Lol) so this is a perfect health tracker for me, vs. wrist versions, that I've also had easily break or wear out on me, so I LOVE this option and even more so since they aren't just trying to take advantage with yet another monthly subscription!!! (Which is what made my decision easier!) I've had my ring for about 5 months now and am VERY happy with it! THANK YOU, RingConn!!!
Author: Laurie Delaplane

Title: I love this ring a lot
Content: I love this ring a lot. I use the ring now about half a year. I like the features this ring has without paying extra money to use them. The ring works very well and I have to load the ring only once a week. Also I am happy about the update in German.
Author: Manuela

Title: All in all, a good ring that I would recommend.eally like is that the battery…
Content:
What I really like is that the battery doesn't need to be charged for almost a week. The sleep diagram with the different phases is also nice. What I think would be cool is if you could give the ring to another person and run it under a different profile so that the actual data is not falsified by itself.
And above all, the data is saved on the device in the app without an internet connection.
Author: Tom

Title: love the versatility of the app
Content: love the versatility of the app and what it shows for health and what you need to improve. Like the last update, clearer to read everything in one look.
Author: Jenilyn

Title: A great substitute for a SmartWatch
Content: I love the stats my RingConn ring gives me. So much more insightful than my SmartWatch. I get updates on my sleep and stress and an insight that is deeper and more meaningful than other charts I've received from other smart devices. Thank you for providing all this without a subscription, making the service more worthwhile.
Author: Claribel Rodriguez

Title: Great product
Content: Great product. Tons of health information and no subscription required!!
Author: Mike G.

Title: Never received my refund for an order I…
Content: Never received my refund for an order I cancelled the next day. Emailed RingConn and they told me I needed to contact my bank. Do not trust
Author: customer

Title: Great choice
Content: I like it because it holds me accountable to keeping moving and reminds me of when I’m sitting around too much and I need to get up and move around The only thing that that I would like to see that it doesn’t have right now is an exercise mode for outdoor walking or outdoor bicycle
Author: MDD

Title: Very happy with my ring
Content: The order process was easy and the sizing kit was helpful to make sure I got the right size. The ring is comfortable to wear and the data provides useful insight into my sleep and activity patterns. The app is easy to use and the charging case is convenient. I highly recommend this product.
Author: Andrew T

Title: A solid wellness tracker with room for improvement
Content: I'm enjoying the ring but would love to see more advanced workout tracking. Right now I'm still tied to using my Apple Watch when I work out to ensure that it's being tracked.
Author: Lauren

Title: The amount of time it takes to get the…
Content: The amount of time it takes to get the fitment to getting the ring is longer then what is shown on the website.
Author: Michael Napier

Title: My doctor is wanting trends…
Content: My doctor is wanting me to watch trends and get an overall picture of my health. This ring helps me do that. My sleeping has improved and my stress has seriously been lowered now that I can watch what I am doing and adjust accordingly. I am excited about the new features in exercise tracking.
Author: Ted

Title: Excellent Product
Content: I have had my silver ring for 5 months after having had a Fitbit... I love it. It counts the steps as accurately as the Fitbit did. I like the other features too...heart rate, stress levels. I don't wear it in bed (my preference). I am enjoying the badges and the frequency of the updates. The Facebook page is very useful too. The charge lasts for at least 7 days and the charging box is excellent. The silver coating has hardly shown any signs of wear. All in all I'm extremely happy with my ring.
Author: Jean Mills

Title: I've loved having my RingConn
Content: I've loved having my RingConn! The only part that was tedious was the delivery process. It took longer than expected. Make sure you order the ring size kit. I'm glad I did otherwise I would have ordered a ring that was way too small. After receiving the ring, I have 0 complaints. I wanted it to measure my sleep and it's been so very useful.
Author: Anna

Title: The ring is excellent
Content: The ring is excellent. The shipping however is not so great. Ordered ring protectors they came in the wrong color and there was no one to contact. So I'm just out that money. Get all that fixed and it's be willing to order mine.
Author: Frances ERVIN

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Oura was more reliable
Content: Sometimes I have a good night sleep and my score is low and other times I have a poor night sleep and my score is high. You ask for the date of the experience but it’s not only one night but many nights. I just put a date randomly to answer your question about date of experience
Author: Francine

Title: Simply 5 star keeping track of my sleep…
Content: Simply 5 star keeping track of my sleep, activity and health factors As well as five star customer service we needed.
Author: Reva Egdal

Title: I like the ring overall
Content:
I like the ring overall. It seems to be well built and durable. I haven’t dropped it, but I have exercised at the gym and worked in the garden with it, and it sustained little damage. The only issue I have is that it doesn’t tell me when it needs to charge. I’ve gone through the steps on your support page to remedy the problem, but I haven’t had any success.

At this juncture, the only recommendation I can offer is to fix what I mentioned above and allow the customer the choice to set whether or not they want to receive a daily summary of how they slept the night before. The notification can say something like, “here is your sleep summary from last night.” I often forget to check my dashboard in the morning because I’m busy getting ready for my day. Consequently, I don’t check it until later or forget altogether. Other than that, I think you have a great product, and it is performing as expected. I hope this helps.
Author: Timothy Smith

Title: I like this more then I thought I…
Content: I like this more then I thought I would. I Love the app with so much data and its all easy to understand. They even provide some detailed summary to help you use it. The ring is nice and comfortable. The battery life is amazing. I have recommended to several friends. The only reason I gave it four instead of five stars is my size fit. I know my ring size but that doesn't account for the small sensors the ring has so it is Very snug getting it off to charge it.
Author: Richard Miller

Title: Important and useful health tracking information
Content:
The RingConn ring provides important health tracking information on a continuous basis. The app does a good job of presenting this information in a usable and useful way and allows good user interactions.
But some information (e.g., peak heartrate readings) is not as continuous and as accurate as it could be, and some sleep information (e.g., Sleep2) is wrong, requires an app update, and no update has been made.
Author: Gary Hazen

Title: Ring is so much more…
Content: Ring is so much more comfortable to use than my watch with accurate information. I am a fan
Author: Michael

Title: It's a smooth transaction end-to-end
Content: It's a smooth transaction end-to-end. The order experience was simple and painless. Once I received the sizing kit, I checked my size and updated the order. And within a couple of weeks received the product and it is a perfect fit. Been using the ring for the past 2 and half months and received so many complements from others and very much need insights from the Ring itself.
Author: SB

Title: The ring provides great information.
Content:
I have had the ring for a few months now. The ring provides great information; the information encourages improvement. Reviewing my results has become a daily activity that I look forward to reviewing and reflecting the results.
I am looking forward to having blood pressure information from the ring and app.
The ring scored a 4 as it has yet to reach 7 days before charge is required.
Author: Steve

Title: love my ring
Content: love my ring. easy to wear. no monthly cogs. so much easier than Fitbit
Author: Sheila Backes

Title: First of all: A great product
Content:
First of all great product! Initially I had some issues with having to reset a few times, (it's an easy process and doesn't disrupt anything), but everything works better with every update of the app. And the ring itself is so light and comfy to wear.
Secondly, super fast delivery, first of sizing kit, and then just adding the ring to basket and delivery of the ring itself. Seamless and flawless! Love this product!
Author: Lena

Title: I like the quality and style.
Content: Date of experience: March 22, 2024
Author: Tigran Voskanyan

Title: I’m impressed with the durability
Content: I’m impressed with the durability, and the battery life. Definitely a good buy.
Author: John Bartholomew Jr

Title: Great product that is cheaper than…
Content: Great product that is cheaper than competition
Author: ar7mork

Title: Looking forward to the future upgrades
Content: Looking forward to seeing the functions upgrades (better sleep tracking, body temp measurement on demand etc).
Author: DP

Title: The is awesome
Content:
The is awesome. The data is very positive though and I am not sure if I am that healthy or sleep that well but it seems to be correct. The app is done very well also. Shipment and the website may be improved. For example the website: the order details looked very odd and also behaved like this. I had to enter my ring size after using the size kit multiple times.
In the end everything worked fine. I am using the ring every day.
Author: David

Title: Great product
Content: Excellent customer service. Chased up my ring sizing kit when that didn’t arrive quickly. Once I worked out my size the ring arrived very quickly. As far as the ring goes, I’m extremely happy with it and all it does. Even happier not having to pay a monthly subscription.
Author: Karl R

Title: Great design and easy to use the app
Content: Date of experience: April 17, 2024
Author: Paul --

Title: Great quality with tons of interesting health info
Content: Firstly I love the fact that you get a box of rings to try out which size works best for you! The ring took around 2 weeks to arrive. Very quick to charge and a long battery life. Easy app set up. Good clear data on the app and lots of interesting info from the ring.
Author: Ronaele Taylor

Title: Neurodivergent helpful - detailed sleep and stress
Content:
The ring is crafted well and never feels too warm or tight/loose with the two bumps, which was something I was worried about before owning it.

What sold me on this ring and why I'm still very happy with it is that I'm a neurodivergent person that struggles with things like severe ADHD and a very common comorbidity of that, Insomnia.

Having a ring that accurately tracks whenever you sleep no matter the time and understands and displays sleep stages has been so useful for me to track and understand so much more about my sleep needs and patterns. Including learning I have my most efficient and restful sleeps with the best ratio of Deep and REM sleep stages when I sleep between 5-6 hours vs more/less hours.

It also tracks stress levels very well that compares and outdoes what my apple watches did for me in the past. But on a ring on my finger instead of a watch that has a poor battery.

It is also been surprisingly durable and waterproof to where I can just forget it is on. I do tend to take it off to charge while I shower, but it's not due to not being able to shower with it on, I just found that to be the most convenient and efficient way to keep my ring charged without interrupting my schedule.

I had issues with my ring not keeping charge more than 3 days after 2 months of use and they without hesitation mailed me a replacement to use within the same week. This second one has kept its charge same as when I first got it and lasts 7 days but I charge mine more often as mentioned so i rarely have to push it unless I just forget to take it off when I shower.

Speaking of the case, it is just great. I rarely ever have to plug in the case to charge. Maybe once a month, or longer?

Very very happy with it. Only improvements I want to see more of is just more features on the app but those are already promised and even within the time of purchasing it until now there have already been new features and bug fixes added routinely which is always a good sign of a healthy app development cycle and a team that is organized and follows agile methodology. (I'm a software engineer, so it's easier to spot 😅).

For the price this is such a good investment for me and I'm happy to have jumped onto the ringconn bandwagon over the others I had researched in comparison.

Excited to see what comes next ✌️
Author: ganonbit

Title: Helps you improving your health!
Content: The hardware is very good quality and works all day round and during the night. The information that the App provides is helping me to improve especially my sleep and stress level.
Author: Thömmy, Basel

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Good value for money
Content: Good value for money, no extra costs and good amount of health data for you to track your progress.
Author: Sarah Diggle

Title: Easy to install and use
Content: Easy to install and use. App in a good design and usability. Delivery time was very long.
Author: Sanju Marc Bloechlinger

Title: The customer service was great
Content: The customer service was great. After my package got lost Ringconn Team send out a new parcel with my ring. I am very happy with the ring.
Author: Niklas

Title: 110% satisfied
Content:
- Track & trace of my order
- delivery in time
- appealing packaging
- function of the ring
- usability of the app
- ongoing development of the app
Author: Sven M.

Title: I love my ring and the App and the…
Content: I love my ring and the App and the service (they actually reply to stuff). It has really helped me to get a profound knowledge on my body and how I spend my days and helped me do important changes (mostly to my sleep routine.) I was desperately waiting for the period tracker and I know it’s still in a test phase but the set up was kinda confusing and now some date is locked wrong and there no option for me to fix the data. That’s sucks bc now the warning doesn’t work correctly. But I hope they update the period tracker function soon again.
Author: Paula

Title: No reduction in the number of…
Content: No reduction in the number of cockroaches. Still waiting to see results. The technician doesn't seem to want to do the job. barely knocks on the door. His first attempt he left without knocking. I had to call in and complain. He finally came back at the end of the day. Didn't do much. Not sure why I gave it two stars.
Author: Roger Earl

Title: The better Oura ring
Content: Great customer service with feedback most of the time within one day.Cntinues evolution of the functionality of the ring, as well as the app. In my view the best design on the market with so far no scratch at all on the ring. Very detailed analysis truly helpful and better than what I’ve seen from other brands on the market.
Author: Jan Steuber

Title: I recommend it
Content:
Hi,
Receipt of the sizing kit took 1 month to arrive.
On the other hand, the final ring arrived in 1 week.

I am totally satisfied with the ring.
The mobile application is very understandable.
The measurements are very precise and the autonomy, 8 days, is great.
I recommend it!
Author: Cedric Kuffner

Title: Love it
Content:
Love it
Very accurate
Author: Sanat Kumara

Title: Couldn’t be simpler or more convenient!
Content: What a tremendous piece of kit! The whole experience is made so simple by RingConn; from the initial purchase (making sure that you get the right size with their free ring sizing kit), through the setup process, and then the wearing of the ring for data collection and review via the simple, and easy to understand app. The product is stylish, and you don’t feel like you’re wearing a wearable.
Author: Julia Cowen

Title: Works perfectly.
Content: Date of experience: April 17, 2024
Author: Peter Bronsert

Title: Marketing doesn't match product
Content: When you see advertising that shows someone swimming you don't expect to have to take the ring off in case it gets wet as per you use and care manual. When wearing the ring at night, just because your lying still doesn't mean your sleeping. This ring is inaccurate recording sleep cycles, one of the main reasons I bought the ring. I would like to return the ring and purchase a different brand or product.
Author: Phil

Title: This Protection is a must for this type of ring!
Content: Arrived early, was exactly want I expected. This protection is a must for this ring because while working outside it helped a lot. So that the ring didn't get scratched up in which the protection part did. Which saved the ring itself.
Author: LS

Title: I really love this ring
Content: I really love this ring. It gives me all the data I need. It shows me where I need to make changes in sleep, activity and managing my stress. That is why I chose above other similar products.
Author: Kristin Siemonsma

Title: Perfekt
Content:
Perfekt
It’s that what I want
Author: rober

Title: Pretty good
Content: I think the ring's pretty good. It is a little thick. I don't know about other rings but sometimes I do take it off.
Author: Ryan

Title: Great wearable with a nice battery life.
Content: Great wearable with a nice battery life.
Author: Ronald Martin

Title: I love the ring
Content:
I love the ring, because i can wear it by volleyball too.
RingConn strives to constantly improve, i think.

The layout of the app is very easy to understand, navigate, and use. The new features I've seen I like, the badges are a nice little surprise 😌

Title: Great product
Content: Great product. I wear it everyday

Content: Overall I am very happy with the ring and the service and the company. You can easily troubleshoot any trouble you have with someone and they are very responsive. The ring is comfortable and I feel the results are pretty accurate. It even picks up my naps.

Content: Date of experience: February 24, 2024

Title: Very helpful & useful
Content: Very helpful, Easy to Use, Great for Health Monitoring

Title: I love it for everyday things
Content: I love it for everyday things, but when I'm exercising and my fingers swell it stops being able to gather information. So I went on a hike and it didn't count steps or find heart rate or anything else. However, for normal day to day and for sleep, it's excellent.

Title: Loving my ring
Content:
Loving my ring. It gives me great insight and information about my health, especially my sleep patterns. The only small negative which I believe is being worked on is tracking exercise. Currently it tracks an outdoor run.

I highly recommend this product.
Author: Janice Izzard-Reid

Title: After a week the ring stop working
Content: Date of experience: March 13, 2024
Author: Delana Embry

Title: I really enjoy RingConn the battery…
Content: I really enjoy RingConn the battery life makes it easier for me as I don't have to keep recharging it every day before bed to make sure I get my sleep statistics correct. Good app too, definitely get it if you like to track your health stats.
Author: customer

Title: Great ring I highly recommend it for…
Content: Great ring I highly recommend it for anyone that’s looking for a smart ring. Customer service is amazing. You can’t go wrong with RingConn.
Author: charlie Bond

Title: Worth every penny.
Content: So far this ring has done great. The shape of the ring is a very smart design choice. Very comfortable on the hand. The app is also user friendly and it’s great how there are no “subscription only” options. Literally every thing in the app comes with the purchase of the ring. I most definitely recommend this ring over any other.
Author: Eugene Zabala

Title: It was easy to use and set up
Content: It was easy to use and set up, had absolutely no issues. The best feature for me is the continuous oxygen monitoring. Good value for the the price.
Author: Willie Webb

Title: Incredible ring
Content: Incredible ring, delivers a message from your body, makes you more aware about yourself
Author: Ernest Debardeleben

Title: Love it
Content: Love it! Great information
Author: Casey Soileau

Title: A great product 👌 👏 👍
Content: A great product 👌 👏 👍

Title: Skip the watch, GET THE RING!
Content: I've tried multiple smart watches for years and they all over promised and under delivered. My RingConn ring is more convenient, more reliable, and more accurate across a wider range of functions than I could ever hope to get from a smart watch. Glad I got in early and I can't wait for what RingConn does next!!
Author: Robert Swaskoski

Title: I wanted to return the ring because it…
Content: I wanted to return the ring because it wasn't compatible with a chronic health condition I have but I never received a return address. Decided to try it again; charged the ring and nothing. One of the biggest wastes of money I've spent and truly bad customer service.
Author: Ellen Zban

Title: Pretty good ring, but swelling of finger a major issue
Content:
My RingConn ring has been an interesting experience. I purchased this as part of a Black Friday sale. I needed a ring sizing kit, and this was sent to me, although I felt it was dispatched and delivered a bit slowly. I decided on a ring size after wearing the "sizing" ring a couple of days. I wanted the ring to be worn on my non-dominant hand. The ring arrived in a reasonable time after I selected the ring size online. It charged up properly. The set up was okay, but I did feel that RingConn's app was asking for too much personal information such as my home address. It should be asking only for the rock bottom minimum information from the user. My home address is not needed for a health tracking application.

After a time, it became clear to me that the RingConn app installed on my iPhone was rather basic, but it seemed to be sending my health data to a server somewhere on the internet. For example, to get a report of my health data (such as the stress score, sleep trends, step counts) over time, the information appears to be made available from a server. I have no idea if this information is encrypted on the remote server(s) or not and what other parties have access to my personal data...such as my daily sleep patterns.

Even so, for a almost 4 months, it was fun to wear my ring daily, 24 hours a day, except in the shower or when doing some messy chores with my hands like washing dishes. It was fun seeing the trends develop over time. But then, quite recently, a problem developed. The finger that I used for my ring seemed to start swelling. I could not get the ring off easily. Perhaps this is tied to increasing physical activity on my part, or warmer temperatures as the short winter ended and Spring arrived. I am not sure. My skin came off a bit the last time I wrenched the ring off my finger...not a lot of skin...and there was really almost no pain...but there was some minor bleeding that stopped quickly. I decided I had better stop wearing the ring. Recently, my finger has healed enough to put the ring back on, but the fit is so tight that I'm afraid I'll injure the finger again when I need the ring to come off.

So I'm not sure what to do. I wish I could have ordered a quarter-size larger (for example, ring size 9.25 instead of 9) or a half-size larger (as in 9.50.) I have given the ring to my wife, since she is interested in RingConn.

I think that eventually, health tracking rings need to be constructed from flexible materials that can accept some amount of physical expansion or contraction. I think ring materials that are flexible in this way are very necessary for me. I don't understand why my finger swelled, and perhaps it will contract this coming winter with cooler temperatures. But the ring is useless to me if it cannot fit on my finger "just right".

Also, it is important for customers to feel that their personal information is safe; that it will not be sold to third parties for any reason; that it is secured such that even RingConn employees cannot decrypt someone's personal information; that it cannot be decrypted by third parties; and that even if the data is stolen by thieves, it cannot be decrypted by them, either (even if the thieves wait a few years and try to decrypt at that future date.)

Overall, I like the idea of a health tracking ring, but the materials need to be improved and the security of my personal data really needs to be assured.
Author: Bob Cochran

Title: Inaccurate and won't let me return
Content: This rings oxygen saturation has been inaccurate not matter what I've tried since I bought it. I've reached out asking for a refund and was told to try it for longer even after a hospital confirmed the reading was much lower than it actually was. They won't let me return so very bad experience.
Author: Bridgette King

Title: Ring lost accuracy in 4 months time
Content: I purchased my ring in October 2023. At first my ring was accurately reporting my sleep time. However, for the past two months it often reports me in a deep sleep hours before I go to bed. I have medical conditions requiring my sleep data and I can’t trust the ring’s data any longer. I wish I could return it and get a better brand ring.
Author: Laura Cox

Title: Very happy with the stats and battery…
Content:
Very happy with the stats and battery life.
Customer service is great.
Author: Isn Rasor

Title: Love my ring
Content: Love my ring! Especially the sleep cycle recird, exercise/steps, heart rate.
Author: John

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Not Impressed
Content:
Had I done a more thorough due diligence on this product I would not have purchased it. You cannot add steps, nor does it track distance in any way.

Your sleep tracking is very inaccurate and tracks times I was awake as sleep time. The number of steps is very questionable when compared to other devices.

I will search for a better product and I will provide my feedback comparisons on YouTube and Facebook.

Title: I returned my item due to a wrong size
Content: I returned my item due to a wrong size, but never received my refund. I would not have even given you a one star. Your business is a sham.
Author: Annette Given

Title: I’ve had the Ring for 4 months now and…
Content: I’ve had the Ring for 4 months now and I couldn’t be happier! Gives me everything I need. Can’t wait for cycling function. 👍
Author: Glenn

Title: I was an anxious sleeper when my…
Content: I was an anxious sleeper when my Samsung watch was the only report i got. Now that i have had my RingConn for months i am no longer anxious about the quality and quantity of my sleep. Thank you RingConn.
Author: Nancy Everman

Title: Ring was awesome for about 3 months
Content:
Ring was awesome for about 3 months, now it won't hold a charge.

Disappointed
Author: Disappointed

Title: Easy to use
Content: Easy to use. Long time between charges. Love the app. The only problem I had was when I was sitting and reading it said I was napping. Contacted you guys and it was fixed. I don't like watches but I love wearing my ring!
Author: Cassandra Boatman

Title: I enjoy the stress portion of the app.
Content:
I enjoy the stress portion of the app.
I do wish activity could be more Inclusive to track specific activity and distance..
The sleep , I feel is a little to general, I never did get a lot of REM sleep, so you would think k that after months of wear the ring would pick up on that , and stop telling me about it..
Author: Stephanie Luckenbill

Title: So far the ring has preformed as…
Content:
So far the ring has preformed as expected
I really don't have anything bad to say
Author: customer

Title: Disappointed.
Content: I had high expectations for this ring. After, weeks of research, I thought this ring better than its competitor. The ring is stylish and comfortable. Yet, its performance has been less than expected. The ring has difficulty syncing regularly, and has missing data. My profile is incomplete and I’ve had to reset the ring. All in all, I have any days without data.
Author: Yaser

Title: Great Ring
Content: Ringconn is an excellent ring with great customer service. Ringconn has a fantastic community with members who are more than willing to help members with questions or concerns. The app is very easy to use as well. Why pay a monthly subscription fee when you can get the same kind of ring for less money and no monthly fee. I highly recommend the Ringconn ring.
Author: Joseph Miraglia

Title: Phat
Content: Just like that
Author: STEVE TRAN

Title: I really like this product- works well…
Content: I really like this product- works well and tracks accurately for measuring trends!
Author: Jill Wust

Title: I love my RingConn
Content: I love my RingConn it has become a solid part of my life. I actually get a little bummed out when I have to put it in the charger once a week. When I wake in the morning syncing my ring and checking my nights sleep is 1st priority. I have found myself surprised by what causes me stress thanks to my ring.
Author: John Kay

Title: Better than a watch!
Content: The information this ring gave me about my health and sleep was great! I lost the ring 3 months after getting it and cannot afford another one so I have no tracker. But as soon as I can afford one I will be buying this product!
Author: Jerry

Title: My wife and I compare our sleep scores…
Content: My wife and I compare our sleep scores daily fun and interesting information. I feel that because of the ring I’ve become more in t in tune with my health which is a good thing for a person who’s had heart bypass surgery.
Author: Jim Roberts

Title: Replacement ring.
Content: I bought the ring a few months ago but started having issues with it charging. Wouldn't charge in the charger. So was sent a new ring....promptly! Excellent customer service!!!!
Author: Kerry Rigaux

Title: I love it
Content:
I received my ring just 1 year ago. Since then RingConn has constantly improved their app and I love the feedback. I took a professional sleep test while I was wearing my Apple Watch Ultra and the RingConn. When I showed the sleep tech the Apple and RingConn results, he said the RingConn was more accurate. He responded "How did they do that with only the ring and we need all these sensors?"

When I got the ring the battery lasted for 4 days. Now after constant use of only 1 year the battery will only last a maximum of 2 days. RingConn service contacted me and offered to replace my ring. The replacement was expedited and I am very happy with their service.
Author: Jim Berube

Title: The heart rate is so accuracy and my…
Content:
The heart rate is so accuracy and my sleeping tracking is amazing
Only thing I wish have tracking sports
Author: Aldo oreggia

Title: Software needs work
Content: Software needs work. Ring does provide valuable information however the app is quite weak
Author: Michael J Rousseau

Title: You are constaContinuous improvementntly working to improve…
Content:
You are constantly working to improve the app - and you are succeeding. I was particularly pleased that it is now also available in German.

One wish would be to make the store a little more customer-friendly. The direct import from China was very expensive and complicated. In the end, 19% import sales tax was added on top and there were also very high handling fees with DHL. That was not so nice. Perhaps there will be simpler or more transparent solutions at some point. But you only have this worry once. The product is great and I am very satisfied.

:)
Author: Jens E.

Title: I'm super impressed with this ring
Content:
I'm super impressed with this ring, battery life lives up to promises, tracks sleep, hr well but slightly under when I'm doing a workout compared to my Apple Watch and withings. love can swim etc as well.

This is a great option for someone who like traditional watches and wants health tracking.

Hoping for promised activity tracking soon.
Author: steve

Title: Give this brand a chance! It's awesome!
Content: The shipping process was great with the ring sizing package and then sending the actual item. The ring is everything I was expecting, works great, great battery life. Really don't have anything negative to say about this product
Author: Mr F Escobar

Title: My ring constantly gets disconnected
Content: My ring constantly gets disconnected. It’s always saying searching.
Author: Mitchell Phillips

Title: RingCon as Promised
Content:
Ring does as promised, not without a lil confusion, perhaps, updates are cause (mostly relative to "sleep").
I have silver (plat version), after nearly 6mos, NO gouges or scratches.
Author: Bruce Boycks

Title: I am entirely pleased with my ring
Content:
I am entirely pleased with my ring. It is exactly as described right down to the length of time the battery lasts.
My ring is several months old and looks just like it did when it arrived. I have the Titanium colour and really like how it just looks like a nice simple band.
I have been diagnosed with very severe sleep apnea and this ring is helping me understand my sleep pattterns and the factors that attribute to a good night or a bad nights sleep.
One thing I found quite fascinating was that while I am getting tattoos that my entire system goes right into relax and stays there during my session.
I highly recommend this product for anyone wanting to understand their bodies better.
Author: Dori D

Title: Helpful health information and great battery life
Content: Good information, great battery life.
Author: Tamila Johnson White

Title: Doesn’t work
Content: The ring kept disconnecting and wouldn’t record information especially while wearing it at night. It was very frustrating.
Author: Ron Russell

Title: Great device for monitoring your health…
Content: Great device for monitoring your health and activities. Customer service has been great with quick response.
Author: Dennis Pond

Title: Decent product and the entire…
Content:
I like the product and the entire purchase was simple and fairly quick. I've had the ring for several months now. As for the actual ring, it works well and holds a charge for about 5 - 7 days depending on usage.

My only criticism is the app. It would be more useful and helpful if the app and associated data was capable of being synchronized with more than just Google Fit and more than just sending data. There is no way for it to receive data really either. It does not sync with any known fitness scales so you cannot add your weight or fitness data.
Author: G. Jeffers

Title: A very good smartring that keeps evolving
Content:
I have had my ring for about 1/2 year now and have been quite satisfied. The Ringconn app on my phone (android) provides helpful information (heart rate, spo2, steps, and sleep) and trending statistics. Ringconn continues to enhance the product through reasonably frequent updates. The ring charge lasts a week and the charging case will give you a bunch more charges without having to plug it in.

Things that need to continue to evolve:
1. Ability to automatically detect activities (walking, swimming, elliptical, etc.) similar to my Galaxy Watch
2. The charging case needs to have an indicator for when it is fully charged
Author: Len Friedman

Title: This are most accurate way to keep…
Content: This are most accurate way to keep track of all the vital things you need to keep in mind.
Author: Matthew Prater

Title: I would not buy this again
Content:
Disappointed in the accuracy of the oxygen saturation. The Rings accuracy overall was much lower than I was expecting. I recommend looking at other brands

According to your guys's response your accuracy is within 1.5% based on the two pulse oximeters that I use your accuracy is off by about 15 to 20%. This includes comparing my oxygen level with the ring and at my doctor's office
I did reach out to you guys on multiple occasions and this was the same response you gave me. Just because you declare it doesn't mean it's true
Author: F Everitt

Title: The ring tracks my sleep
Content: The ring tracks my sleep, steps and stress. Not sure how it works but the information and trends are helpful. I have learned when I sleep best and how to adjust.
Author: James McCann

Title: I really like this product
Content: I really like this product. The details provided within the app are easy to navigate and understand. Additionally the battery life is perfect as I only have to charge once a week in less the 2 hours.
Author: Giovanni Agramonte

Title: Well I loved my Ring
Content: Well I loved my Ring! So much I've lost -45lbs and the ring wouldn't stay on my finger sadly 😞. I had to sell it. Hopefully I'll get a new one after I'm in maintenance.
Author: KH

Title: I love the ring the activity matches…
Content: I love the ring the activity matches the Apple Watch it’s perfect
Author: Carole Giovanniello

Title: Detailed App and quality product
Content:
Having worn the ring now since Oct 2023 I can say that I'm more than happy with the ring and App.

There is also a really good Facebook community for any questions, exchanges and up to date information.
Author: Jamie

Title: I love the function of the ring
Content: I love the function of the ring. I like the color been very happy with the performance. It holds a battery a long time and gives me a lot of information.
Author: Debra S

Title: I love the sleep tracking
Content: I love the sleep tracking, o2, etc. My only complaint is that the finish does not last. I'm down to bare metal,in some places.
Author: SR

Title: Works fantastic
Content: Works fantastic. Better than expected.
Author: Tomas

Title: If I’m outside my homes WiFi I have no…
Content: If I’m outside my homes WiFi I have no control of the unit. I don’t get notifications
Author: JAMES CARROLL

Title: It does what it’s supposed to do
Content: It does what it’s supposed to do. I can sleep with it on and do not have an issue doing so as I do with the smart watch being somewhat uncomfortable. I have noticed that the data isn’t accurate. There were some times when I didn’t sleep at all and the ring tells me that I slept 9.5 hours. There were times when I didn’t have the ring on and it told me I was sleep the whole time it was off. Seeing this has caused me to question all the results. I still were it with the hope of getting improvement through updates. I still haven’t checked the step count accuracy as I use my smart watch for that. Additionally, I wish there were a way to shine it some.
Author: RandyH

Title: Doesn't need subscription
Content: Doesn't need subscription, works as well as other options if not better.
Author: Mikhail Vnukov

Title: I have had my ring for 6 months
Content: I have had my ring for 6 months, and insanely impressed so far. Love how they keep updating the app and updating the ring with new features. The battery life is exactly what is advertised, but what surprised me is how quickly it charges. I think this ring is impressive in comparison to fitness trackers (I’ve tried using a handful of devices.) I only have 1 complaint/regret, I purchased the black ring, very quickly all the edges and corners the black color wore off and the surface if scratched leaves a nice silver mark. I wish I would have just ordered the plain metal, I think it would have stood up longer. Either way, have to rate this like a 4.5, only reason not a 5 is because it doesn’t stay pretty very long.
Author: Kyle BG

Title: Works as advertised
Content: Works as advertised
Author: James Duckels

Title: Happy with the ring, needs VO2max measure.
Content: Very happy about the comfort and accuracy. It would be great to add VO2max measure and seeing how I compare to others for stress, VO2max, deep sleep and etc. to gain more insights. I lost the ring in my place and could not find it a few days. A Bluetooth find me feature could be nice.
Author: Dr. Orkun

Title: It is so easy to look at the ring on my phone.
Content: It is so easy to look at the ring
Author: Cheryl Windle

Title: RingConn helped diagnose Sleep Apnea
Content: It took me a few months to pay much attention but I noticed early this year that my Sleeping O2 rate was pretty low for an athlete. I was able to get a sleep study based on that and now am using a CPAP machine to help with sleep apnea.
Author: Maurine Lee

Title: Great product, but definitely room for improvement
Content: Love the price and the fact there is no monthly subscription. Generally the ring has held up very well but I do have some areas where the gold has been rubbed off, and I've only had the ring since Dec 2023. What I don't like is the Google Fit integration has deprecated to just sleep tracking. I wish there was true integration and tracking of activities and active time based on heart rate to improve your overall wellness score and listing such activity in the feed. Less focus on badges and more focus on the core functions.
Author: Jeff

Title: Excellence in Wearable Technology
Content: The Ringconn truly stands out as a masterpiece in wearable technology. Crafted with precision and durability, it exceeds expectations in both design and performance. Its companion phone application is exceptionally well-made, providing seamless integration and regular updates without the need for a subscription. Offering outstanding value for money, this smart ring is a testament to quality and innovation in the wearable tech industry. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a reliable and feature-rich smart accessory.
Author: Mirco Mariani

Title: overall the ring is good but
Content:
overall the ring is good but

the plastic cover has worn out my ring
Author: William Christacakos

Title: Delivered on claims
Content: Delivered on claims. Easy transfer of information to my phone. Easier to use than the watch format.
Author: Tim Mann

Title: Worked Great While it Worked
Content: I loved using my Ring and used it regularly, until it became unpaired and stopped reading. I followed all of the directions to unpair it and repair it, but it never worked again. It was great while it did work though.
Author: Lisa P.

Title: Overall a good purchase
Content: I like my ring overall. I have been wearing it for 3 months. It offers a lot of information and the app works well. I like that I can compare days and see weekly overview. I wish the ring came in half sizes. I went up a size because I know my fingers will be larger in summer heat, but I have found there are days I can't wear my ring when it's cool for fear it will fall off. I fear that also make the readings less accurate. I do agree with other reviewers that the steps are inaccurate. My ring shows a much lower count that my Apple watch. Overall I feel it has been a good purchase. My main issue is getting a ring size that works well.
Author: Shellzee

Title: I have an iWatch Apple
Content: I have an iWatch Apple. The ring is convenient. I don't need to activate "activity" for example to ensure what I am doing in terms of activity. The battery is charged for long periods. and it looks nice
Author: Dr Duarte Ferraz

Title: Customer response was quick
Content: Customer response was quick. And the issue was rectified quickly. Wonderful customer service!
Author: Brenda Wipfli

Title: Great health tracking tool!
Content: Purchase was easy & the ring has been a great resource to my health tracking. Ring is light & so far the finish has held up well. The information provided through the app is useful, easy to review & understand.
Author: A Buss

Title: Getting accustomed to the ring not sure…
Content: Getting accustomed to the ring not sure if the sleep information is always correct my wife and I exercise every nite different routine we have a small exercise room and I am active all day … but the activity function does not seem to capture it over all we like the ring
Author: Rick Arlan

Title: Overall performance
Content:
The blood oxygen saturation readings are not very accurate as checked by another device.
The sleep measurement shows me sleeping when I'm not.
I had high hopes for Ringconn but its been a waste of money for me.
Maybe I'll try it again in the future.
Author: David Willoughby

Title: Too many great things to list about…
Content: Too many great things to list about this ring-amazing. They update the software all the time. I had it over a year and built an addition to my house, wearing it, and I can't believe how well it's held up. So happy with the product!
Author: Paul Ashlin
