I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: nice ring and amazing software
Content:
Since the last update, the software is amazing. All the informations are available on the main page.

The ring provide a lot of informations for healthy monitoring.

The ring not heavy and resistant. After 1 year there are only few scratch.

The only reproach I've, is the sleep score, think he is too high every time.
Author: Christophe PANSART

Title: Happy/Sad
Content:
Hello;
Firstly, my experience with the ring was nothing short of great. The metrics it accumulated were very precise. The sad part of this journey is that I lost the ring on a jobsite. It fit wonderfully, though I believe I lost it in a clients heated floor. It has been a month and a bit since it's been lost, and I am struggling with the decision if I will replace it. I tried a silicone cover, but they degraded quickly. I would also suggest a 'find function' on the ring (similar to the find my phone app). Overall, I have nothing but praise for the functionality of the ring, just disappointed that I lost it.
Author: Derrick Willis

Title: A good functional app and ring
Content: A good functional app and ring, continual development. Would be nice to see linkage to google fit, as watch is charged and doesn't record footsteps or any sort of comparison with RingConn. Would be great to see a coordination.
Author: John Kavulak

Title: Delivery was somewhat slow
Content: Delivery was somewhat slow. For most part measurements (pulse and oxygen levels) are reasonably accurate.
Author: Rebecca Hunzicker

Title: Good
Content: Good, no great product! Wish the app explained how to fix my problems better but still well worth it. Not so good with the public interaction. Dislike the impersonal communication through email. No phone number accessible. And poor interaction with the problems of product return due to a wording issue on the ordering. Still wonder if I was reimbursed properly for a double order.
Author: Nathan

Title: Without spending another penny the app and the product just seems to improve overtime
Content: Work as advertise I wear mines every day all day wet or dry and the app is always improving adding more features without adding any price
Author: Michael Johnson

Title: I never received shipment and tried…
Content: I never received shipment and tried reaching out and was told item was shipped but never received. Now I am in collection for a item I never received and not going to pay for
Author: Tom Raczok

Title: Great experience
Content: Great experience, prompt response and customer service!
Author: Ashlee Parsons

Title: Honest value
Content: Appreciated the sample rings for sizing but the silver ring color swatch was not close to what came. Love the app and the past once model. Shipping was quick. It's been several months and the product is working great.
Author: captremo

Title: One week batter life on ring down to 6…
Content: One week battery life on ring down to 6 days or less in 6 months. I would have hoped for a year or more. Some updates really kill battery life. A better indication of what stress is or how measured would be nice in app.
Author: scott

Title: Awesome health monitor
Content: While the ring took a while (still impressed how fast it ships from China), it is a top notch technology product. The battery is getting at least 6 days at a go, and the data is in line with my Apple Watch. Love the ability to monitor my sleep quality without having to wear a watch. The slim profile makes it no issue to wear all the time. AND no subscriptions :)
Author: C Bailey

Title: Does everything i need.
Content: cost efficient, easy to use, good battery life
Author: Wayne

Title: A few minor changes, and it's a 5-star ring.
Content: The Ringconn's extended battery life is an advantage. However, the feature set could benefit from further enhancement. It lacks distinctive features that differentiate it from competitors. Still, the absence of a subscription requirement was a compelling factor in my initial selection of Ringconn as an introduction to smart rings. But, the limited functionality is prompting me to consider alternative options, as it does not fully replace any of my other devices or even limit how much I use them. I would give it five stars if it tracked workouts and shared data with Nike, Samsung, Apple, or other major fitness trackers and somehow notified me of missed calls and texts from specific contacts. It's close to being a great ring, but the lack of features is a big deal.
Author: B.H.

Title: Great ring
Content: Great ring. Owned 3 oura rings, but this ring is better and no monthly fees!
Author: Andy Wall

Title: Very happy with the ring
Content: Very happy with the ring, battery last enough time.
Author: Janos Magasrevy

Title: So far so good
Content: So far so good. It would be nice if the Ring was not so thick, bothering the finger next to it. The current email sale offer is great, also.
Author: Greg

Title: I'm glad you guys are still working on…
Content: I'm glad you guys are still working on the software and adding new options, adding new experiences. I just wished my ring would sync with my Apple Watch and/or iPhone... it doesn't and it affects some of my apps. Hopefully will get fixed in future software.
Author: Patrick Fletcher

Title: I liked the ring but sadly I lost it
Content: I liked the ring but sadly I lost it. I think I chose the wrong size and it slipped off unnoticed.
Author: Susan Williamson

Title: Excellent Smart Ring
Content: Excellent Smart Ring, Great Software and even better pricing structure. Been wearing the ring for the last 8 months straight and can't see myself giving it up.
Author: Jumanah Al-Ghadban

Title: Not quite as I expected
Content: Your ring doesn’t track my activities. I swim and bicycle. Also I go to bed at 1030 but some nights I get up around 1 or so and the sleep tracker will only show my nights sleep as if I went to bed at 1??? The other info does help and seems accurate so I would still recommend to others to use. Hope this helps
Author: C.David Edenfield

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: No subscription required
Content:
I decided to go with RingConn because it doesn’t require a monthly subscription. Charging kit came relatively quickly. I messed up my order and mistakenly ordered two rings. Customer Service sorted it out and gave me a refund.
Received my ring in January and only take it off for charging. The charge lasts approximately 11 days and takes about an hour. I chose the silver ring based on customer reviews on the black one, and so far there are no signs of scratches.
Author: BARBARA WELLS

Title: Connection issues constantly
Content:
Connection issues constantly. Ring looks nice but overall I'm a little disappointed.

I find the ring has issues staying connected to Bluetooth.
Author: Jay Major

Title: the only thing i would complain about…
Content: the only thing i would complain about it loses bluetooth connection for a few hours at a time even when the phone is in a few feet away i just reconnect other than that i love the ring if something happen to mine i would still get another one
Author: Lucy Rouse

Title: Ring is pretty accurate on readings
Content: Ring is pretty accurate on readings. I have noticed while awake late at night trying to go back to sleep it records it as light sleep. Other than that, the stress, activity, heart rate, SP02 are all accurate. Holds a charge for several days (maybe 5-7). I've had mine for 6 months now and I'm still happy with it. It's a little cheaper than the other brands too with no membership fees.
Author: John Hill

Title: Excellent device for the price
Content: Date of experience: April 12, 2024
Author: Stanley Page

Title: Exzellent everyday functions
Content:
Exzellent everyday functions, still missing some training functions.
Battery life after appr. 6 months of use down from 7 days to 2
Author: Michael Schneider

Title: Every thing works fine
Content: every thing works fine. Now the app is also in German.
Author: Detlef Kraze

Title: Great ring
Content:
Great ring, great communication, great price. I have had it for quite a while now and still experience great battery life.

Really accurate tracking and very comfortable to wear.
Author: Oscar Allington

Title: Health functions awesome
Content: Health functions awesome. Only negative aspect is the missing full sync with apple health. Only heart rate is synced with apple health but heart rate variability, temperature ect. Is not syned
Author: A.J

Title: Best smart ring
Content:
I’m using smart ring for couple of months
My sleep becomes better. I increase my everyday activity
And the ring looks so stylish! Not mention absence of monthly subscription
Thank you RingConn, I’m your biggest fan. ❤️❤️❤️
Author: Natalia Kravchenko

Title: Had my doubts
Content: Had my doubts since RingConn was not as well known as competitors. I wanted to find a ring device that did not force me into a paid subscription to view biometrics. At first RingConn’s proprietary software interface required a paradigm shift for me… I now appreciate the info provided, particularly for sleep stages, sleep heart rate and oxygen levels. Been using it daily for at least four months, and I am very impressed. The battery is magic. I use it several days in a row, and the ring typically fully recharges in less than 10 minutes. Then I am good to go for another 6+ days. Used in shower and tested the limits of waterproofness… no issues to date!
Author: CB

Title: The recent loggging a run
Content: The recent loggging a run. I found this feature redundant cos I need to carry my phone with me
Author: Andrew Low

Title: It's fine but it is not good
Content:
The data given by this ring seems fine although it sometimes seems to be somewhat off. It's an everyday ring with few to no use when doing fitness.
The ring is missing the BLE/ANT protocoll to send data like current heartrate or SpO2 to other devices. This would drain the battery faster but would be better for activities and other sleepapps.
The outer material of the ring wears of to fast, while the silicon sleeve to protect the ring is to adhesive.
There is a helpful popup in the app telling when the ring should be reloaded (after about 5 days rather than 7).
Author: Sascha

Title: Absolutely brilliant
Content:
Absolutely brilliant
Comfortable to wear and accurate with data, battery life excellent would recommend to anyone
Author: Satisfied customer

Title: Good for sleep tracking but not for activity
Content: I wanted the ring to replace my smart watch but I am disappointed that I cannot track activities such as spin cycling and swimming, so I no longer wear it.
Author: Helen Howard

Title: Suporte missing
Content: Unfortunately I contact the suporte because the center of the ring are off, e because this the ring is off center on the finger, making uncomfortable, and no one believe me, because this I recommende the people did I know to not buy because you guys are not ready to provide good support,
Author: Rodrigo Santos

Title: Reliability
Content: My ring offers reliable readings for the things I want from it.
Author: RF

Title: Ring provides all information needed at…
Content:
Ring provides all information needed at such low price. Latest Software has improved sleep quality monitoring, which was important for me. The battery life is outstanding.I also like the absence of monthly payments.
The only are for improvement is the shape, I would prefer less thickness between the fingers.
Author: Andreas K.

Title: Great daily companion with good measurement results
Content: The ring is just great. It wears well and the recordings seem to be correct, with minor deviations. It would be nice if, for example, the color was not so susceptible. I wear the ring every day, but unfortunately the black color has already worn off around the edges. The protective cover simply makes the beautiful ring look like a plastic ring. The battery lasts a very long time and I only have to charge the ring once a week, which is very quick. A great ring despite the minor drawbacks.
Author: W.S.

Title: Working well except hurt rate measures…
Content: Working well except hurt rate measures during workout
Author: Michal Soucek

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: It would be beneficial to remind…
Content:
It would be beneficial to remind customers to get 1size up for finger swelling in the summertime.
I do like the ring,but I can’t wear it. I had contacted the company and asked if I could exchange, but they responded “at this time they are not doing exchanges”.
I’m hoping they will get it touch with me, and if it’s a minimal fee, I would gladly pay for a ring I could wear in summertime that fits.
Author: patricia aiello

Title: I love the data I get from it
Content: I love the data I get from it. It's been very helpful
Author: Joyce Long

Title: Provides more health data than Apple…
Content: Provides more health data than Apple watch and last for a week before needing to recharge. Can wear it all night every night providing sleep data. (Need to put the Apple Watch on a charger every night before bed time, so provides no sleep data.)
Author: George M

Title: Fantastic product
Content: Fantastic product works great with at least 1 week battery life !!!!!
Author: Cj

Title: Great ring but improvement needed
Content: Ring and it’s functionality is great although it’s not very comfortable to wear, especially when working out using your hands.
Author: Mike Bray

Title: Generally satisfied. Need to find time to explore
Content: Sorry I've been too busy and have not explored Ringconn as much as I should. I intend to do so as soon as I can find the time.
Author: David Hew

Title: My Experience with my Ringconn ring
Content: My first ring arrived in May 2023. By August 2023 the battery life was down to 3 days but after submitting the issue through the app, my ring was replaced. The new ring has been going great. All the functions and data generated match up fairly well with my Fitbit Charge which I have had since 2017. My battery life is still around 6 days. What I wish would be improved is activity tracking for calories burned and heart rate. Currently activity tracking is poor with my ring.
Author: Robert Raponi

Title: Ring color doesn’t hold up to wear and…
Content: Ring color doesn’t hold up to wear and tear and over time looks horrible. Color fades on the black ring to the point that it looks very ragged, scratched and beat up despite the fact that I work a desk job all day.
Author: CT

Title: I have enjoyed using my RingConn ring
Content: I have enjoyed using my RingConn ring. I think it works well and the charging case is impressive. It seems pretty accurate too. It is comfortable to wear and seems to be holding up well so far. All in all, I think it is as good as the more expensive smart rings. For the price, I don't think you can beat it.
Author: Mark Hubert

Title: I love my ring
Content: I love my ring. The constant updates are great. Seeing my sleep cycles and stress is monumental. I bought it for my my husband to watch his oxygen levels during sleep since he doesn't wear his c pap but has lost 30 pounds. It gives me peace of mind to see he's at 96 all night.
Author: Christie Collins

Title: No one has responded to either of my…
Content: No one has responded to either of my emails. I cannot use the ring and am beginning to believe it was a waste of money.
Author: Amy Shaulis

Title: It give you information that you would normally not consider!
Content: The ease of use and occasional charge made the Ring(con) almost impercitable to wear!
Author: Paul G Marquez

Title: Love the ring not the customer service…
Content:
Ive enjoyed the ring and the feedback it gives me. The only complaint I’ve ever had is the customer service. I’ve asked questions via email that have just never gotten answered.

ETA: I’ve worked in tech in some capacity almost my entire career. I know how to check my spam box. There’s nothing there either. This is the sort of thing I’m talking about. I get no answer and instead of an offer for help there’s more blaming me. It couldn’t be their fault. It must be mine. I didn’t check my spam folder, that must be where my response went? No. There was never a response.
Author: Nicole Davis

Title: They hear me!
Content: I asked this team for an exercise feature and they actually (began to) deliver! Hearing customer feature requests is a reflection on the company and their desire to support a long and positive relationship with you as a consumer. As such, I've already personally recommended Ringconn and will continue to. Thanks Feature support team!
Author: Greg T

Title: While features and APP are good ring is…
Content: While features and APP are good ring is slightly thicker than either my wife or I like. Also the ring started with a 1 weel battery life, I now have to charge twice a week.
Author: Steve Gold

Title: The ring is much easier to track my…
Content: The ring is much easier to track my health than the Apple Watch.
Author: Mike Webb

Title: The Ring is okay
Content: Ring is okay. Nothing a smart watch can't do. And a smart watch can do lots more.
Author: Tonya Zarecki

Title: Outstanding device!!
Content: Date of experience: April 11, 2024
Author: Tim Robinson

Title: Good smart ring
Content: It took a long time to receive the ring after it was ordered and the shipping time was long. The ring itself is very good. The durability of the battery is good, it lasts 6 days. The functions (sleep, stress) are good, but I find the activity measure is over-stated as compared to my cell phone health app.
Author: David Stern

Title: I really enjoy getting all of my health…
Content: I really enjoy getting all of my health information and my progress all in my step.
Author: S HALL

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Wow, excellent product by u gys! Thanks!
Content: wow, 7-day battery life!! even the yet-to-come samsung galaxy ring is supposedly only has 2 days...hahaha LOL, you guys were the RIGHT company, at the right time!! kudos to MaxTech for profiling your product on one of their vids, a few months ago! i am extremely happy w this product! Thank you, RingConn!!
Author: James Fu

Title: I was comparing with my existing Oura…
Content: I was comparing with my existing Oura ring. I decided to stick with Oura. I found Ringconn to be lacking in features plus the sleep tracking was inconsistent.
Author: Damien

Title: Sleep tracking and stress monitoring…
Content: Sleep tracking and stress monitoring are the best functions. It keeps me honest as a shift worker constantly switching sleep times
Author: Jeff Ashburn

Title: I love this ring
Content: I love this ring! It is comfortable and seems to hold up well over time. It gives me all the information and stats I could possibly need. Customer service is great as I had issues with my first ring and they worked tirelessly to make it right, which they did.
Author: Donald Nunez

Title: I got the Ring for my spouse
Content: I got the Ring for my spouse. And he told me that after the last software update he nologer gets notifications on when the Ring needs to be charged. The pulse ox is inaccurate. Becasue he has a medical one here and the request we got the Ring was so that way it can Bluetooth to his CPAP. Which it does not. And that's on the CPAP side but the inaccuracy is correct because he won't be able to breath and it's reading him at 95% but put theat home one on and he's at 88%. Maybe a software issue. Other than that everything else is ok. It logs sleep and heart rate excellent and accurate. Including when he takes a nap. Hopefully the next update can get these glitches fixed and a collaboration with all the CPAP machines with Bluetooth will a actually beable to use that function because this really is to monitor he o2 levels while he's sleeping or out and about.
Author: Benjamin Mashek

Title: Mostly info on sleep habits
Content: Mostly info on sleep habits, the app has been inaccurate but updates should help out
Author: Alan Finlason

Title: Best in class vital monitor.
Content: The ring is compact and the app allows specific monitoring of vital health facts that help you improve your living experience. Sleep and stress monitoring head the vitals that help you live better and improve your health.
Author: RUSS

Title: Did not give the info in an easy format…
Content:
Did not give the info in an easy format
I like info from Oura better
Author: Megan

Title: Overall excellent with minor issues
Content: Thoroughly enjoying my ring and the updates are improving an already great experience. I'm actually on my second ring as the first one stopped working fairly early on. Ringconn was great about replacing it and gave me the choice of a new colour. I've had the new ring for 7 months or so and it's been flawless. I run into the occasional problem with the app and their Customer Service always gets back to me within a day or two and are very helpful. Lots of great features and probably the best price out there for what you get... and no monthly fees. I'm very pleased and definitely recommend Ringconn.
Author: Cat

Title: Love my ring so far
Content: Love my ring so far, I had problems with it but their customer service was really nice and after some troubleshooting they replaced the ring for free. I'd happily buy other products from them in the future
Author: C Brozek

Title: Great customer service and excellent…
Content: Great customer service and excellent product. The only negative part was the delivery time….it took over a month to get my ring.
Author: Frank

Title: Inconsistent results
Content: Date of experience: April 11, 2024
Author: Michael

Title: Great Experience
Content: I am very happy with the ring!
Author: Guy Cuvilly

Title: Love It
Content: product quality is good and no charge for account fee is one of the reasons why I left Oura and go with RingConn.
Author: Kwee Lim

Title: Good ring with a good and essy app.
Content:
I really like this ring it works well, lasts at least 5 days without need to charge.

And the app is nicely done.
Author: ROBERT ANGERS

Title: continuous updates and features
Content: we see continuous updates on the software. I still would like to be able to see the analysis on the PC
Author: Zeina

Title: Good product for being some what of a beta.
Content: I received the product a few weeks late but that was not an issue. The product is great. I am not sure how often the iPhone app and Ring OS are updated but I have only had one issue, where I needed to put the ring in the case. I think that is good. The tracked options are great. I would only like Garmin sync abilities as I work in a lab where I cannot where my watch and that would keep me from using 2 apps.
Author: A Gann

Title: Good But...
Content: I do like the info that it provides. The one knock that I have is that you cannot tell the orientation of the ring when on your finger, this happens as the ring rotates on the finger.You have to remove it partially to see where the sensors are. I think maybe an icon or some other insignia engraved on the top would do the trick as you could glance and see if it was oriented correctly.
Author: Dave Hamrick

Title: I made a mistake on the sizing of my…
Content: I made a mistake on the sizing of my ring yet RingConn made it right and replaced my ring.
Author: Howard

Title: Bluetooth Connectivity is hit or miss, mostly miss.
Content: Doesn’t always stay connected to my iPhones Bluetooth even when the hand holding the iPhone is the same hand the ring is on. Have had to uninstall & reinstall the app many times and have contacted customer service and they just say keep the ring near the phone. Can’t keep it any closer if it is on the hand that is holding the iPhone.
Author: Daniel Dippel

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Works great
Content: Works great. No issues with syncing and gives me the info I want from a smart ring.
Author: Mark

Title: Not sure how accurate the calorie count…
Content: Not sure how accurate the calorie count is. I bought this to replace my Fitbit and can’t use it to workout. There’s a new run mode on it but I lift. Not helpful for anything other than sleep monitoring.
Author: Kinj

Title: Very good purchase
Content: Ring is very good. The sleep info is very helpfull. Some of the other stuff like blood pressure, might be a little off. Stress stuff, very accurate.
Author: Mark Z

Title: Size was wrong
Content:
Size was wrong. You sent me a sizer to get the correct size, which I noted and sent back ring to you.
Have never received new ring.
Author: Joanne

Title: exactly what i was searching for
Content: exactly what i was searching for, solid product
Author: Cooper

Title: Not that stylish
Content: Not that stylish, scratches very easy
Author: AJ Mattia

Title: I absolutely love my ring
Content: I absolutely love my ring. It's been incredible how much it's helped out my health and well-being. I'm already a functional practitioner and the data that I get from this ring has completely taken my health to the next level
Author: Heather Gray

Title: Very comfortable
Content: Very comfortable! Easy to pair. The battery lasts all week and charges fast. I have the gold one. Love it! The app. Is easy to navigate!
Author: Maria Vinson

Title: The ring is comfortable and sturdy
Content: The ring is comfortable and sturdy. The information it provides me is valuable to maintaining my health. My Fitbit fills in where you miss out, IE individual exercises.
Author: WALTER PAULSON

Title: This is a competitive priced smart ring but think twice if you have privacy concerns.
Content:
This product is pretty reasonable for its price and not needing a subscription. I would buy it again if I were looking for a smart ring; it's as good as Oura.

The downsides: - The ring protectors are way overpriced and pretty flimsy. - It sketches me out that the app *must* have location data in order for it to display the ring data; it feels like I'm likely being tracked by a foreign government, because I probably am.
Author: Jonathan Wallace

Title: This ring does everything!
Content:
This ring does everything!
I'm very satisfied with my purchase. My ring fits great and performs very well. It tracks everything I need to watch for my health. Great job Ring Conn.
Author: KJ Adams

Title: I love that I don’t have to wear…
Content: I love that I don’t have to wear anything device on my wrist to get my sleeping tracked. Love that it tracks my stress levels and heart rate. Wish it would track my activities from yoga and jiu jitsu and water intake. Otherwise, I’m a very happy customer
Author: Elizabeth Reiter

Title: I enjoy ringconn
Content: I enjoy ringconn. It let's me know mysleep patterns and whst my activity level is at. When it low my activity it let's me know I should get up and move
Author: Marjorie

Title: Good Not Great, Would Not Buy Again
Content: Cons -ring gets scratched up way too easily, I have black ring and dont do anything out of ordinary, can only imagine how bad this ring will look when I start the gym. I work a desk job and do daily walks and ride bikes. Very poor physical quality -Sleep tracking records me in deep sleep when I am just reading in bed, despite page turning movement with that hand -Sleep tracking writes massive duplicate values to iOS health app -App feels lackluster Pros -no subscription -accurate blood ox, heart rate -like stress reading
Author: DB

Title: Best tracking device I have ever used
Content:
The ring is so comfortable to wear I don't even notice it until I take it off and then I am lost without it. The ring covers everything I need and reminds me to get up and move when I become to sedentary.

I bought one for my son and I am going to order one for my husband's birthday.
Author: Joan McCreesh

Title: No what I did expect for what I paid
Content: I think that for the sleep tracking does a proper job. The accuracy of steps and excersises far from beeing precise. I don't like the app, I wanted to link to a different app but it seems no possible and so I stopped using it.
Author: A G

Title: RingConn is a good tool but needs to be better
Content: I appreciate the app but it is not as accurate as it needs to be. I have been a long time Oura user and fine that the charge last for about 4 days which is acceptable and I like the sleep tracking. I don’t think the step counting feature is very accurate. The online group is terrific.
Author: David

Title: Just get one!
Content: So far a great discreet accessory to analyze data about our well-being, Extremely impressed with the battery life, charging time, and how comfortable it is to wear.
Author: Patrick Trinchese

Title: Best Subscription free alternative
Content: I've been using RingConn for about a month now, and it's fantastic. It offers an experience comparable to that of pricier alternatives in the market, and its build quality matches those of its competitors. It connects flawlessly with Apple Health, and my favorite feature is the stress index, which accurately identifies the moments when I'm feeling the most pressure.
Author: Eryk

Title: So glad I bought
Content: The main reason I bought my RingConn was to monitor my sleep but I got so much more. All of the information it provides is great. I realized that my sleep routine was not great and I am working on that. It is comfortable to wear and easy to charge. The charge lasts the 7 days and the charging case is awesome. The app is easy to use. I would recommend this smart ring to anyone.
Author: xrayer

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Useful apps and nice design
Content: Useful apps
Author: Mike Ma

Title: Finish is coming off of the ring
Content: Finish is coming off of the ring. The ring has disconnected from my phone twice.
Author: David Pitts

Title: Simply a great ring!
Content: Simply, the ring works! Fits well, has great battery life and appears to be more accurate than other makes...
Author: Jim Halbert

Title: Solid ring hardware and app
Content: Solid ring hardware and app, prompt customer service. Compared to Ultrahuman, the ring is a little bit thicker and feels slightly bulkier, but perfectly fine. The app is more straight to the point and overview-focused, while the Ultrahuman app is organized in "cards" and not as "utilitarian". One caveat: The data upload from ring to app is a little bit slow.
Author: MB

Title: Honestly replaces my smart watch
Content:
Purchase was easy, but I didn't have sizing so got their sizing kit. This caused an overall oddity as the order on their system never really updated well when I provided the size and color I wanted. It instead seemed to get hung up, but support was fantastic and got everything resolved and my ring out to me.

I do wish they had bigger size options though, but I'm a big guy so I'm used to having a hard time with sizing lol

Application is good, widget on my android is pretty decent, and the ring looks and feels good. Battery lasts me on average 5-6 days usually.

Only improvement I can think of after a month+ of wearing it, is that I wish it was a bit different from a simple band looking ring
Author: Serge H.

Title: YouTube I watched a YouTube video
Content: Date of experience: June 15, 2023
Author: Marcus Halliman

Title: So far so good
Content: So far so good! I’ve now been using my RINGCON for about 2 months, and find the health information is great for my use.
Author: Joe Rock

Title: Responsive and Helpful
Content: Very responsive and helpful with questions. Professional packaging, easy instructions. No paid app that is very easy to track.
Author: Karen Michaelson

Title: Happy with my purchase
Content: Great product. Does all it claims to do. I use it mostly to track sleep, but also frequently check my stress level. Definitely recommend it.
Author: Kelley

Title: Perfect
Content: Ring came on time (after first getting the rings to find the right one that fitted!) Very happy with it: works perfect, connection to iPhone flawless, I forget that I am wearing it. Enough health controls! No problem with keeping it on for 7 days in a row, no allergie, no pain. Again in one word: PERFECT.
Author: Mary

Title: Solid builded
Content:
I using the ring 2 months already ,lifting weights at the gym ,shower ,swimming,sleep ,even sauna this wee things look like indestructible!
Happy with the app shows very detailed information.The shipping come relatively fast.!
Only I really want the manufacturer to made "strength mode" for the gym ,because I've built mostly for this and track the quality of sleep!

Cons: if you wear the ring only on one hads start to shrinks the skin on the place,so I Switching the ring on both hands.
It's a bit thick for woman or tiny man!
Other than that it's do the job perfectly 👌🏻!
Author: Leo Stoyanov

Title: Innovative, informative but too playful.
Content:
An innovative concept that provides important information. However, it is not very suitable for cycling as the pedometer does not respond precisely to your movements. The evaluations in the new app are appealing and informative. However, I could do without the playful medals. Unfortunately, they devalue the information system somewhat in relation to the game package.
Otherwise I am satisfied. The RIng gives me valuable information about my blood oxygen level, which is important after my pulmonary embolism.
Author: Martin Wenger

Title: Good price-performance ratio
Content: Good price-performance ratio. Product offers what it promises: 7-day runtime, no license costs, app is maintained and further developed.
Author: co Dede

Title: I like the ring and its functionality…
Content: I like the ring and its functionality as well as the software. I get all the information I need from it in a quite intuitive way.
Author: Andreas S.

Title: Best health tracker
Content: The ring is very comfortable and it allows me to wear different watches. Scratches resistant and water resistant too. Simply loving it
Author: Shailesh Ghatge

Title: I want finnish language.
Content: Date of experience: April 10, 2024
Author: Customer

Title: My daily health check and fitness support
Content: Clear structure, graphic implementation and the variety of evaluations are excellent. The battery capacity of over 7 days with 24-hour use is remarkable
Author: Ulrich Wondra

Title: I am becoming more healthy since…
Content: I am becoming more healthy since wearing my RingConn. I see the way my heart is working and my stress level. However it seems to take more time to charge. Outside of that I highly recommend the Ring- Conn .
Author: Nancy Turi

Title: An online store in top form! Great product!
Content:
An online store in top form. All the information, easy navigation and great visualizations.
I was shown all the options quickly and directly, there are no hidden costs and the product is absolutely great!
Author: Robert Peuser

Title: Works as intended
Content:
Use of free sizing kit for chosing your ring size is highly recommended.
Ring works as intended, wearing it every day and night for over a month now.
Author: Markus M.

Content: Just about everything regarding this ring is wonderful. I have enjoyed wearing it with all the knowledge and information provided from it. I upgraded from another brand somewhat reluctantly, but on... See more

Buyer beware, this company is horrible to deal with. I was offered a replacement when I queried why the ring sizer didn't match the actual ring which then changed as soon as I mentioned a retailer o... See more

I was misled in speaking with a customer service person on the return policy and was told I would get a refund when in fact the written policy said no unless defective. I had received another device f... See more

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: I love my Ring
Content: I love my Ring! The 4 star is based on the unavailability to accurately record my workouts. My treadmill does not count as steps since I am not moving forward. I would also love a BP reading availability. That said, I would NEVER give up my Ring!!
Author: Customer

Title: The best health ring the money can buy
Content: Date of experience: April 09, 2024
Author: Naren Yellavula

Title: Excellent functions and smart life style mirroring
Content: Date of experience: March 31, 2024
Author: Ahmed Lutfi

Title: Love the metrics and exercise apps
Content: Love the metrics and anxious to get all exercise apps activated. Please also consider adding Indoor biking. Elliptical and weight training.
Author: Bill Grange

Title: Activities
Content:
Thank You
RingConn has been working well for me.
Author: Angie Pons

Title: Love the RingConn - 5 stars
Content:
Great service 1 ll- love the ring - quality and finish exceeded expectations
App is excellent.
I have a competitors ring also and prefer this one in every way.
Battery is crazy - I charge every 8th day.
Black finish does not have a single mark on it.
Charging case is great.
Author: Mark N

Title: Great job
Content: Great job . Working good 😊
Author: David Luna

Title: Fantastic Ring.
Content: wish the tracking information was better. And that shipping was quicker. It took two weeks, with no information about when it would arrive. Seems long compared to everyone else. The ring itself, is fantastic. Love the shape,fit, and quality of it.Seems to be holding up well. The software is good. Wish there was cycling tracking. Otherwise it has replaced my smart watch completely.
Author: Peter F

Title: Great ring. I wish it tracked exercise
Content:
I love what this ring tells me about my health and sleep. And I like the trending it does with the data.
I wish it tracked exercise. I'm having a hard time getting it to recognize when I'm doing cardio. It does not read my heart beat when it rises above 100 during exercise.
Author: Heidi

Title: Easy to use, great customer service
Content: Ordering and using this product has been fantastic. I didn't know what size to order so a sizing kit was immediately shipped and I received it within a few days. I decided to order the size that fit on both my index finger AND middle finger (at least that was the plan). There was some confusion about which email I should order under, but I called customer service and they got me fixed up right away. Once I got the ring, it was slightly larger than the sizing sample and only fits snugly in my index finger, but that's ok. I love the information the ring provides and the app is easy to use. I'm fully satisfied.
Author: Dulcy Strong

Title: I'm ready for my next stroke, Mr DeMille.
Content: I have no idea what half of my stats mean and I'm not even sure how accurate this ring is...but I had a stroke last summer and my Apple Watch registered something but I can't get enough info. I wish I had the RingConn back then, it might have told me more. I'm ready for my next stroke, I'll tell you then how good this ring is. I walked away no damage, I was lucky. Hope I never find out how good this ring is. Ha,ha.
Author: Mark

Title: Overall Rinconn is a "good" value
Content: Overall Rinconn is a "good" value. The fit is not good or comfortable. The app contains a great deal of good information but is organized poorly. I purchased a protective cover for the ring that was garbage ... three cheaply made rubber covers that made the ring more uncomfortable and much less attractive. I think this company needs to pay attention to customer personas. They need to understand better the expectations of active people and good field testing will improve the product.
Author: Sal

Title: No negatives here!
Content: Got ring size kit quickly.. ring came fairly quick. No issues and have had several months. Belong to Facebook group and all questions are answered quick and correctly. No negatives here!!!
Author: Jennifer S. Ohio

Title: Item to big and only allows two weeks…
Content: Item to big and only allows two weeks to return
Author: Stefan Easter

Title: Best smart ring I’ve used so far
Content: After using other smart rings, I found RingConn to be the most comfortable, best design, superbly accurate, information rich smart device.
Author: Robert F.

Title: Perfect for what I was looking for.
Content: Date of experience: March 01, 2024
Author: Ryan Terry

Title: Once I got the ring
Content: Once I got the ring, took way to long to receive it, it works great and have no complaints.
Author: Michael Mabie

Title: I so far think possibly better than the…
Content: I so far think possibly better than the Oura
Author: Gregory Simmons

Title: My ring does not fit and when I emailed…
Content: My ring does not fit and when I emailed about it I was told that I couldn’t exchange it for the correct size.
Author: Sheila Riggs

Title: RingConn is great
Content:
RingConn is great. 2 things to improve the rings: 1. For rings to come in 1/2 sizes. 2. A mark on the ring showing the “bottom” of the ring.

Thanks.
Author: Derick Bowers

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: The Ring does everything I wanted to…
Content: The Ring does everything I wanted to do. It measures my sleep, my stress, my heart rate, and my well-being. Thank you so much.I’m
Author: Janice Croft

Title: Do your research to find the best ring for you. This one is a winner for me!
Content: I did a lot of research in finding the smart ring that would work best for me. I decided on the RingConn ring because of the style, color choices and information the RingConn app would provide me. I also didn't want to pay for a subscription service just to use the ring. Before ordering the ring, I was sent a ring size kit. The kit is amazing. It provides enough physical ring sizes to meet everyone's needs. Try one on for 24 hrs and see what fits best before ordering. The ring does exactly what RingConn says it does and does not do. I take a shower with it, sleep with it, along with exercise. The app information has helped me with several changes in my life. From my sleep habits to exercise. I have had the ring about a month now and couldn't have chosen a better smart ring that is currently on the market.
Author: Todd B

Title: Love that this ring keeps its charge…
Content: Love that this ring keeps its charge for the entire 6-7 days as promised. The travel charger is excellent, and the app itself is easy to use and I like that it shows the date continuously unlike the Oura ring that I switched from. Excellent product, happy with my purchase.
Author: Blaze

Title: Inaccurate data.It assumes I’m asleep…
Content: Inaccurate data.It assumes I’m asleep when I’m not. Doesn’t account to any physical activity except for walking.
Author: Ken

Title: Works well
Content: Works well. Good price.
Author: Jaymes Baith

Title: Good data - hopefully more to come ...
Content: The ring sensors and the app provide interesting and useful information about my sleep cycles, blood oxygen, activity, etc. As the product evolves, I look forward to additional types of data from the ring.
Author: John

Title: Sleep tracking is suboptimal
Content: The sleep tracking is not very accurate. It allowed me to check some hypothesis and form new ones, such as whether I had sleep apnea, whether sleeping on the side was better for me. But as the timings are off by sometime more than an hour, it's hard to use it to track the effect of small changes.
Author: Lucie Philippon

Title: I love this health tracker
Content:
I love this health tracker! I didn’t want a smart watch, as I have a very nice analog one already, so this was the perfect solution.
I was a bit apprehensive about the quality ( as it was the less expensive version of the ones on the market) but I’m more than impressed with the accuracy, quality and ease of use.

I would say the delivery times could use some improvement, it took almost 4 weeks to receive the Ring sizing kit, had another week to receive the actual Ring itself. I also wish they had a polished version, I have the silver one, and it looks quite dull compared to my other jewellery, however that’s quite an petty observation, given the functionality of the unit.

I love the sleep tracking, it’s really helped me to actively improve the quality of my sleep. I’ve noticed a direct correlation between the number of steps I get each day and the quality of my sleep and HRV.
Absolutely recommend this health tracker to anyone who is looking for a deeper insight on how to improve their overall health .
Author: Tammy Halliday

Title: basic
Content: It does the basic, nothing more nothing less.
Author: Isaac

Title: The ring works and looks great
Content: The ring works and looks great. The battery life is good too, as we only have to charge it once a week. Very happy with it overall!
Author: Katie A

Title: So Far So Good
Content:
Delivery of the ring was quick considering the distance it had to travel. Everything is as described.
I am a little concerned that some reading differ greatly from other measuring devices. Will need to see how this plays out.
Customer service was great. I had occasion to email them and was emailed with a resolution within 48 hours.
Author: Malcolm Rogers

Title: Exceed expectations
Content: Great purchase experience & the ring itself has exceeded my expectations. I feel arm with great stats to help me manage my health.
Author: Matthew Johnson

Title: Health Insights
Content: I'm getting great new insights into how to improve my overall health. Comparing the app's graphical recordings with my actual feelings and experience is helping me understand my body better. I am getting a lot more exercise as I see the benefits.
Author: John Mayes

Title: Bye Bye I-Watch and Hello Ring!
Content: Love the ring! Once a week charge and you can monitor so much from it! I’ve purchased 6 so far for gifts!
Author: Tracy Gleason

Title: Fashion and function
Content: Arrived quickly, packaging is beautiful and battery life is amazing. Looks just like a trendy ring.
Author: Ange P.

Title: Best smart ring available at the…
Content: Best smart ring available at the moment. Even the App is now translated into German.
Author: Kai-Uwe Reimers

Title: Very good ring
Content: It more was what expect very easy to read and to understand
Author: Francois Ouellette

Title: RingConn works very well and charges…
Content: RingConn works very well and charges fast. Great value. No issues with syncing with the app!
Author: AB

Title: My RingConn is amazing!!
Content: The RingConn is so much better than my watch was. I am finally getting the type of statistics that matter to me. I bought this because I wanted to know how I was really sleeping but gives me so much more than I hoped it would. Also loving the battery life! I have and will continue to recommend RingConn!
Author: Kevin B

Title: The only smart device worth wearing
Content: The level of health information this device gives is beyond any other smart device I've had. I would highly recommend it. No more charging daily, it lasts 7 days, very fast charging, gives great tips, insights into your sleep patterns and how to improve them. Its a 5 star review from me for sure.
Author: Susan Spencer

I love the RingConn Gen 2 Air. It’s very accurate against my Apple Watch better than the RingConn Gen 2. I believe the difference in the two is just the sleep apnea. I have sleep apnea and I’m being... See more

Title: Very responsive and had correct…
Content: Very responsive and had correct information about my delivery.
Author: Annie Humes

Title: Great Monitor of Sleep and Stress
Content: I love the ring design. The ability to try different sizes was extremely helpful to determine the correct ring size for my finger. A rose gold option would be amazing. The main reason for purchase was to track my sleep and stress level. The recommendations to improve REM and Deep Sleep is extremely helpful. For stress, it is helpful to see the levels throughout the day. This allows me to reflect on what I was doing at that time in order to reduce or avoid the same triggers later. Overall, wearing a ring is so much better than wearing a watch. I LOVE IT!
Author: Michelle

Title: Never received ordered accessory
Content: Date of experience: April 05, 2024
Author: Kevin A

Title: Ring works as advertised& is…
Content: Ring works as advertised& is comfortable , having a logo or some kind of marking to know when the sensors are not in the right position would B helpful. Otherwise I am pleased with it
Author: Harry Segarra

Title: Ring doesn't quite have the resolution…
Content:
Ring doesn't quite have the resolution I expected on some of the tracking features and is missing on temperature and some of the tracking capabilities.
I understand the product is still developing.
Tradeoff with other brands are the lower purchase point and no monthly fee versus an unfinished product.
Author: J. P

Title: The rind does not synch up with Apple…
Content:
The rind does not synch up with Apple Health!!

It is otherwise a nice ring with a good fit and appearance.
Author: SCOTT SIEGEL

Title: After a bad year of stress and heath…
Content: After a bad year of stress and heath issues the ring has helped me to pin point times of stress with what was happening at that time ,then im able to reduce the triggets are for me .
Author: David Hogarth

Title: Good passive solution
Content:
I am satisfied with the design, the application and the "passive" logic of use. Smart bracelets always annoyed me when they alert me to something, they always want some kind of interaction, the ring is a really great solution in this perspective. Plus I can wear a normal classic analog watch. The ring has a very good battery life and the charging solution is elegant.
I give four stars because the application still needs to develop some functionalities, for example different types of exercises. And you need to realize that the number of measured steps is always a little overestimated (it's logical, every person waves his hand all the time, not only while walking)
Author: Michal

Title: RingConn in my opinion is better than Oura for sleep data
Content: My original ring wouldn't charge - -I bought a new charger and then still not charging - BUT I bought a new ring in silver. It works awesome - and I have the other ring that came to life...but I don't wear it any more - sort of a back up. RingConn seems to catch my deep sleep better than OURA (I wear both rings at same time on different hand).
Author: Melanie Baker

Title: Great product at a good price and no ongoing fees!
Content: Great price, no ongoing fees to rip you off and great mobile app s/w, a great combination of features to compete with other smart rings
Author: Naran

Title: A smart sleep monitor
Content: This ring has been useful in tracking my vital health indicators. It has helped me establish a sensible sleep pattern that has resulted in feeling better. I also use the heart rate feedback when I am exercising. I would highly recommend this ring for getting control of your health.
Author: Sherrie Bartlett

Title: An excellent device
Content: An excellent device! With no monthly subscription
Author: MFA

Title: Enjoying my RingConn
Content: Great product as a companion to my Apple Watch. Seems to be very similar in the key metrics of HR, SP02, sleep, etc. Excited to see the addition of workout tracking.
Author: Josh Honeycutt

Title: Difficult for big hands
Content: The ring is somewhat uncomfortable to wire especially when grasping door nobs etc. While ringconn has the best selection of sizes large hands are left out just like the competition. This was the only manufacturer whose ring would fit my right hand ring finger vice index finger which would have more comfortable to wear. I like the battery lasting seven days mostly. Charging is very easy and fast. It would be handy to have a visible way to know the ring is in right position when worn. I currently use a dab of finger nail polish so I can quickly verify the rings position. The price of the ring is fair. To be fair I recognize the problem with manufacturing for other than the most popular sizes.
Author: Charles O Allen

Title: A well designed product
Content: The product they built works really well. i used a competitors offering prior to ringconn but ringconn works better, fits me well and is much lighter. I am very happy with the fact that i no longer have to pay a subscription. a solid company
Author: ParB

Title: RingConn Has Given Me a Less Distracted Life
Content: I have loved everything about my RingConn. It's comfortable, and the app gives me every bit of information I need. I love the sleep review each morning, and I've tried different apps to collect similar information. I have loved not having a smartwatch, that seemed to really distract me. I am much more present in my life, which seems funny to say, but for me it's been a huge win. Long charge, easy to charge.
Author: Susan B Steen

Title: Perfect Everyday Device
Content: The ring and accompanying app give great information on my sleep, stress levels, and activity intensity. The app provides the right amount of details and the charts are great at presenting the information in a useful format. I also have a Fitbit Charge 5 and a Garmin Venu 3 and I find the RingConn the best in these categories. Small and unassuming - doesn't get in the way. Runs many days without requiring a charge, and the small charge case is perfect because it doesn't require you to plug into a wall outlet all the time (I have had the ring since February and have yet to recharge the charge case). Would highly recommend this product for those interested in understanding how their body is behaving.
Author: Louise

Title: Great interface
Content: Good value.
Author: JRV

Title: Better than a Galaxy Watch 6. Lol
Content: I love this ring. It works great. The amount of information it can provide is crazy. I'll never understand how something so small can store so much data and be capable of transferring that data to the app. Everything works perfectly. I've had zero complaints. I like that there's no monthly fee. I highly recommend Ring Conn. I have nothing bad to say about it at all. In fact I had a Galaxy Watch 6 and had lots of issues with it not storing or syncing data. This ring has been flawless and I've owned it for like 3 or 4 months now. Get one. You'll love it.
Author: Jonny Hill

Title: Don’t have it yet after a month
Content: Can’t rate my experience as, after almost a month since ordering, my ring has not yet shipped a month after ordering. I Have only received a single communication from customer service, and that was after I inquired on the status and that was only to confirm that they had received my order. I can understand if the delay is due to supply issues, but it’s not mentioned on the website, and has bot been communicated to those waiting for their order.
Author: InexactEarth
